story:
A Modern Solution To Frustrating Allergy Pain

ClearUP Sinus Pain Relief is the first and only US bioelectronic device designed to alleviate allergy sinus pain. Tivic Health’s state-of-the-art innovation works with the body’s natural bioelectricity, using low-current electrical stimulation about 1/1000 of the level of traditional TENS therapy. ClearUP emits a proprietary microcurrent waveform onto the outside of the sinus passages that stimulates the underlying sinus nerve fibers. ClearUP also has 510(k) clearance by the FDA. 

Results from the clinical study showed that 3 out of 4 users experienced a reduction in sinus pain after a single 5 minute treatment. 

 

Our goal is to provide a medical device that’s medically and scientifically grounded, so we conducted a robust clinical study at a premier U.S. science research center. The results were quite dramatic.

Results from the clinical study showed that 3 out of 4 users experienced a reduction in sinus pain after a single 5 minute treatment.

 

The ClearUP Difference

ClearUP is non-invasive and chemical-free (no chemical side effects). It's portable and offers customized delivery in quick 5 minute treatments. Relief lasts up to 6 hours and the device can be used up to 4 times per day. Visit our website to see a chart comparing ClearUP to other treatment options → Click here.

 

 

 

 

 

  1. Click and hold the power button to turn ClearUP on. 
  2. Glide device tip slowly on the cheek, nose and brow bone. Keep the tip in contact with your skin at all times.
  3. When you feel a subtle vibration, hold it in place until the vibration stops. The soft vibration means that ClearUP has detected a treatment point and is delivering low-level, electrical microcurrents through your skin to underlying sinus nerve fibers.  
  4. Continue gliding ClearUP in a circular path. ClearUP will guide you to the next treatment point where it will vibrate again.
  5. After 2 ½ minutes, switch ClearUP to the other side of your face to complete your treatment.

 

Please note that ClearUP is for adults 18+ years.  Do not use if you are pregnant, have a pacemaker or a metallic implanted device.  A small percentage of users experience brief, mild skin irritation. Not to replace current medical treatment. Consult your doctor before use. 

 

 

Dr. Subinoy Das, ENT

“I have witnessed the Tivic Health product dramatically relieve sinus pain. I plan to recommend to 100% of my patients with sinus pain. Game-changing.”

Dr. Alan Goldsobel, Allergist

“It’s very exciting to have this whole new form of treatment using extremely safe neuromodulation as a way to address the needs of the patient.”

Jacquelynne Corey, MD 

"As a physician, I like the concept of ClearUP because it's non-invasive and drug-free.  I'm sure my patients will like it too."  

 

 

Silva A. From California

“I just used it for 5 minutes and now I can breathe. I don’t have any obstruction of my nose and I literally feel no drip in the back of my throat anymore. I would easily use this every day.”

Julie Pak

"I've been suffering from allergies all my life. Just going outside has always been a chore for me; anything could trigger my allergies. I've been using ClearUP three times daily for the last five days now, and I have to say I love it! I can use it almost anywhere since I carry it in my bag, and now I can say I use fewer meds!"

Kevin Wiley, Colorado

"All I can say is, wow!  All last week I was suffering from a lot of sinus pain and pressure.  So I treated my sinuses and I would say at the end of about 3 to 4 days after using it, maybe twice a day, all of the symptoms were completely GONE!  Absolutely gone.  I'm not one to take medications for any of these conditions so this was absolutely a perfect device for me.  It just speeds up the natural healing."

 

 

Final device may have slight variations from shown.

The unique shape of ClearUP is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in the hand while gliding across the face. It fits in smaller places, like around the contours of the nose and nooks near the eyebrow bone.

 

 

Manufacturing is already in progress and ClearUP is 100% on track to ship in September 2019. Follow these simple steps to place your Indiegogo pre-order:

  

 

 

 

Watch Tivic Health CEO and Co-Founder, Jennifer Ernst, tell the story of how it started. 

_________________________________________________________

 

Years ago, I suffered from a serious back injury that left me in severe pain. I tried various forms of therapy, but nothing seemed to work. I did not want to rely on pain medication due to the side effects and possibility of developing a dependence on them. The only treatment that left me pain free was using microcurrent. I was amazed at the ease of use and level of relief this technology afforded me without any medication.

When I heard about John Claude’s new way of using microcurrent to relieve allergy-related sinus pain, I was immediately intrigued. This same amazing technology that freed me from my back pain could also be applied to one of the most frustrating symptoms of allergies. I wanted to share this technology with everyone!

As I dove into the market, it became clear that the old methods of treating sinus pain were still dominating most people’s options. Nasal flushes have been around for years, and as messy and uncomfortable as they are, people were still relying on them. There had been no new innovation, no new technology, in sinus pain treatment—and that had to change.

We are happy to bring true innovation to the industry through the use of microcurrent therapy, a safe and effective method of relieving sinus pain due to allergies. This is a radically different option that we have discovered, and we are ready to bring it to everyone’s allergy relief toolkit. We have developed a superior design and conducted a robust study with outstanding results, and now we need your help to bring ClearUP to the 40-60 million people who experience allergies. Thank you for helping us bring innovation to sinus pain relief technology!  

I would love to hear your allergy sinus pain story or answer any questions about ClearUP. You can reach us at tivicmarketing@tivichealth.com.

Jennifer Ernst

CEO and Co-Founder

 

 

The people behind Tivic Health are dedicated to empowering those with chronic conditions. Our goal is to deliver heath-tech medical devices that help you stay in control of symptoms at home without drugs or chemical side-effects. Our engineers, product designers, healthcare advisors, and researchers work together to harness the body’s bioelectric system to create therapeutic benefits.

From design to manufacturing, we have partnered with top tier professionals to bring you the best possible device. Tivic Health has created ClearUP to be efficacious and meets users’ needs as a device that’s well-built, well-designed, and supported with strong manufacturing and supply chains.

 

 

 

Reusable, rechargeable device. No batteries needed, charging cable included. Comes with a portable pouch for storing at home, carrying to work, or while traveling.

 

 

 

 

Mass production is in progress and shipping will be in September 2019. There are risks that may be out of our control. However, If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. We will keep each backer in the loop about the final shipping date.

 

 

 

  Questions? Please contact us at tivicmarketing@tivichealth.com

story:
:: GERMAN VERSION :: (To enjoy the english text, please scroll down)


MITO - Archetyp einer neuen Getränke-Generation-Der Mitochondrien Drink-Anti Aging für Deine Zellen


Ein rein natürliches Getränk, mit dem Du Deine Leistungsfähigkeit auf gesunde Weise steigerst. Nachhaltig.


Dafür sorgt der einzigartige mitochondrien-aktivierende Wirkstoffkomplex.

Du willst gesund und aktiv sein und bleiben? Dann stärke deine Mitochondrien. Entdecke das Geheimnis von Vitalität, Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit. 

Deine Mitochondrien.

Drei Aspekte stecken hinter dem Mito Drink und der dauerhaften Steigerung deiner ganzheitlichen Leistungsfähigkeit:

  • Unsere Vision
  • Deine Mitochondrien
  • Die revolutionäre Innovation 

Unsere Vision -

Leistungssteigerung auf natürliche und gesunde Weise. 

Kranke Gesellschaft

Zu den Krankheiten unserer Zivilisation  -viele davon Ergebnisse der unerbittlichen Leistungsdruckgesellschaft und der zunehmend schlechter werdenden Umweltbedingungen -  zählen neben Herz-Kreislauf-Erkrankungen, Diabetes und Bluthochdruck vor allem auch Burn-out und Depressionen. Wer das Glück hat, sich in München im Burn-out-Diagnostik-Institut behandeln lassen zu können, erhält den kostbaren Vorzug einer individuellen Therapie. Diese umfasst neben den schulmedizinischen Ansätzen auch alternativmedizinische Wege, wie z.B. den der mitochondrialen Medizin.

Gesundheit fördern

Zwei der führenden Mitochondrien-Spezialisten aus Deutschland behandeln ihre Patienten nachhaltig: Mit hochwirksamen Naturstoffprodukten werden die Mitochondrien gezielt aufgebaut. Ganz ohne Chemie und ohne künstliche Stoffe, die der Körper nicht verarbeiten kann. So werden die Beschwerden an der Wurzel gepackt.

Viele Patienten bestätigen eine Verbesserung ihres individuellen Wohlbefindens innerhalb kürzester Zeit. Da werden die labortechnischen Belege der Genesung beinahe nebensächlich. 

Innovative Idee

Doch warum die Menschen erst behandeln, wenn sie krank sind? Viel besser ist es doch, vorhandene Leistungsfähigkeit und Gesundheit auszubauen. 

Wie? Klar, in dem die Menschen ihre Mitochondrien stärken. Auf natürliche Weise und natürlichem Weg: Über ein naturstoffliches Getränk.


Formel für die Flasche

Mission: Es soll ein "Mitochondrien - aktivierender Wirkstoffkomplex" für ein Getränk der neuen Generation" entwickelt werden. 
Schritt eins: 2012 Die Ärzte und Spezialisten des Burn-out-Diagnistik-Instituts kontaktierten renommierte Professoren aus dem Bereich der Molekular-Biologie und gewannen sie auf Anhieb für die Idee. Es wurde eine Task Force ins Leben gerufen, die die Vision - Steigerung der zellulären Leistungsfähigkeit für alle Menschen - möglich machen will. Und wird. 
Schritt zwei: 2013 Intensive Forschungs- und Entwicklungsarbeiten begannen. Begleitet, gestützt und getragen durch zahlreiche Studien. Schließlich gelang es, den Mitochondrien-aktivierenden Wirkstoff zu extrahieren. Ein Meilenstein. ----Link HP Studien? 
Schritt drei: 2014 Konzeption und Design des Getränks starteten unter strengsten Auflagen. Ende 2014 konnte der Wirksoffkomplex in einer speziell aufeinander abgestimmten Komplexmischung aus rein natürlichen und qualitativ hochwertigen Inhaltsstoffen als Getränk - MITO - hergestellt werden. Der Durchbruch.
Schritt vier: Heute. Herstellung und Vermarktung von MITO,das Getränk, das Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit gleichermaßen fördert, soll erfolgen. Produktion und Aufklärungsarbeit sind kostenintensiv, die Entwicklungsinvestitionen waren hoch. Somit: Warum das Getränk, das Alle unterstützen kann nicht auch von allen unterstützen lassen? Das Crowdfunding. 
Schritt fünf: Morgen. Die ersten 250.000 Flaschen laufen vom Band. Unsere Marketing- und Aufklärungskampagne überzeugt das Land. MITO hat Euer Leben etwas besser gemacht. Danke.


Deine Mitochondrien - 

Dein Schlüssel zu mehr Gesundheit, Jugend & Leistungsfähigkeit. 

Den Schlüssel zu Gesundheit, Jugend & Leitungsfähigkeit trägst Du in Dir, in jeder Deiner Zellen: Deine Mitochondrien. Mitochondrien sind die Energie-Kraftwerke der Zellen. In jeder menschlichen Zelle befinden sich zwischen 500 bis 5000 Mitochondrien. Sie bilden den Energiestoff ATP (Adenosintriphosphat), der für den gesamten Stoffwechsel der Zellen notwendig ist. ATP entsteht - vereinfacht ausgedrückt - wenn in den Zellen Glukose mit Sauerstoff oxidiert (oxidative Phosphorylierung), also "verbrannt" wird. Die Verbrennung setzt Energie frei und wird zu ATP verstoffwechselt. ATP transportiert die Energie dann dorthin, wo sie benötigt wird. Und das nicht nur für physische Funktionen. Auch das Nervenkostüm, die Verdauung, die Neubildung von Haaren und Haut benötigt dieses ATP.

 ATP-Produktion

Somit logisch: Die leistungsfähigen Zellkraftwerke (Mitochondrien) produzieren das ATP, das dein gesamter Organismus benötigt. Umgekehrt: wird aufgrund einer mitochondrialen Störung nicht genügend Energie produziert, funktioniert der Organismus nicht richtig. Es kommt Sand ins Getriebe, der nach einiger Zeit massive Schäden anrichtet.

Du kannst dem vorbeugen. Die mitochondriale Leistung Deiner Zellen bestimmt Deine individuelle Leistungsfähigkeit. Stärke Deine Zellen - bleibe gesund.


Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage



Die revolutionäre Innovation -
MITO - "iphone der functional drinks"

Seit ca. 1985 gibt es es portable Telefone, mit denen man ohne Vermittlung telefonieren konnte. Ab 1992 wurden sie zum Produkt für jedermann. Die Revolution fand 2007 statt. Das iphone war der Beginn einer völlig neuen Mobiltelefon-Generation: der Smartphones.

Bei aller Bescheidenheit scheuen wir nicht den Vergleich: MITO ist das iphone der funktionellen Getränke. MITO wird dem Markt der funktionellen Getränke zugeordnet. Hier tummeln sich Getränke mit Zusatznutzen. Ihr kennt sie wohl alle:

  • Energy Drinks
  • Iso- Erfrischungen
  • Vitamingetränke
  • Mehrfruchtgetränke
  • Nektar
  • Teegetränke

Ihr gemeinsames Manko: Sie haben jeweils nur einen Zusatznutzen. Sie sind entweder gesundheits- oder leistungsfördernd. Niemals beides.

Mit MITO ist eine neue Dimension eröffnet worden: gesundheits- und leistungsfördernd.




MITO ist das einzige Getränk, das die Ansprüche an Leistung und Gesundheit kombiniert. 

Du brauchst kurzfristig einen Schub? Trink MITO. Macht wach, aber auf Dauer nicht krank, sondern leistungsfähiger. Die Gesundheitsförderung wird nicht durch isolierte Vitamine oder Mineralien erbracht, sondern durch Zellregeneration und Förderung der ATP-Produktion. Schluck für Schluck.

Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage

MITOCHONDRIEN AKTIVIERENDER WIRKSTOFFKOMPLEX



Überzeugt? Unterstütz uns.

Mit dem MITO haben wir eine neue und wirklich wertvolle Getränke-Dimension geschaffen. Wir haben damit auch neue Herausforderungen zu bewältigen. Um den einzigartigen Mehrwert des MITO zu kommunizieren, müssen wir gleichzeitig das Informationsdefizit der Gesellschaft beseitigen und Aufklärungsarbeit über die Funktion und Wichtigkeit der Mitochondrien leisten. 
Unsere Markteinführungskampagne "MITO BEGINS" kommuniziert den innovativen Zusatznutzen und soll zur Markteinführung hoch frequentiert in den zielgruppen-relevanten Kommunikationskanälen implementiert werden.


Initiale Investitionen

Unsere Komplexmischung ist qualitativ absolut hochwertig. Die MITO Produktion unterliegt strengen und speziellen Vorgaben. Für eine Produktion von ca. 60.000 Flaschen benötigen wir ca. 50.000 EUR.
Für die Aufklärung über Mitochondrien sowie integrierte Marketing - und Kommunikationskampagnen benötigen wir zum Start ca. 30.000 EUR.  

Helft uns durch Eure Unterstützung diese Herausforderungen zu bewältigen. Unser Newsblog hält Euch auf dem Laufenden. 

Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage

Anfänger-Glück

Unsere Perks haben alle eines gemeinsam: Sie lassen Dich von Anbeginn glücklich dabei sein.

  • Glück, als erstes zu probieren
  • Glück auf Vorzugspreise
  • Glück beim Gewinnspiel


Und auch jetzt schon hast Du Glück, weil Du das liest: Die ersten 1000 Fans unserer Facebookseite erhalten MITO zum Vorzugspreis: 2 Six-Packs zum Preis von einem.

Alle unsere Supporter werden auf unserer Wall-of-Fame verewigt.


Bitte weitersagen.

Falls Ihr uns nicht finanziell unterstützen könnt, aber wir Euch überzeugt haben, dann redet über uns. Am besten natürlich Gutes. Liked und teilt uns auf unserer Homepage und Facebook. Sprecht über MITO im Netz, bei der Arbeit, in der Uni, im Fitnessstudio, im Fussballstadion, an der Supermarktkasse, im Biergarten, beim Friseur...  


Wir stehen dahinter

Leben und Gesundheit bedeutet in Einklang mit den Naturgesetzen zu leben. Dies wird in unserer aktuellen, hektischen Zivilisationsgesellschaft häufig vergessen. Künstlich hergestellte Lebensmittel, synthetische Medikamente und unnatürliche Aromastoffe sowie Konservierungsmittel sind mit gesunder Lebensweise nicht zu vereinbaren.  Diese bringen immer seltener ausschließlich Nutzen, sondern rufen immer häufiger erheblichen Schaden im menschlichen Organismus hervor.

Die MITO Group beschäftigt sich seit Jahren mit der Thematik "Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit". Hier wurden ein neu- & einzigartiges Konzept sowie eigene hochwirksame Naturstoffprodukte für die Gesamtheit der Mitochondrien entwickelt. Die Philosophie hinter der MITOcare Produktreihe lautet "Zurückkehren zu uralten Naturgesetzen." MITOcare Produkte enthalten ausschließlich bioidentische Naturstoffe ohne synthetische oder künstliche Zusätze. Dabei verwendet MITOcare keine hochdosierten Einzelstoffe, sondern niedrig dosierte Komplexmischungen, wie sie in der Natur vorkommen.

Aufgrund der Erfahrungen und Entwicklungen von Präparaten für die mitochondriale Medizin, wurde die MITO GROUP von Beginn an in die Entwicklung des "Mitochondrien  - aktivierende Wirkstoffkomplex" und den daraus resultierenden MITO einbezogen.

Wir werden weiter daran arbeiten, unsere Vision Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.

Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage 

www.mito.de

____________________________________________________________________________

::: ENGLISH VERSION :::


MITO – a new generation of drinks is born.


A healthy, purely natural drink that enables long-term performance.

It's all down to the unique mitochondria-activating formula.

Want to be healthy and active? And stay that way? Then give your mitochondria a boost. Discover the secret of vitality, health and performance. 

The mitochondria.



Mito Drink, and the long-term increase of your overall performance levels, rely on three key factors:

  • Our vision
  • Your mitochondria
  • A revolutionary innovation 

Our vision -

Enhancing your performance – naturally and healthily

An ailing society

Among the many illnesses our society helps to cause – many of them due to the relentless pressure to perform and the increasing degradation of the environment – are cardiovascular diseases, diabetes and high blood pressure, to name just three. But chief among them are burn-out and depression. Anyone being treated at Munich's Burn-Out Diagnostic Institute will have the great advantage of receiving an individualised treatment programme that includes not just conventional medicine but also alternative therapies such as those based on mitochondrial medicine.

Promoting health

At the Institute, two of Germany's leading mitochondria specialists treat their patients for the long term. Highly effective natural products are used to target and build up the cells' mitochondria. No chemicals or other artificial agents are used, as the body cannot process them. In this way, we address the root cause of the difficulties.

Many patients report feeling better very quickly. Next to that, the actual clinical proof of their recovery is almost of secondary importance.

An innovative idea

Why wait until people get ill to treat them? Surely it is far preferable to build up the health and performance levels they already have.

How? By strengthening their mitochondria. Naturally – with a drink made from natural ingredients.


A formula that can be bottled

Our mission is to develop a 'mitochondria-activating formula for a new generation of drinks'.

Step one. In 2012, doctors and specialists at the Burn-Out Diagnostic Institute contacted prominent figures from the world of molecular biology and immediately won them over to the idea. A task force was put together. Its aim? To increase the cellular performance of people everywhere.

Step two: In 2013, intensive research and development began, accompanied, supported and borne out by numerous studies. Then, a milestone: the successful extraction of the mitochondria-activating agent.

Step three: in 2014, the concept and formulation of the drink began under strict conditions. Then, at the end of 2014, the breakthrough. The formula of active ingredients could finally be manufactured as a drink – MITO – using a carefully calibrated mixture of 100% natural and high-quality ingredients.

Step four. Today the manufacture and marketing of MITO, the drink that promotes both health and performance, is ready to roll. But manufacture and PR are expensive and development costs have been high. So then came the idea. Why not let MITO, the drink that can benefit everyone, be funded by everyone? In other words, by crowdfunding.

Step five: tomorrow. The first 250,000 bottles are coming off the production line. Our marketing and PR campaign is explaining the benefits of MITO to everyone. MITO has had a positive effect on your life. Thank you.


Your mitochondria –
The key to better health, feeling younger performing better. 

The key to better health, feeling younger and performing better lies within you in each and every one of your cells. In your mitochondria. Mitochondria are the cell's powerhouse. Every human cell contains somewhere between 500 and 5,000 mitochondria. The mitochondria build the energy-bearing molecules of adenosine triphosphate (ATP), which is needed by the cell's entire metabolism. Put simply, ATP is produced when glucose is oxidised, or 'burned' (a process known as oxidative phosphorylation). This combustion releases energy and is metabolised into ATP. The ATP than transports the energy to where it is needed. And not just for physical functions. The nervous and digestive systems and the build-up of new hair and skin all require ATP.

ATP production

So as you can see, the cellular powerhouses represented by the mitochondria produce the ATP that is needed buy your entire body. Or put another way, if as a result of mitochondrial defect insufficient energy is produced, then the body will not function properly. It's like grit getting into a machine. Over time, it can cause significant damage.

But you can stop this happening. The mitochondrial performance of your cells determines your individual performance. So give your cells a boost – and stay healthy. 


find out more on our website

A revolutionary innovation –
 MITO - 'the iPhone of performance drinks'

Portable phones have existed since about 1985. In 1992 they crossed over into the mass market. But it wasn't until 2007 that the revolution took place. The iPhone was the start a new generation of mobile phones: the smartphones.

In all humility, it's a comparison we can make with confidence: MITO is the iPhone of performance drinks. MITO is part of the 'functional drinks' market, where there is a whole range of products designed to provide a specific benefit. No doubt you'll be familiar with some of them:

  • Energy Drinks
  • Isotonic drinks
  • Vitamin drinks
  • Multi-fruit drinks
  • Fruit juices
  • Tea drinks

But all these drinks share the same shortcoming. They each have just one benefit. They are either healthy or performance-enhancing. Never both.

MITO is different. It is both healthy and performance-enhancing. 


find out more on our website

MITO is the only drink that meets the demand for both health and performance enhancement. 

Need a quick boost? Have a MITO. Its immediate effect will be to wake you up. But in the long term it will help protect you from illness and boost your performance levels. The improvement in your health comes about not through isolated vitamins or minerals but, sip by sip, through cell regeneration and the stimulation of ATP production.

 mitochondria-activating formula



Convinced? Why not support us?

With MITO, we have created a new and truly valuable addition to the drinks market. But we still have challenges to overcome. In order to communicate MITO's extraordinary benefits, we have to address the lack of awareness among the general public and explain the function and importance of mitochondria.
Our launch campaign, entitled MITO BEGINS, gets across the innovative benefits of the product and is designed for high-frequency roll-out across the channels relevant to the target market.

Initial investments

Our formula is of the highest quality. And the production of MITO is subject to strict regulations. To produce a 60.000-bottle batch we need approximately 50.000 euros.
For the PR campaign explaining mitochondria and for the integrated marketing and communications campaigns we initially need approximately 30,000 euros.  

Your support will help us meet these challenges. For up-to-the-minute developments, see our news blog.

find out more on our homepage

Be there at the start

The perks we offer all have one thing in common: the opportunity to be there at the start.

·  To be the first to try the product

·  To benefit from preferential pricing

·  To be on the task force

·  To take part in a competition


And if you're reading this, you're doubly lucky. The first 1,000 fans of our Facebook page will be able to buy MITO at the special price of two six-packs for the price of one.

All our supporters will be commemorated on our wall of fame.

Spread the word.

Even if you can't support us financially, if you like what you've heard you can still help us by talking about us and spreading our positive message. You can like and share us on our website and Facebook page. Talk about MITO online, at work, at uni, at the gym, at the game, in the check-out queue at the supermarket, at the pub, when you're having your hair cut...

The force behind the scenes

Living healthily means living in harmony with the laws of nature. This is something we often forget in the hectic world we have built for ourselves. Artificial foods, synthetic medication and unnatural flavourings and preservatives should have no role in a healthy lifestyle. Whatever benefits they bring are almost inevitably accompanied by ever-increasing damage to our bodies.

For many years now, the MITO Group has operated under the banner of 'health and performance', enabling us to create a new and unique concept as well as our own highly effective natural products for the full range of mitochondria in our bodies. The philosophy behind the MITOcare product range is 'a return to the ancient laws of nature'. MITOcare products contain only bioidentical natural ingredients and are free of artificial additives. This means that MITOcare does not rely on high-dosage single ingredients but rather low-dosage complex formulations that occur in nature.

Right from the start, thanks to its experience of developing preparations for mitochondrial medicine, the MITO GROUP has been involved in developing 'mitochondria-activating formulas'. MITO drink is the result.

And we will continue to work to ensure our vision becomes a reality.


Find out more on our website

www.mito.de
story_txt:
:: GERMAN VERSION :: (To enjoy the
english text, please scroll down)

MITO - Archetyp einer neuen Getränke-Generation-Der Mitochondrien Drink-Anti Aging für Deine Zellen


Ein rein natürliches Getränk, mit dem Du Deine Leistungsfähigkeit auf gesunde Weise steigerst. Nachhaltig.



Dafür sorgt der einzigartige
mitochondrien-aktivierende Wirkstoffkomplex.
Du willst gesund und aktiv sein und bleiben? Dann
stärke deine Mitochondrien. Entdecke das
Geheimnis von Vitalität, Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit. 
Deine Mitochondrien.





Drei
Aspekte stecken hinter dem Mito Drink und der dauerhaften Steigerung deiner
ganzheitlichen Leistungsfähigkeit:
Unsere Vision
Deine Mitochondrien
Die revolutionäre Innovation 




Unsere Vision -
Leistungssteigerung auf natürliche und gesunde Weise. 
Kranke Gesellschaft
Zu den Krankheiten unserer Zivilisation  -viele davon Ergebnisse der unerbittlichen Leistungsdruckgesellschaft und der zunehmend schlechter werdenden Umweltbedingungen -  zählen neben Herz-Kreislauf-Erkrankungen, Diabetes und Bluthochdruck vor allem auch Burn-out und Depressionen. Wer das Glück hat, sich in München im Burn-out-Diagnostik-Institut behandeln lassen zu können, erhält den kostbaren Vorzug einer individuellen Therapie. Diese umfasst neben den schulmedizinischen Ansätzen auch alternativmedizinische Wege, wie z.B. den der mitochondrialen Medizin.
Gesundheit fördern
Zwei der führenden Mitochondrien-Spezialisten aus Deutschland behandeln ihre Patienten nachhaltig: Mit hochwirksamen Naturstoffprodukten werden die Mitochondrien gezielt aufgebaut. Ganz ohne Chemie und ohne künstliche Stoffe, die der Körper nicht verarbeiten kann. So werden die Beschwerden an der Wurzel gepackt.
Viele Patienten bestätigen eine Verbesserung ihres individuellen Wohlbefindens innerhalb kürzester Zeit. Da werden die labortechnischen Belege der Genesung beinahe nebensächlich. 
Innovative Idee
Doch warum die Menschen erst behandeln, wenn sie krank sind? Viel besser ist es doch, vorhandene Leistungsfähigkeit und Gesundheit auszubauen. 
Wie? Klar, in dem die Menschen ihre Mitochondrien stärken. Auf natürliche Weise und natürlichem Weg: Über ein naturstoffliches Getränk.




Formel für die FlascheMission: Es soll ein "Mitochondrien - aktivierender Wirkstoffkomplex" für ein Getränk der neuen Generation" entwickelt werden. Schritt eins: 2012 Die Ärzte und Spezialisten des Burn-out-Diagnistik-Instituts kontaktierten renommierte Professoren aus dem Bereich der Molekular-Biologie und gewannen sie auf Anhieb für die Idee. Es wurde eine Task Force ins Leben gerufen, die die Vision - Steigerung der zellulären Leistungsfähigkeit für alle Menschen - möglich machen will. Und wird. Schritt zwei: 2013 Intensive Forschungs- und Entwicklungsarbeiten begannen. Begleitet, gestützt und getragen durch zahlreiche Studien. Schließlich gelang es, den Mitochondrien-aktivierenden Wirkstoff zu extrahieren. Ein Meilenstein.
 ----Link HP Studien? Schritt drei: 2014 Konzeption und Design des Getränks starteten unter strengsten Auflagen. Ende 2014 konnte der Wirksoffkomplex in einer speziell aufeinander abgestimmten Komplexmischung aus rein natürlichen und qualitativ hochwertigen Inhaltsstoffen als Getränk - MITO - hergestellt werden. Der Durchbruch.Schritt vier: Heute. Herstellung und Vermarktung von MITO,das Getränk, das Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit gleichermaßen fördert, soll erfolgen. Produktion und Aufklärungsarbeit sind kostenintensiv, die Entwicklungsinvestitionen waren hoch. Somit: Warum das Getränk, das Alle unterstützen kann nicht auch von allen unterstützen lassen? Das Crowdfunding. 
Schritt fünf: Morgen. Die ersten 250.000 Flaschen laufen vom Band. Unsere Marketing- und Aufklärungskampagne überzeugt das Land. MITO hat Euer Leben etwas besser gemacht. Danke.

Deine Mitochondrien - 



Dein Schlüssel zu mehr Gesundheit, Jugend & Leistungsfähigkeit. 

Den
Schlüssel zu Gesundheit, Jugend & Leitungsfähigkeit trägst Du in Dir, in
jeder Deiner Zellen: Deine Mitochondrien. Mitochondrien sind die
Energie-Kraftwerke der Zellen. In jeder menschlichen Zelle befinden
sich zwischen 500 bis 5000 Mitochondrien. Sie bilden den Energiestoff ATP
(Adenosintriphosphat), der für den gesamten Stoffwechsel der Zellen notwendig
ist. ATP entsteht - vereinfacht ausgedrückt - wenn in den Zellen Glukose mit Sauerstoff oxidiert (oxidative
Phosphorylierung), also "verbrannt" wird. Die Verbrennung setzt
Energie frei und wird zu ATP verstoffwechselt. ATP transportiert die Energie
dann dorthin, wo sie benötigt wird. Und das nicht nur für physische
Funktionen. Auch das Nervenkostüm, die Verdauung, die Neubildung von Haaren und
Haut benötigt dieses ATP.


 ATP-Produktion
Somit
logisch: Die leistungsfähigen Zellkraftwerke (Mitochondrien) produzieren das
ATP, das dein gesamter Organismus benötigt. Umgekehrt: wird aufgrund einer mitochondrialen
Störung nicht genügend Energie produziert, funktioniert der Organismus nicht
richtig. Es kommt Sand ins Getriebe, der nach einiger Zeit massive Schäden
anrichtet.
Du kannst dem vorbeugen. Die mitochondriale Leistung Deiner Zellen bestimmt
Deine individuelle Leistungsfähigkeit. Stärke Deine Zellen - bleibe gesund.





Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage





Die revolutionäre Innovation -MITO - "iphone der functional drinks"


Seit ca. 1985 gibt es es portable Telefone, mit denen man ohne Vermittlung telefonieren konnte. Ab 1992 wurden sie zum Produkt für jedermann. Die Revolution fand 2007 statt. Das iphone war der Beginn einer völlig neuen Mobiltelefon-Generation: der Smartphones.
Bei aller Bescheidenheit scheuen wir nicht den Vergleich: MITO ist das iphone der funktionellen Getränke. MITO wird dem Markt der funktionellen Getränke zugeordnet. Hier tummeln sich Getränke mit Zusatznutzen. Ihr kennt sie wohl alle:


Energy Drinks
Iso- Erfrischungen
Vitamingetränke
Mehrfruchtgetränke
Nektar
Teegetränke




Ihr gemeinsames Manko: Sie haben jeweils nur einen Zusatznutzen. Sie sind entweder gesundheits- oder leistungsfördernd. Niemals beides.
Mit MITO ist eine neue Dimension eröffnet worden: gesundheits- und leistungsfördernd.







MITO ist das einzige Getränk, das die Ansprüche an Leistung und Gesundheit kombiniert. 
Du brauchst kurzfristig einen Schub? Trink MITO. Macht wach, aber auf Dauer nicht krank, sondern leistungsfähiger. Die Gesundheitsförderung wird nicht durch isolierte Vitamine oder Mineralien erbracht, sondern durch Zellregeneration und Förderung der ATP-Produktion. Schluck für Schluck.
Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage
MITOCHONDRIEN AKTIVIERENDER WIRKSTOFFKOMPLEX










Überzeugt? Unterstütz uns.



Mit dem MITO haben wir eine neue und wirklich wertvolle Getränke-Dimension geschaffen. Wir haben damit auch neue Herausforderungen zu bewältigen. Um den einzigartigen Mehrwert des MITO zu kommunizieren, müssen wir gleichzeitig das Informationsdefizit der Gesellschaft beseitigen und Aufklärungsarbeit über die Funktion und Wichtigkeit der Mitochondrien leisten. Unsere Markteinführungskampagne "MITO BEGINS" kommuniziert den innovativen Zusatznutzen und soll zur Markteinführung hoch frequentiert in den zielgruppen-relevanten Kommunikationskanälen implementiert werden.


Initiale InvestitionenUnsere Komplexmischung ist qualitativ absolut hochwertig. Die MITO Produktion unterliegt strengen und speziellen Vorgaben. Für eine Produktion von ca. 60.000 Flaschen benötigen wir ca. 50.000 EUR.Für die Aufklärung über Mitochondrien sowie integrierte Marketing - und Kommunikationskampagnen benötigen wir zum Start ca. 30.000 EUR.  

Helft uns durch Eure Unterstützung diese Herausforderungen zu bewältigen. Unser Newsblog hält Euch auf dem Laufenden. 
Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage



Anfänger-Glück


Unsere Perks haben alle eines gemeinsam: Sie lassen Dich von Anbeginn glücklich dabei sein.

Glück, als erstes zu probieren
Glück auf Vorzugspreise
Glück beim Gewinnspiel







Und auch jetzt schon hast Du Glück, weil Du das liest: Die ersten 1000 Fans unserer Facebookseite erhalten MITO zum Vorzugspreis: 2 Six-Packs zum Preis von einem.
Alle unsere Supporter werden auf unserer Wall-of-Fame verewigt.

Bitte weitersagen.
Falls Ihr uns nicht finanziell unterstützen könnt, aber wir Euch überzeugt haben, dann redet über uns. Am besten natürlich Gutes. Liked und teilt uns auf unserer Homepage und Facebook. Sprecht über MITO im Netz, bei der Arbeit, in der Uni, im Fitnessstudio, im Fussballstadion, an der Supermarktkasse, im Biergarten, beim Friseur...  




Wir stehen dahinter


Leben und Gesundheit bedeutet in Einklang mit den Naturgesetzen zu leben. Dies wird in unserer aktuellen, hektischen Zivilisationsgesellschaft häufig vergessen. Künstlich hergestellte Lebensmittel, synthetische Medikamente und unnatürliche Aromastoffe sowie Konservierungsmittel sind mit gesunder Lebensweise nicht zu vereinbaren.  Diese bringen immer seltener ausschließlich Nutzen, sondern rufen immer häufiger erheblichen Schaden im menschlichen Organismus hervor.

Die MITO Group beschäftigt sich seit Jahren mit der Thematik "Gesundheit und Leistungsfähigkeit". Hier wurden ein neu- & einzigartiges Konzept sowie eigene hochwirksame Naturstoffprodukte für die Gesamtheit der Mitochondrien entwickelt. Die Philosophie hinter der MITOcare Produktreihe lautet "Zurückkehren zu uralten Naturgesetzen." MITOcare Produkte enthalten ausschließlich bioidentische Naturstoffe ohne synthetische oder künstliche Zusätze. Dabei verwendet MITOcare keine hochdosierten Einzelstoffe, sondern niedrig dosierte Komplexmischungen, wie sie in der Natur vorkommen.
Aufgrund der Erfahrungen und Entwicklungen von Präparaten für die mitochondriale Medizin, wurde die MITO GROUP von Beginn an in die Entwicklung des "Mitochondrien  - aktivierende Wirkstoffkomplex" und den daraus resultierenden MITO einbezogen.
Wir werden weiter daran arbeiten, unsere Vision Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.
Erfahre mehr auf unserer Homepage 
www.mito.de

::: ENGLISH VERSION :::







MITO – a new generation of drinks is born.

A healthy, purely natural drink that enables long-term performance.
It's all down to the unique mitochondria-activating
formula. 
Want to be healthy and active?
And stay that way? Then give your mitochondria a boost. Discover the secret of
vitality, health and performance. 
The mitochondria.






Mito Drink, and the long-term increase of your overall
performance levels, rely on three key factors:

Our vision


Your mitochondria


A revolutionary innovation 





Our vision -
Enhancing your performance – naturally and healthily
An ailing society
Among the many illnesses our society helps to cause –
many of them due to the relentless pressure to perform and the increasing
degradation of the environment – are cardiovascular diseases, diabetes and high
blood pressure, to name just three. But chief among them are burn-out and
depression. Anyone being treated at Munich's Burn-Out Diagnostic Institute will
have the great advantage of receiving an individualised treatment programme
that includes not just conventional medicine but also alternative therapies
such as those based on mitochondrial medicine. 
Promoting health
At the Institute, two of Germany's leading mitochondria
specialists treat their patients for the long term. Highly effective natural
products are used to target and build up the cells' mitochondria. No chemicals
or other artificial agents are used, as the body cannot process them. In this
way, we address the root cause of the difficulties. 
Many patients report feeling better very quickly. Next
to that, the actual clinical proof of their recovery is almost of secondary
importance. 
An innovative idea
Why wait until people get ill to treat them? Surely it
is far preferable to build up the health and performance levels they already
have.
How? By strengthening their mitochondria. Naturally –
with a drink made from natural ingredients.



A formula that can be bottled
Our
mission is to develop a 'mitochondria-activating formula for a new generation
of drinks'. 
Step
one. In 2012, doctors and specialists at the Burn-Out Diagnostic Institute
contacted prominent figures from the world of molecular biology and immediately
won them over to the idea. A task force was put together. Its aim? To increase
the cellular performance of people everywhere. 
Step
two: In 2013, intensive research and development began, accompanied, supported
and borne out by numerous studies. Then, a milestone: the successful extraction
of the mitochondria-activating agent. 
Step
three: in 2014, the concept and formulation of the drink began under strict
conditions. Then, at the end of 2014, the breakthrough. The formula of active
ingredients could finally be manufactured as a drink – MITO – using a carefully
calibrated mixture of 100% natural and high-quality ingredients.
Step
four. Today the manufacture and marketing of MITO, the drink that promotes both
health and performance, is ready to roll. But manufacture and PR are expensive
and development costs have been high. So then came the idea. Why not let MITO,
the drink that can benefit everyone, be funded by everyone? In other words, by
crowdfunding.
Step
five: tomorrow. The first 250,000 bottles are coming off the production line.
Our marketing and PR campaign is explaining the benefits of MITO to everyone.
MITO has had a positive effect on your life. Thank you.


Your mitochondria
–The
key to better health, feeling younger performing better. 

The key to better health, feeling
younger and performing better lies within you in each and every one of your
cells. In your mitochondria. Mitochondria are the cell's powerhouse. Every
human cell contains somewhere between 500 and 5,000 mitochondria. The
mitochondria build the energy-bearing molecules of adenosine triphosphate (ATP), which is needed by the cell's entire metabolism. Put simply,
ATP is produced when glucose is oxidised, or 'burned' (a process known as oxidative phosphorylation). This combustion releases energy and
is metabolised into ATP. The ATP than transports the energy to where it is
needed. And not just for physical functions. The nervous and digestive systems
and the build-up of new hair and skin all require ATP.

ATP production

So as you can see, the cellular powerhouses
represented by the mitochondria produce the ATP that is needed buy your entire
body. Or put another way, if as a result of mitochondrial defect insufficient
energy is produced, then the body will not function properly. It's like grit
getting into a machine. Over time, it can cause significant damage.
But you can stop this happening. The mitochondrial
performance of your cells determines your individual performance. So give your
cells a boost – and stay healthy. 



find out more on our website

A
revolutionary innovation –
MITO - 'the iPhone of performance drinks'

Portable phones have existed since about 1985. In 1992
they crossed over into the mass market. But it wasn't until 2007 that the
revolution took place. The iPhone was the start a new generation of mobile
phones: the smartphones. 
In all humility, it's a comparison we can make with
confidence: MITO is the iPhone of performance drinks. MITO is part of the 'functional
drinks' market, where there is a whole range of products designed to provide a
specific benefit. No doubt you'll be familiar with some of them:

Energy Drinks
Isotonic drinks
Vitamin drinks
Multi-fruit drinks
Fruit juices
Tea drinks

But all these drinks share the same shortcoming. They
each have just one benefit. They are either
healthy or performance-enhancing.
Never both.
MITO is different. It is both healthy and performance-enhancing. 



find out more on our website
MITO is the only
drink that meets the demand for both health and performance enhancement.  
Need a quick boost? Have a MITO. Its immediate effect
will be to wake you up. But in the long term it will help protect you from
illness and boost your performance levels. The improvement in your health comes
about not through isolated vitamins or minerals but, sip by sip, through cell
regeneration and the stimulation of ATP production.
 mitochondria-activating formula




Convinced?
Why not support us?
With MITO, we have created a new and truly valuable
addition to the drinks market. But we still have challenges to overcome. In
order to communicate MITO's extraordinary benefits, we have to address the lack
of awareness among the general public and explain the function and importance
of mitochondria. 
Our launch campaign, entitled MITO BEGINS, gets across the innovative benefits
of the product and is designed for high-frequency roll-out across the channels
relevant to the target market. 
Initial investments
Our
formula is of the highest quality. And the production of MITO is subject to
strict regulations. To produce a 60.000-bottle batch we need approximately 50.000 euros.
For the PR campaign explaining mitochondria and for the integrated marketing
and communications campaigns we initially need approximately 30,000 euros.  
Your support will help us meet these challenges. For
up-to-the-minute developments, see our news blog. 
find out more on our homepage
Be there at the start
The perks we offer all have one thing in common: the
opportunity to be there at the start.
· 
To be the first to try the
product
· 
To benefit from preferential
pricing
· 
To be on the task force
· 
To take part in a competition




And if you're reading this, you're doubly lucky. The
first 1,000 fans of our Facebook page will be able to buy MITO at the special
price of two six-packs for the price of one. 
All our supporters will be commemorated on our wall of
fame.
Spread the word.
Even
if you can't support us financially, if you like what you've heard you can
still help us by talking about us and spreading our positive message. You can
like and share us on our website and Facebook page. Talk about MITO online, at
work, at uni, at the gym, at the game, in the check-out queue at the
supermarket, at the pub, when you're having your hair cut...
The force
behind the scenes
Living healthily means living in harmony with the laws
of nature. This is something we often forget in the hectic world we have built
for ourselves. Artificial foods, synthetic medication and unnatural flavourings
and preservatives should have no role in a healthy lifestyle. Whatever benefits
they bring are almost inevitably accompanied by ever-increasing damage to our
bodies. 
For many years now, the MITO Group has operated under
the banner of 'health and performance', enabling us to create a new and unique
concept as well as our own highly effective natural products for the full range
of mitochondria in our bodies. The philosophy behind the MITOcare product range
is 'a return to the ancient laws of nature'. MITOcare products contain only
bioidentical natural ingredients and are free of artificial additives. This
means that MITOcare does not rely on high-dosage single ingredients but rather
low-dosage complex formulations that occur in nature.
Right from the start, thanks to its experience of
developing preparations for mitochondrial medicine, the MITO GROUP has been
involved in developing 'mitochondria-activating formulas'. MITO drink is the
result.
And we will continue to work to ensure our vision
becomes a reality.

Find out more on our website
www.mito.de

story:
Help MNHC Reduce Infant Mortality 

by Empowering Mothers

The Marquette Neighborhood Health Center is an intimate clinic dedicated to women’s health care with a specialization in pre-natal care. Our individualized care is unparalleled. MNHC is a place where an hour appointment means you get the whole hour. Each day we work to reduce Milwaukee's infant mortality rate by empowering women with the knowledge they need to have a healthy pregnancy and healthy baby.

One of the unique programs we offer is called CenteringPregnancy.  Under the professional guidance of MNHC’s nurse-midwives, women in the program learn how to practice self-care through taking their own blood pressure and weight along being provided with tools to make healthy choices. The women also enjoy support from fellow expectant mothers. The program is 10 sessions that are two hours long which gives expectant moms an opportunity to share the physical and emotional challenges they are going through along with giving each suggestions about what works well.

"It's really individualized.  You get personal care--it's very one-on-one."                              -CenteringPregnancy Participant

Here's Where You Come In!

Funding is tight and we need your help to fund our next class of CenteringPregnancy. It will take $1,300 to cover the cost of staff time and supplies. If everyone pitches in  $25, $50, $100, or whatever amount you can afford, we can bridge the gap and get the next session off the ground. 

Your Support Means 10 Healthy Moms and Babies

If we meet our fundraising goal, that means 10 more moms can participate in a CenteringPregnancy session. We have a pretty good track record, if you pardon us tooting our own horn! Here are a few statistics about our work:

  • 98% of MNHC's clients have full-term pregnancies (this is 10.5% better than the national average).
  • 7% of MNHC clients deliver by C-section (the national average is 32.8%).
  • 97% of MNHC clients return to the Center for postpartum exams.
"Everyone makes me feel comfortable, and I can talk to them about what I need to." -CenteringPregnancy Participant

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone is able to provide a big financial donation, and that's okay! We still would love your help. Here's what you can do:

  • Share our crowdfunding page--Post/Tweet/email this page to urge others to help us meet our goal.
Sample posts you can use:
Be a part of reducing infant mortality by empowering mothers--support the Marquette Neighborhood Health Center: http://igg.me/at/mnhc

Fight infant mortality in MKE--help the Marquette Neighborhood Health Center http://igg.me/at/mnhc
  • Spread the word-Tell your friends about the awesome work being done at the MNHC. We know we're a hidden gem for holistic pre-natal care, but care of this quality is too good to keep a secret!

story:
Nowadays, we travel more frequently; for business trip, holidays, visit their loved ones and many other reasons. 

The 2 common concerns of many frequent air-travelers are phone battery power and baggage weight.

When one is on the move, it is not easy to find an appropriate place to charge charge the mobile phone during the trip. Another problem is that all, if not most airlines have a limit on the baggage weight and excess baggage is always levied with exorbitant charges.

From that experience of ourselves, we developed AirScale, combining the functions of charging phone battery and luggage scale in a smart and unique way. 

AirScale prepares air-travelers for excess weight problem during airport check-in and it can calibrate weights up to 40kg now. In the LCD screen, you can select either kilograms or pounds to be displayed. 

For charging of mobile phones, AirScale can recharge most mobile phones fully for more than 2 cycles. With a capacity of 5,600mAh consisting of Samsung battery cells, the charging time is 2 times faster than most power banks one find in the market, with currents of 2A (input) and 2.4A (output). 

What also make AirScale unique is its great design. On the front of AirScale, the display window is not visible when not in use and you are greeted with the beautiful black glossy surface. When the device is in use, the numbers, indicating the battery level and weight will come on in red.



Now measure up to 40kgs!
In the early stage of the development, we set the maximum as 30kgs. We worked really hard and now AirScale can calibrate up to 40kgs! Yeah!



Most charging batteries in the market mostly have 1A input current.
AirScale has 2A input current so the recharging time is two time faster.



AirScale charged mobile phone at 2.4A output current.
That means the charging speed becomes the maximum especially for large screen phones or iPads(tablets)

AirScale has large capacity battery capacity to charge mobile phone and we use the best quality battery cells from Samsung SDI.
      AirScale : 5200mAh
      iPhone5 : 1560mAh
      iPhone6 : 1980mAh
      GalaxyS6 : 2550mAh



Need Pound(lb)? Don’t worry.
AirScale gives display option of kilograms and pounds.



Precision
AirScale can read by 100g of weight
AirScale can read by 1% of battery level accuracy
 


You will get

  1. Discount : Your perk deserves 30~40% discount from the official price($59.9)
  2. July Shipment : We will ship by July so that you can bring out duringyour summer holiday
  3. Get earliest : Official retain distribution will starts from September. 

What we need

  • We need your help sharing the news of airScale.  More backers will helps us to return the favour with additional stretch goals.



We will start to ship from the middle of July.


 

We are participating Mobile Electronics Fair in Hong Kong in April.
Please visit and cheer us.


Exhibition : Global Sources Mobile Electronics Fair  
Date : April 18~21 2015
Venue : Asia World Expo, Hong Kong (Next to Hong Hong International Airport)
Company : Lettrino Limited 


More convenient, more fun.

Our team "Lettrino limited" was started from the idea

We have a strong technical background in developing solutions and manufacturing consumer electronic devices. Then we realized the improvement of convenience with travel gadgets are stagnant for years while usual consumer gadgets are evolving in a great speed.   So we set our mission to develop “high-tech travel gadgets” to give more convenience and fun to travelers.

AirScale is the world-first product that combines a mobile battery charger and luggage scale into the sleek design. AirScale gives more give more convenience to air travelers.  

Lettrino will communicate close with users and improve our travel life together, so we all enjoy our travel.



We have already solved most of the development issues.
Scale sensor types were changed once and improved once, then we managed to achieve 40kg calibration.

We are also trying "white color" of AirScale but we have transparency issue with LCD display at the moment.  So we will produce "black color" of AirScale  in this campaign to ensure the quality and nice look.



  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Your support of spreading this news will make us enable to set further stretch goals to offer more benefits to backers.

The 2 common concerns of many frequent air-travelers are phone battery power and baggage weight.
When one is on the move, it is not easy to find an appropriate place to charge charge the mobile phone during the trip. Another problem is that all, if not most airlines have a limit on the baggage weight and excess baggage is always levied with exorbitant charges.

story:
Feeling alone isn't the only concern for families living with Dyskeratosis Congenita & Telomere Biology Disorders. Clinging to hope that we not only find a diagnosis, but that we find it in time and get to a doctor that understands this rare disease consumes our daily lives. Hope for the future, hope for our loved ones, and hope for a cure keeps us going. Please donate and help us get these guidelines into the hands of our families and doctors so that we may continue to at least have hope for another tomorrow. 

  • Dyskeratosis Congenita (DC) and Telomere Biology Disorders (TBD) are a devastating and extremely rare disease with severe, and often fatal, symptoms.  It attacks people of any age, but occurs more frequently in children, resulting in an average mortality age of 16.  It can affect almost every system in the body, causing bone marrow failure, pulmonary fibrosis, liver problems, susceptibility to various cancers, and a host of other serious issues.  Its symptoms often masquerade as other illnesses, and because it is so rare, most doctors have never seen a case; this often leads to misdiagnosis and mistreatment, with sometimes disastrous consequences.  For this reason, Dyskeratosis Congenita Outreach - an all volunteer nonprofit organization formed to support patients and families with DC/TBD and educate the medical community - has undertaken the creation of a Clinical Guideline for the diagnosis and treatment and management of the disease.  This document will be written by the foremost international medical experts on DC/TBD in every area of specialization, and both published in hard-copy form and made available on our website as a resource for doctors and patients alike all over the world. We already have the talent lined up, what we need now is your help. Because DC/TBD is so rare, the pool of affected families from which we draw donations is very small, so we must rely on the kindness and generosity of people like you to help make this life-saving endeavor a reality.  

For more information, please visit www.dcoutreach.org

  • Listed below are the chapters in the first edition guideline book for DC/TBD:
Introduction: The History of DC/TBD
Why Telomeres Are Important
Diagnosing DC/TBD
Genetics of DC/TBD
Subtypes of DC: Telomere Biology Disorders
Medical Management of Bone Marrow Failure in DC
Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation in DC
Immunologic Complications in DC
Management of Skin and Nail Manifestations
Ophthalmologic Complications
Dental and Head/Neck Complications in DC
Endocrine System and Bony Complications
Pulmonary Manifestations
Gastrointestinal Complications
Hepatic Complications
Genitourinary
Gynecological Manifestations
Neuropsychiatric Complications
Cancer in DC
Psychological and Social considerations
Transitioning from pediatric to adult medical care
Genetic Counseling for Families
Advocacy for yourself
The Role of DC Outreach
Resources
Glossary

story:
Circulo de salud, es una organización sin fines de lucro que surgio como una idea para ayudar a personas de pocos recursos en la Republica Dominicana. En los ultimos 5 años hemos llevado a cabo varios proyectos de manera exitosa, como la repartición de medicamentos escenciales y atención primaria en comunidades pobres de Republica Dominicana, donde el acceso a los servicios de salud son limitados. Con esta accción pretendemos registrar el Circulo de Salud de manera oficial como Organización no gubernamental con presencia activa tanto en la Republica Dominicana como en Alemania y así poder iniciar nuevos proyectos y ampliar nuestro campo de acción en beneficio de los más necesitados

Circle of Health is a nonprofit organization that emerged as an idea to help low-income people in the Dominican Republic. In the last five years we have carried out several projects successfully, such as the distribution of essential drugs and primary care in poor communities in the Dominican Republic, where access to health services is limited. With this longline action we want to register the Circle of Health officially as an NGO with active presence in the Dominican Republic and Germany and to initiate new projects and expand our field of action to benefit the needy

Der Gesundheitskreis ist eine gemeinnützige Organisation, die als Idee entstanden ist, um Menschen mit niedrigem Einkommen in der Dominikanischen Republik zu helfen. In den letzten fünf Jahren haben wir mehrere Projekte erfolgreich durchgeführt, wie beispielsweise die Verteilung von lebenswichtigen Medikamenten und medizinischen Grundversorgung in armen Gemeinden in der Dominikanischen Republik, wo der Zugang zu Gesundheitsleistungen begrenzt ist. Mit dieser Aktion möchte der Gesundheitskreis offiziell als NGO mit aktiver Präsenz in der Dominikanischen und in Deutschland registriert werden und neue Projekte zu initiieren und unser Tätigkeitsfeld zu erweitern , damit wir armen Menschen weiter helfen können.

Mit dieser Aktion möchte der Gesundheitskreis offiziell als NGO mit aktiver Präsenz in der Dominikanischen und in Deutschland registriert werden und neue Projekte zu initiieren und unser Tätigkeitsfeld zu erweitern , damit wir armen Menschen weiter helfen können.

story:
What would your skin say if it could talk?

Our skin actually has a lot to say and if you know how to listen, you might be surprised...like I was in the beginning.  Oddly enough, this is how I spent twenty plus years...listening to skin.  Yep.  I mean I did other things, too (check out my profile bio) but as an obsessed aromatherapist and licensed aesthetician, I’ve earned a black belt.

Folks, I'm ready for a bigger pot.  Please help me launch my very own, professional grade, skin care line to share with weary, lost & jaded skin.   I've solved my own skin problems along with my clients' by stepping out of the box and tossing the cookie cutters.

I specialize in restoring skin using patented, stabilized, bio-available, dermal nutrients.  In practical terms, this is like tacos for your skin.  The absorption and metabolization of these nutrients cause an increase in cell turnover that has the power to resurface our skin.  In short, this is a Send Food Not Bombs approach.

Skin Harmonics has the joy of a hummingbird, the unstoppable persistence of worker ants, the heart of an elephant, and the lungs of a whale, and it needs YOU... a heroic army of angels, warriors, giants, avatars and unicorns!

Your good faith purchase will allow me to buy the final few, expensive, highest quality ingredients on my list.  It will also keep me from becoming a plastic pig when it comes to the packaging. 

Your adventurous generosity will plop you into my tight, intimate and small band of savvy clients who are on the front edge of reclaiming clean beauty whilst transforming their skin.

To help guide you through the skincare maze, I wrote you a book: The Story of Skin & The New Way.  I glued myself to my zafu for several weeks and all of the words just came tumbling out.  I then chased them around my living room and caught them in eco-friendly glass jars and arranged them in a book (the pdf of which is included with every custom starter set).

I only need to move 600 Custom Starter Sets to meet my goal, but anything sold will help!  Sessions will be available in these three beautiful locations:  Boulder, CO; Santa Barbara, CA; & Austin, TX.  

Sessions and phone consults will expire in one year, and January ship dates will be delayed if I flop this goal as I will have to drag my sorry butt to Bank of America or some evil empire of that sort.  If you work at Bank of America, I'm referring to the establishment - not wonderful you.

Yours truly, with love and warm hands,

Danny

P.S.: "Shoot for the moon, even if you miss, you'll land among the stars."   ~ Les Brown

story:
We've done our first campaign for the AIRY pot on Kickstarter just a year ago - and it was a huge success. Since our official launch this January we've shipped nearly 20.000 AIRY pots in more than 50 countries! In the picture above you can see the AIRY pot on the right hand side. He is still available in 16 colours via Amazon or our website. 

Now we're introducing our next product: AIRY box. The AIRY box comes with a width of 50cm and is not just for one plant, but for two or three. As a result you will get much more fresh air by one AIRY system! 

And while the picture above is still a rendering, we've made a fotoshooting with our prototype in various settings, like this beautiful kitchen: 

But let us give you some more informations about the problem and our solution first. 

Plastics, construction material, carpets, furniture and even your clothes contain environmental pollutants and toxines which are evaporating into the air over time. 

With every breath these substances get into your body and make you sick.

You cannot see those toxines in the air you breath - but they are always there. Did you know that the air in your home or in your office is up to eight times more polluted than the air right next to a main street? 

You can find some 30 plants worldwide, which are capable to convert pollutants into nutritions without any residue. This process only happens to a small degree in the leafs of those plants – this effect is happening in the roots!

A key requirement: the roots must be able to breath.

Do you know a plant pot, that ventilates the roots of your plants and lets them breath?

Neither do we. And therefore we re-invented the plant pot.

 

The concept of AIRY bases on various scientific studies (especially NASA), which proof that plants can clean the in-door air from pollutants (more informations in "background" below).

Beside this the AIRY box delivers some more unique benefits for you. It's not only a well designed accessory, it also keeps 3,2 liters of water. The watering interval can be reduced to only every two to three weeks.

At the same time, AIRY provides the plant with ideal conditions to grow. With AIRY, ANY plant will grow magnificently through ideal care.

Compared to plants in ordinary pots, AIRY plants grow bigger and appear much healthier.

As you can see, AIRY box comes with a "green thumb".

If you don't know which plants fits best for you: Every packaging includes our book "Air up your Life" (printed version in english and german). If you want to get the book only, please back for it. But you can get a free download (PDF) in different languages as well: german, english, spanish, french. 

 

According to WHO 11,6% of global deaths in 2012 are associated with indoor and outdoor air pollution. Indoor air pollution has a larger share of 3.5 millions deaths a year (6.5 in total).  

Several scientific studies (University of Peking, the german TÜV Nord, EPEA Umweltinstitut) confirm the effectiveness of the AIRY system. You can see and download all these documents here. By the way: "pollusan" was the name of the last prototype before we renamed it in AIRY. 

Our current AIRY system (the AIRY pot) has been tested by the very well-known Fraunhofer Institute. The results are simply amazing. You can find the test report for download in englishand german. 

A brief insight in how air-filtering houseplants work you can find in the "garden blog" by Connor MacDonald.

More information about the "sick building syndrome" or "toxic home effect" you may find on Wikipedia.

The original "study of interior landscape plants for indoor air pollution abatement" was made by NASA.

AIRY has won several awards, among others the Red Dot Design Award 2016 and the German Design Award 2017. 

AIRY is supporting "Klimapatenschaft", a german based organization for managing "green logistics". As a first step our shippings are carbon-neutral. More information you can find here (in german). 

AIRY is protected by various international patents, i.e. in the U.S. (US 7237357), the EU (EP 1377154 A1 and EP 1951027 B1) or Germany (DE 112005002870 B4).

AIRY has been featured on

One plant in an AIRY is up to 8 times more effective than a plant in a usual plant pot in purifying your indoor air from bad smell, fine dust and pollutants like volatile organic compounds (Benzene, Toluene, Formaldehyde or Ammonia) - although it doesn't soil, doesn't need power and there is no filter to change!

 

AIRY guarantees for your home or workplace

  • lowest maintenance and care for your plants, through a water tank of 3,2 liters. 
  • perfect growth of your plants – even if you're lacking a „green thumb“. 
  • you can feel the fresher, healthier air around you!

 

Your reward as a backer of our campaign is the AIRY box. We will deliver the AIRY box in the following dimension:

That fits perfect for two or three air purifying plants. In our AIRY book (which is included in every package) we will give you an overview of the best fitting plants. 

That's all included in our packaging:

  • Your AIRY box in the colour you have chosen. 
  • Water level indicator. 
  • Installation instruction. 
  • Our AIRY book in german and in english (100 pages with all you have to know about air purifying plants) 
  • Two packages (1,6 liters each) of mineral substrate. You will need this substrate as a drainage layer, so that the plant is not directly in connection with the water supply of your AIRY box.

Please note: Our packaging does not include the plant(s) and you have to buy some more soil or mineral substrate (round about 10 liters). 

If you need advice how to plant an AIRY, this video from one of our customers from Finland may be helpful for you (though the tutorial is made for our first product, the AIRY pot). 

Our team is driven by the desire and passion of finding a solution for indoor pollution, which is one of the biggest threats of our time.

But our team includes not only humans. The main job of purifying the air is done by the plants. If you just want to know, which plant is the best for you: Please pledge our AIRY book and you will receive all necessary information. The book is also included in every single AIRY packaging.

 

We hope to start production of the AIRY box at the end of this year. Then we will send out all rewards to our backers all over Europe and Asia directly. 

For our backers in North America we have to send a container to our warehouse in Orlando (Florida) first to lower shipping costs. Therefore we need some more time (approximately February 2017). 

We will keep you informed about our progress in production and shipping via the "Update" section.  

Concerning shipping costs: We decided to work with DPD, a partner who stands for quality and the best pricing possible. Nevertheless shipping an item of nearly 7 kilograms (incl. book and mineral substrate) is not the same as sending a postcard...

Here you can see our first prototype:
