As a result you will get much more fresh air by one AIRY system! And while the picture above is still a rendering, we've made a fotoshooting with our prototype in various settings, like this beautiful kitchen: But let us give you some more informations about the problem and our solution first. Plastics, construction material, carpets, furniture and even your clothes contain environmental pollutants and toxines which are evaporating into the air over time. With every breath these substances get into your body and make you sick.You cannot see those toxines in the air you breath - but they are always there. Did you know that the air in your home or in your office is up to eight times more polluted than the air right next to a main street? You can find some 30 plants worldwide, which are capable to convert pollutants into nutritions without any residue. This process only happens to a small degree in the leafs of those plants – this effect is happening in the roots!A key requirement: the roots must be able to breath.Do you know a plant pot, that ventilates the roots of your plants and lets them breath?Neither do we. And therefore we re-invented the plant pot. The concept of AIRY bases on various scientific studies (especially NASA), which proof that plants can clean the in-door air from pollutants (more informations in "background" below).Beside this the AIRY box delivers some more unique benefits for you. It's not only a well designed accessory, it also keeps 3,2 liters of water. The watering interval can be reduced to only every two to three weeks.At the same time, AIRY provides the plant with ideal conditions to grow. With AIRY, ANY plant will grow magnificently through ideal care.Compared to plants in ordinary pots, AIRY plants grow bigger and appear much healthier.As you can see, AIRY box comes with a "green thumb".If you don't know which plants fits best for you: Every packaging includes our book "Air up your Life" (printed version in english and german). If you want to get the book only, please back for it. But you can get a free download (PDF) in different languages as well: german, english, spanish, french.  According to WHO 11,6% of global deaths in 2012 are associated with indoor and outdoor air pollution. Indoor air pollution has a larger share of 3.5 millions deaths a year (6.5 in total).  Several scientific studies (University of Peking, the german TÜV Nord, EPEA Umweltinstitut) confirm the effectiveness of the AIRY system. You can see and download all these documents here. By the way: "pollusan" was the name of the last prototype before we renamed it in AIRY. Our current AIRY system (the AIRY pot) has been tested by the very well-known Fraunhofer Institute. The results are simply amazing. You can find the test report for download in englishand german. A brief insight in how air-filtering houseplants work you can find in the "garden blog" by Connor MacDonald.More information about the "sick building syndrome" or "toxic home effect" you may find on Wikipedia.The original "study of interior landscape plants for indoor air pollution abatement" was made by NASA.AIRY has won several awards, among others the Red Dot Design Award 2016 and the German Design Award 2017. AIRY is supporting "Klimapatenschaft", a german based organization for managing "green logistics". As a first step our shippings are carbon-neutral. More information you can find here (in german). AIRY is protected by various international patents, i.e. in the U.S. (US 7237357), the EU (EP 1377154 A1 and EP 1951027 B1) or Germany (DE 112005002870 B4).AIRY has been featured onOne plant in an AIRY is up to 8 times more effective than a plant in a usual plant pot in purifying your indoor air from bad smell, fine dust and pollutants like volatile organic compounds (Benzene, Toluene, Formaldehyde or Ammonia) - although it doesn't soil, doesn't need power and there is no filter to change! AIRY guarantees for your home or workplace
lowest maintenance and care for your plants, through a water tank of 3,2 liters. 
perfect growth of your plants – even if you're lacking a „green thumb“. 
you can feel the fresher, healthier air around you!
 Your reward as a backer of our campaign is the AIRY box. We will deliver the AIRY box in the following dimension:That fits perfect for two or three air purifying plants. In our AIRY book (which is included in every package) we will give you an overview of the best fitting plants. That's all included in our packaging:
Your AIRY box in the colour you have chosen. 
Water level indicator. 
Installation instruction. 
Our AIRY book in german and in english (100 pages with all you have to know about air purifying plants) 
Two packages (1,6 liters each) of mineral substrate. You will need this substrate as a drainage layer, so that the plant is not directly in connection with the water supply of your AIRY box.
Please note: Our packaging does not include the plant(s) and you have to buy some more soil or mineral substrate (round about 10 liters). If you need advice how to plant an AIRY, this video from one of our customers from Finland may be helpful for you (though the tutorial is made for our first product, the AIRY pot). Our team is driven by the desire and passion of finding a solution for indoor pollution, which is one of the biggest threats of our time.But our team includes not only humans. The main job of purifying the air is done by the plants. If you just want to know, which plant is the best for you: Please pledge our AIRY book and you will receive all necessary information. The book is also included in every single AIRY packaging. We hope to start production of the AIRY box at the end of this year. Then we will send out all rewards to our backers all over Europe and Asia directly. For our backers in North America we have to send a container to our warehouse in Orlando (Florida) first to lower shipping costs. Therefore we need some more time (approximately February 2017). We will keep you informed about our progress in production and shipping via the "Update" section.  Concerning shipping costs: We decided to work with DPD, a partner who stands for quality and the best pricing possible. Nevertheless shipping an item of nearly 7 kilograms (incl. book and mineral substrate) is not the same as sending a postcard...Here you can see our first prototype:

story:
******************

Hey Kids... Pay NO ATTENTION to the funding numbers above! Direct sales via our website pushed us WAY BEYOND our initial goal! 

gFood+ orders are SHIPPING NOW! And Chef Amanda has just finished prepping new packs of delicious, convenient, and nutritious gFood+ for our big-order customers! If you want to place a new order, click here…

Order gFood+

... and give us your deets. We’ll contact you directly. New orders go into our system and are filled when our standing orders have been completed. Turnaround is currently 30 days. Thanks for supporting gFood+! 

******************

gFood+

Imagine a whole meal that provides complete nutrition, is healthy, and tastes good. Now imagine that you can prepare it in 90 seconds! gFood+ is an innovative super-fast food that comes in one pouch… mix with water and drink. ALL vegetarian. NO artificial colors, NO artificial flavors, NO preservatives. And it’s yummy! Really!

We have four awesome flavors: chocolate, churro, pineapple-coconut, and mocha… MMmmmmmm!!! And we have more flavors in development!
story_txt:
******************

Hey Kids... Pay NO ATTENTION to the funding numbers above! Direct sales via our website pushed us WAY BEYOND our initial goal! gFood+ orders are SHIPPING NOW! And Chef Amanda has just finished prepping new packs of delicious, convenient, and nutritious gFood+ for our big-order customers! If you want to place a new order, click here…Order gFood+... and give us your deets. We’ll contact you directly. New orders go into our system and are filled when our standing orders have been completed. Turnaround is currently 30 days. Thanks for supporting gFood+! ******************
gFood+

Imagine
a whole meal that provides complete nutrition, is healthy, and tastes good. Now
imagine that you can prepare it in 90 seconds! gFood+ is an innovative
super-fast food that comes in one pouch… mix with water and drink. ALL
vegetarian. NO artificial colors, NO artificial flavors, NO preservatives. And
it’s yummy! Really!We have four awesome flavors: chocolate, churro, pineapple-coconut, and mocha… MMmmmmmm!!! And we have more flavors in development!



gFood+ provides
complete nutrition in 4 meals per day, 100% of the U.S. RDI, so it can be a
single source of food, or used in rotation with other foods (see our nutrition
label at the bottom).
Of
course, we LOVE restaurants, we LOVE pizza, pad Thai, and chocolate bars.
But gFood+ is faster, less expensive, and healthier
than most other food options. No processed sugar, high fructose corn syrup,
grease, deep-fried breading, guilt, bloating, sugar crashes, or uber-calorie
waistline shock.




What’s in gFood+?

Only food goes into gFood+, only ingredients that are meant to be eaten.
Our main ingredients are corn masa, whey protein, a touch of soybean oil, and our unique mix of natural flavors and nutrients, all sweetened with agave.
Each pack contains 500 calories. Four packs provide a standard diet of 2,000 calories.
True story... When we first tasted our Chef Amanda's delicious gFood+ recipes, one of our founders was so pleased and impressed that he shed a few tears. Real chocolate, real cinnamon, our pineapple flavor is made with real pineapple and coconut. Our "secret recipe" is having an amazing chef with 14 years of experience. She knows how to use natural ingredients to create tasty and nutritious food.



Better than Soylent!


gFood+ was developed as a tasty, less
expensive, and easier-to-prepare alternative to the current market leader in
this category, Soylent, which has no flavor and is made from oats, which causes
some consumers to develop gas. gFood+ is made from corn, and is
easier to digest.
How INEXPENSIVE?


gFood+ costs LESS than $1.99 per meal, less than $7.96 per day when you buy a 10-day supply. And our prices go even lower when you buy more (check out the perks on this page). That’s WAY LOWER than other instant products in our category like Soylent. For
example, a 28-day supply of Soylent costs $300 (which includes shipping). gFood+
costs only $250 for a full 30-day supply (which includes shipping). Soylent
takes 4-5 months to deliver new orders. In contrast gFood+ delivers one-day
packs in 3-5 days, and bulk orders deliver in 90 days.
And of course, compared to products out of our category, we’re so much better than salty MSG noodles in a plastic cup.

Why Are We Crowdfunding?

gFood+ exists and is
distributed today. So we're not a "concept", but we have very limited
production runs. Our products are not yet in stores, and they’re not available
online except through Indiegogo. So we need YOU and your order to help us
reach these larger markets. Our company CAN’T move forward without you! Here’s
one practical example... gFood+ contains natural ingredients
and NO space-age chemicals, but our current package is silver. Sturdy, yes, but
the aesthetic truth is that we should change our package color to better
represent our awesome ingredients. We need capital to do that, to expand and
improve in many other ways ranging from bulk purchases to retail marketing. YOU
can help us do that. 
Try gFood+, and help us bring super-fast, inexpensive, healthy food to everyone!
Who Are You Guys?
Our gFood+ team is small, but mighty. 
Rob Calianno, our CEO, is an expert on the subject of
food-related consumer packaged goods. He was VP of Sales for Anheuser-Busch
snack division managing over 70% of the U.S. market. He also spent over 10
years at Frito-Lay working in operations, sales, trade marketing, and strategic
planning.
Amanda Robledo, our head chef, has 14 years of experience
working as a pastry chef in hotel kitchens, bakeries, and food-related
companies across the United States.
Our team also includes three specialists who handle
operations, marketing, media, and advertising, and we have a corporate
attorney. That’s it, for now. But we hope to grow.
Risks and Challenges

Frankly,
the risks are minimal. As we mentioned above, gFood+ exists
today. We ship four packs NOW to anyone who orders. Beyond that, we expect to
ship larger gFood+ orders beginning March 30, 2015. That’s
faster and sooner than our only significant competitor in this category,
Soylent. They take 4-5 months to ship new orders, and they have NO flavors…
literally they’re tasteless. We taste better, and we're less expensive.
That’s
our story. gFood+ needs you. Please try gFood+!
 



FAQ: Odds and Ends
Is gFood+ satisfying?
Yes, gFood+ fills you up and stops your
hunger without leaving you feeling bloated. And it tastes good!
Can I use gFood+ as my sole source of food?
Four servings of gFood+ contain 2,000 calories and
provide 100% or more of the US RDI for every essential nutrient. So yes, gFood+
can be used as a single source of food. Of course, many people use gFood+
as part of a larger diet. Either way, gFood+ provides balanced nutrition.
Can I mix gFood+ with something other than water,
such as soy milk, or add ingredients like bananas?
Yes, but keep in mind that mixing gFood+ with ingredients
other than water will increase calories.
Is gFood+ a vegetarian food?
Yes. gFood+ is completely vegetarian. One
of our ingredients is whey protein, derived from milk, so it’s not vegan.
Does gFood+ contain artificial colors or
artificial flavors?
No. gFood+ contains no artificial
colors, no artificial flavors, and no preservatives. All our flavors are
natural.

Will
you really ship four (4) packs of gFood+ to me in 3-5 days? 
Yes. Just click one of the perks above. Please add two days at the front end to process your order.

How is gFood+ sweetened?
gFood+ is sweetened with agave syrup.
Here’s our current nutritional label.
gFood+ is yummy. Try some today!

story:
What We Need

From daily & weekly maintenance to annual painting and repairs, the gym requires a lot of behind the scenes work to keep the routes fresh and the environment safe. We first upgraded the floors about 3 years ago and the time has come again.

We're asking for your help to redo and upgrade our landing areas.  Here's what we need;

New vinyl covering. Drag mats, carpet-bonded foam and polyfoam.

What You Get

Our sincere gratitude and a high five when we see you at the gym!  And...

Expanded and improved landing areas throughout the gym

Better bouldering problems to make you climb better and stronger

Savings from the sweet deals tied to your contribution!

The satisfaction of knowing you've contributed to building and fostering the Savannah climbing community!

The Impact

The CoOp keeps getting better and better.  You've seen it.  This is just another way we're improving our little gym.  This will improve the quality of our problems and provide the safest possible landing areas in the gym.  We'll be able expand the polyfoam flooring to the castle wall and add carpet bonded foam throughout the gym.  This means a thicker, even landing surface throughout the gym that will require less reliance on outdoor crash pads. (This also means we'll have more crashpads available for members to take out on real rock.) And if we have any extra $ to spare, we'll invest it in new rental shoes and holds.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you don't have a buck to spare.  No worries!  You can still help:

Share this campaign via your social networks.

Like us on Facebook

Thanks Folks!

Douglas

Savannah Climbing CoOp

story:
Short Summary

Sacred Body Community Yoga and Healing Arts Center's Campaign is about providing a center in the heart of the city for the heart of the community.  Our vision is to provide a space that offers multiple modalities of holistic healing therapies, massage, bodywork, intuitive guidance counseling, energy therapies, nutritional counseling, sustainable green energy education, alternative medicine, and the like at an affordable price. It is also part of our vision to host a Donation Based Yoga Studio with classes ranging from traditional Yoga to martial arts, mediation, sound and movement, dance, and workshops for everyone from youth to seniors. We will have a Donation-Based Meeting room that anyone may “rent” out for any community projects, support groups, educational talks, workshops, or meetings.

It is our goal to make health, wellness and healing accessible to everyone of every age, belief system, and income bracket in our community. Our Long Term Goal is to create a grass roots movement that provides the structure and support to create a "Sacred Body Community Yoga and Healing Arts Center' in every city across the United States making the holistic healing arts an accessible part of every life for the raising of the consciousness of the people toward the knowing that every heart, mind, and body is Sacred, especially their own!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are renting the entire second floor of a Space in the heart of Downtown Ann Arbor across from Central Campus University of Michigan. We need to raise at least $24,000 in funds to start up for the following purposes:

  • Pay Rent for the Space
  • Maintenance on the space
  • Flooring
  • Sinks
  • Art
  • Computers
  • Massage Tables
  • Washer/Dryer
  • Sheets
  • Supplies
  • Yoga Mats
  • Yoga accessories
  • signs and flyers
  • Furniture
  • Decor
  • equipment
  • Advertising and making our cause known

We also need Funds to pay people who are working to organize the space and business plan so they may put full time commitment into this project.

Perks

As a Contributor you will be a valuable part of our Community Healing Arts Center and we will gift to you a yoga class for a small donation or, for a more generous contribution, 50%  off the price of any 1 hour massage or healing modality of your choice with the practitioner of your choice! This is a sweet deal!


Where do my funds go?


All Funds go toward the start-up of the Community Healing Arts Center toward the specific categories listed above.

The Impact

We ask you to sit in silence and listen to your own heartbeat. Our generation is crying out for a better way. We are located in the heart one of the most world renowned medical research facilities, University of Michigan. It is our goal to partner with the hospitals, children’s hospitals and cancer centers to provide hope, support, education and alternative therapies to people who are afflicted by physical, emotional, or mental disease who would not otherwise have a way to afford or connect with holistic medicine or yoga classes.

1 in 3 students are on some form of pharmaceutical drug or self-medication for anxiety and depression. It is our goal to provide a Holistic community of positive support where students may receive life coaching and skills to grow and evolve on their path of Education, Love and Prosperity. It is essential that this is accessible to everyone of every income bracket. If you can pay, come, if you can't pay, come. Our doors are open to all. We can only do this with your support!

We all need this, I need this, you need this! Every Community needs this! We can make this happen!

Long Term Goals

It begins here in Ann Arbor. It is our goal to lay a solid foundation in the form of a structured business plan that can be picked up and copied by every city in the United States and the world. This is our grassroots campaign to spread awareness, health, healing, unity, evolution, education, mind-body connection and love-based spirituality to a nation in need of a better way.

We have the better way! Help us pave this road for a better world. IT BEGINS HERE AND NOW WITH YOU!

One person has more of an impact than one might believe. Believe it. Be the change you want to see in the world. It is all possible. Create a better way for you and everyone to experience health, vitality, and support without financial obligations or limitations in your own community.

IT IS THIS EASY:

If just 2,400 people of the 47,000 students that attend University of Michigan donated $10 to the  Community Healing Arts Center instead of to 1 alcoholic beverage this Saturday night, we could meet our goal of providing health and vitality to the entire community!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have any money. But still want to help? Here are some other ways to contribute:

  • Get the word out and make some noise! Please share this cause with anyone who may be interested in creating this miracle. Send this email out to all you and your friends email lists, facebook and any other media you can think of.
  • Have anything in your basement that you would like to donate to us? Dust it off and contact us to see if we can use it!
  • We will be needing volunteers of all kinds to help with this project.
  • We are also looking for holistic health practitioners and educators of all kinds, yoga teachers, dance teachers, artists, musicians, business developers and anyone who would like to be involved in our community center- please contact us! We need your love, support, and are dedicated to connecting you with the people who need you the most.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And thats all there is to it.

Get the word out and make some noise! Please share this cause with anyone who may be interested in creating this miracle. Send this email out to all you and your friends email lists, facebook and any other media you can think of.
Have anything in your basement that you would like to donate to us? Dust it off and contact us to see if we can use it!
We will be needing volunteers of all kinds to help with this project.
We are also looking for holistic health practitioners and educators of all kinds, yoga teachers, dance teachers, artists, musicians, business developers and anyone who would like to be involved in our community center- please contact us! We need your love, support, and are dedicated to connecting you with the people who need you the most.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
First off, thank you from the bottom of my heart for considering helping Rhys out.

As many of your know Rhys has been physically transitioning his gender for some time now. He began taking testosterone on May 23, 2012. Many changes in his voice, body hair, facial structure and body fat distribution have jumpstarted his transition.

Many transgender people experience what has been labeled as dysphonia. Dysphoria is the feeling that aspects of one’s body "isn't right" - that it feels wrong, that is should be something else, or it makes that person extremely uncomfortable. In many ways, gender dysphonia describes a person's relationship with their body and frames their experience in our world. For Rhys this is very true when it comes to his chest.

Rhys binds every day. The binder is very tight. It restricts movement. It gives him severe rashes on his underarms. The binder causes him to be very hot in the summer, often times unbearably so. Sometimes his dysphonia is so emotionally painful that he needs to wear his binder to bed to feel comfortable but this makes getting comfortable physically very hard.

Rhys and I have been working for months to find a way to pay for top surgery as soon as possible to end this aspect of his physical and emotional discomfort. Over the last few days we made the plan of withdrawing money from my 401K to cover the surgery. As we have experienced before, our hopes soared. It looked like it was happening. He scheduled a presurgery appointment with the surgeon in Philly, Dr. Rumer, which we have carefully selected for many reasons.

Then this morning I learned that I can only withdraw half of the funds that I thought I have access to. Friends and family- I NEED HELP to make this happen for the love of my life. Yesterday as we thought things were coming together to pay for and schedule the surgery he was lighter than I have seen him in a while. He was talking about the hope and the new beginning that this surgery will provide him with. I will do everything I can to have that NOT be snatched away from him.

Please help with whatever funds you can. I will have a thank you and congratulations party after surgery when he is ready to celebrate.

With all my love, Crystal

story:
Mujeres Ayudando Madres’, Women Assisting Mothers (MAM), a Puerto Rican based non-profit organization devoted to promoting maternal health in the community. MAM is a grassroots based entity that seeks to provide services in the maternal period through prenatal & postnatal education, conferences, continued education, and direct assistance to mothers.


Founded in 2007 by Vanessa Caldari, midwife, and community organizer, MAM is a branch of the Sisterhood of Midwives of Puerto Rico (HPPR) and is the Puerto Rican representative of the Latin American and Caribbean Network for the Humanization of Labor and Birth.

 MAM’S MISSION

 

Promote concrete changes in public policies that help in the creation of empowerment and

sustainable development of the mothers and families.


Create consciousness and awareness in the communities with regards to the maternal process.


Inform and educate on the evidence based research that defines birthing best practices as stated by

the World Health Organization.


Educate in parenting, family planning and prevention of sexually transmitted infections.


Reduce the incidence of cesarean birth which is at 47% in Puerto Rico one of the highest in the world.


Educate and reduce premature births; PR has highest rates within the USA.


Promote, educate and support the benefits of breastfeeding.


 Promote healthy partnerships throughout the maternal period and there on.


Create leadership programs in low income communities.


Maintain the community center MAM so new mothers have access to healthy foods, doula services,

childbirth classes and support and access to information books, internet services free of cost.


Educate future doulas, perinatal educators, and health professionals.


Use of Donations:


-Complete a promotional documentary about MAM.

-Contract professional grant writers.

-Maintain Community Center: MAM’s Headquarters.

-Offer the following services, free or at low cost:


1.               Prenatal classes

2.               Birth and Postpartum Doulas

3.               Breastfeeding Consultation

4.               Vocational Education for Mothers

5.               Childcare

6.        Psychological services  and support for pregnant women, mothers and families

7.         Pediatric services for newborn

8.         Home postpartum visits and referrals.

9.         Lactation consultant services

 

MAM aspires to integrate the concept of maternal health with music and art, we at MAM encourage maternal health through culture. By reaching out to the younger generations, MAM hopes to influence future mothers and fathers.

story:
We are making a campaign dedicated to help 6 years old kidney cancer diseased boy in Almaty,Kazakhstan.

The boy is diseased with a malignant tumor in the kidney. Only Moscow clinic is able to help a child. After 2 weeks, he should make a very complex operation. His parents even sold the house. But money laundering is still sorely lacking.

A year ago, Sanzhar Orazbek discovered bone cancer.

The child has taken 8 courses of chemotherapy, doctors even had planned to amputate his leg. However, after the last exposure, he went to the amendment, but his right leg remained shorter than the other.

But after a while there was a malignant tumor on a kidney. Parents do not lose hope to recover only son. They sold everything they had, and now they don't have even the place to live. Child's father also had to quit work.

We need another $10.000 to treat our child.


Mothers words:

"- This is a very large sum of money is worth. I do not lose hope. I am fighting for my son. My salary is only $250. I do not have. I want to save my son. I do not lose hope. Generous people, help me, please!."

News reportage on local channel about Sanzhar's problem:

http://www.ktk.kz/ru/news/video/2012/06/05/17726

story:
Come join in and ride this wave of unlimited potential & positivity!  

For those of you less familiar w/my work: Well if there’s nothing wrong, why are you doing a fundraiser? It’s from the spirit of my entire platform -the sheer joy of creating onto & into this physical world more joy light & ease.

My play w/clients, my radio show, my book – all are thriving!

So what would it take for the mind to not decide, conclude & judge problems? Anything & everything that doesn’t allow for that are you willing to destroy & uncreate? YES! What Else is Possible?

Be a part of spreading the ease, and shifting our paradigm!  If you know there's more for us, a better way to do this life than what our current medical system & economic situation - and overall paradigm offers us - then this is for you!

How Does it Get Any Better Than This? What else is possible?

Help Me ~Help You~ Help Us!

There is something here for everyone at every level for us all to win! 

~ An autographed copy of Alison's new book

~ Coaching and Theta Healing to clear subconscious blocks at a 50% discount

~ Massive discounts - over $7,500 (50%) off - on advertising on the biggest online media outlet reaching an audience of 5 million

**Scroll down and review the right side of this page to see all the deals!

UPDATE: ONE OF THE NEWEST OPPORTUNITIES IS ALISON IS GOING TO BE SPEAKING, DOING CHAKRA TUNE-UPS AND SELLING HER BOOK AT THE LOS ANGELES CONSCIOUS LIFE EXPO FEBRUARY 8-10.  

This is a prime example of why we've launched this fundraiser.  There seems to be something to Alison's platform that catches people's attention; her work helps!

The Importance of this Message, whether done through her yoga & meditation classes, energy healing sessions, clearing & healing of subconscious blocks in group healing workshops, her mind-body-spirit personal training to reach entirely new levels of performance and success, her radio show's healings and clearings and interviews with experts in yoga, nutrition, longevity, consciousness, natural healing and more, or with her book:

as you saw on the video, with Alison's help, people are:

finding jobs -most their dream jobs, or are almost there to their dream job

increasing their business,

selling their homes that wouldn't sell,

overcoming fear and moving forward into creating an authentic life they desire,

getting off of their antidepressants,

finding that special love while others are leaving ones to create better relationships for themselves,

overcoming diseases...

This work EFFECTS people, there's just something about Alison's work, as you can see.

Alison has spent the last few years leading up to the publication and release of her book “What If There’s Nothing Wrong?” working tirelessly with thousands of people who seek more for themselves.  

Knowing that we're meant to feel alive, and full of vitality, joy, abundance, well-being and success, Alison has worked with those diagnosed with illness or disorders as well as people who have lost themselves in the midst of our chaotic, fear-filled world feeling helpless and hopeless.

They end up being turned ON, ALIVE and AWAKE! AND THEY END UP REALIZING THERE IS SO MUCH MORE THEY CAN BE AND HAVE BEYOND WHAT THIS SOCIETY SETS US UP TO SEE AS WHAT IS POSSIBLE!  THIS IS IN ALL AREAS - HEALTH, JOY, LONGEVITY, MONEY, LOVE, RECEIVING...

Alison's platform makes it clear how we got where we are as a society, and how to get the health, financial and spiritual happiness we desire. It is available to everyone.  

It is just that these basic tools are not usually put together in such a package.  Yet once people get it, it becomes available and then a choice they can make - and the rest follows.

The impact of these funds/what this can achieve?

Alison has invested much time, energy, and money into getting this message out to as many people as possible. She has established a huge on-line radio show audience, she has completed getting her book out there on the market. She has positively without a doubt helped many, many people with their daily struggles whether it be relationships, careers, money, or health.

At this point, for the relief to continue to spread as these tools reach more people, Alison needs our help to continue on this effort. She has confirmation from many book stores, health food stores, yoga studios and health, wellness and metaphysical organizations who are very excited to have her come and do book signings that include clearing sessions to help attendees get that much closer to feeling the potential of living life from the perspective of WHAT IF THERE'S NOTHING WRONG?

1) In order to get there, travel funds at a higher level need to be made available.

2) Voice America, being the biggest online media outlet, and thus a way to reach the average person (which is why Alison chose this medium) has costs to produce each radio show that add up.

3) The production, publicity and distribution of her book is also causing a huge investment of funds, due to the nature of the field of media. These costs are at a whole new level.

Thus, these funds raised with your generosity and commitment to our world becoming full of vibrantly alive, awake people who are able to live the lives that we're each inteded to live, instead of struggling with fear, doubt and problems, will fund these 3 aspects.

All of Alisons hard work has gotten the ball rolling, now she needs us to help keep the momentum and spread this message across the United States & modernized global world we're in now!!

Fun Perks!!

We have several very cool offerings to go along with your generous donations - check the list of Perks offered. They range from indivduals gaining healings and holistic life tools, to higher end advertising for your business.

 ************

After living in Asia for 10 years, and being a Yoga & Meditation Teacher trained in India, and meditating for 20 and an energy healer for 16, Alison has seen a clear contrast to what we're doing here in the States, and offers a different way for us to create vibrantly healthy, happy lives full of wealth and well-being. We just need to see it's possible, and be given the tools how to.

“Thoughts are what create choices, and as the new sciences have validated the ancient cultures' understanding of the mind-body connection with our thoughts creating our body's state of health, Alison provides both the awareness and basic tools to help us shift out of a system that has become dysfunctional, plagued by doubt, stress and fear, and into each of us taking our power back over our own lives to be as brilliant as we each can dream and imagine possible, because anything is possible! Struggle and pain is a choice, as is health, wealth and vibrant well-being!”

 

The Book: “What If There’s Nothing Wrong?”

(published by Hay House's Balboa Press Nov 2012 limited edition release with final edit and full release due by Jan 1, 2013)

The book spends the pages answering the question, "Why is it that in America, when over half of the rest of the world centers their cultures around the understanding of vital life force energy and this intangible power's importance to health and vitality and well-being, we barely work with in the States, and the West overall?

 

The Radio Show: “Create Your Best Life Ever!”

VoiceAmerica, the only online media company at the SuperBowl, is the largest online media outlet. Alison's channel is the top channel of the 7 on voice america, with 2.2 million listeners at start of 2012 to now over 5 million - with Create Your Best Life Ever! having climbed up to the top 10, heard by people all over the world, with over 100,000 listeners accessing Alison's content each month! The show is both live, and recorded, in free, downloaded mp3's on her radio show page and podcasts on itunes.

Each show is loaded with holitic life coaching tools, wellness tips, interviews with leaders in the fields Alison crosses over with her work, and energy healings to clear subconscious blocks using ThetaHealing and some Access Consciousness from Alison, for all listeners no matter where they are or when they listen.

Voice America link: http://www.voiceamerica.com/show/2054/create-your-best-life-ever

iTunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/podcast/create-your-best-life-ever!/id505696997?mt=2

Here is what some listeners have said:

“Hey Alison… I just wanted to drop a line and tell you that I listen… and re-listen to your show every week on 7th wave. I absolutely Love You! You are the reason I found a energy healer in my area. The change has been pretty incredible. Your show is by far the best on the station: Very positive and informative! I hope you have a great weekend. Blessings”

Ralph Anastasio, Oct 2012

“Thank you for the add! (as a friend on fb) My sister and I are big fans of your radio station:) ♥ We weight train too! You've been a big influence on both of us. Your teachings have given us a gentle nudge in the right directions. Lots of love from Australia...””

Bianca Richards, Sept 2012

Gratitude…

We cannot express the magnitude of what these contributions mean and how they will help Alison’s message get spread out to all who are need of it.

Alison has invested time, energy and passion in contacting people in her community and beyond, and getting the message out there, tirelessly, uncompensated for her efforts due to her dedication. We can help her! How does it get any better than this?!

“I believe in what I'm doing due to the effectiveness I've seen it have with people!” Alison J Kay, PhD.

Namaste!

campaign_city: Palm Harbor, United States Minor Outlying Islands

story:
Short Summary

We would like to ask for your support for this one of a kind fundraiser bringing together Regina artists of all genres to spread Christmas cheer and raise funds and awareness for Canada's first and only spinal cord injury facility, Regina's own First Step's Wellness Centre.

The event will feature Christmas songs and original music, comedy and drama; two hours of family friendly entertainment, all while helping a forward-thinking and most worth while cause.

Our goal is to raise a minimum of $5,000.00 to purchase much needed exercise equipment for this facility to enhance First Step's ability to assist in the rehabilitation of those with spinal cord injuries.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Your donation will have a positive impact on the lives of those dealing with spinal cord injuries, as well as their families.

 

EVERY DONATION: Gets you a free download of some new music from Fur Eel.

 

EVERY DONATION OF $20: GETS YOUR NAME ENTERED TO WIN THE "FUR EEL CHRISTMAS TREE" - Which includes items donated from local businesses, merchandise and CD's of artists performing and more. The more you donate, the better your chances of winning this prize!

The Impact

Spinal cord injuries are extremely devestating to those involved, both the victim and the families. The First Step's Wellness Centre is a specialized gym that provides the best exercise based treatment for these victims in Canada.

 

If it wasn't for First Step's Wellness Centre, Canadians needing this kind of treatment would have to fly to the U.S.A  to receive this quality of treatment. This sort of venture costs ASTRONOMICAL amounts of money.

 

Your contribution will allow families to seek treatment right here in Canada without the financial burdon of pursuing these treatments in foreign countries.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a cash donation, there are still many ways you can help!

 

-Share this Campaign page or our UStream Channel

http://www.ustream.tv/channel/a-fur-eel-christmas

-Tell your friends about this event through Social Media

story:
Stop Liver Cancer.

Recently my best friend's mother was diagnosed with liver cancer and it shocked us all because it came out of no where.. Slight pains in her stomach/kidney area which made her go for a check up at the hospital dramatically turned into every family and friends worst neighbour, being diagnosed with cancer. This woman has never picked up a cigarette in her life or even had a unhealthy drinking habit, just why? Seeing my friend in tears and pain made it all the more personal because now this problem was also mine and the rest of the community that was close to him. 

The doctors gave us the tragic news that the cancer had spread around the body and that actions had to be taken sooner rather than later. Her family are wanting to send her abroad to the hands of the experts so they can hopefully turn them frowns upside down and give the family some positive news after treatment. 

I know its hard asking people for money we've all come across a charity worker/fundraiser at least once in our lives and not contributed. I know its says my target is £2000 but i had to pick a number so i could start the campaign, I don't have a target or ask for a certain amount. 1p will be as much appreciated as donating £1 so I hope you can all be generous and help me try and put a smile on this innocent woman's face. I myself will be donating £50 every week to try and boost up the total. Im not saying we are going to raise thousands and get thousands of peoples attentions but like the famous saying 'every little helps'.


I would like to thank everyone now and I hope you all donate generously!!

story:
Stretch Goal $4,000

We have started purchasing supplies and are packing bags. Because of you we will be able to delivery the diapers and formula to the hospital. 

Thank everyone for your generous donations. As a result of your response, we have set a new stretch goal of $4,000. 100% of your donations will be used to provide formula, diapers, baby wipes and healthcare needs for these newborn babies. As background for those who may be reading about our campaign for the first time, two years ago we launched an Infant Rescue Center to address the growing population of abandoned babies resulting from births out of wedlock, Incest, rape and prostitution. Our partners in the communities we serve are the healthcare providers, children's offices and police offices. 

Earlier this week, we were made aware that a hospital in one of our communities was giving Chai Tea made from fresh cows milk to newborn babies and specifically to those babies who may not have permanent caretakers. Our stretch goal will enable us to purchase powdered formula, nutrient special formula (particularly for babies born to HIV mothers) baby wipes and newborn diapers for our community hospital in Nanyuki, Kenya. This supply will enable the hospital to meet the needs through the end of 2014. 

Your gift of formula will most likely save a baby's life, in the very least give him or her a fighting chance to survival. We have a U.S. mission team traveling to Kenya October 7th and the formula and diapers we are able to purchase will be taken by the team to the hospital. 

Check our website for pictures and updates of the delivery of these items around October 22nd. 

Thank you so very much for your support.

story:
Short Summary


  • Hello, I'm Mateo I love photography and singing, I was Diagnosed with Juvenile Polymyositis in March of this Year. I had been sick for quite awhile before I was diagnosed, we didn't quite know what was happening but I had been passing out, constantly vomiting, Falling for no apparent reason and becoming significantly weaker. 
  • Medical bills are becoming quite a burden for us, they are reaching hundreds of thousands of dollars. We have good insurance but we still have to pay half of everything. My mom recently cut her hours at work to take care of me and she's going to cut them back more because my disease is progressing. This campaign is important to me because I want to be able to contribute to help my family financially.    
  • This campaign very likely could save my life and bring a brighter future for my family.

What We Need & What You Get

  • All proceeds will go to paying bills such as Home, Auto, travel and MEDICAL! You may be wondering what's travel for? We travel to Mayo Clinic for my treatments every 2 weeks and it costs about $2,000 every time we go.
  • There are perk to donating!
  • If we don't reach our goal all proceeds still go to bills!

The Impact

Just a small contribution will help pay for day to day necessities.

Risks & Challenges

I come face to face with death on a day to day basis. If we can't afford treatments i will die.

Other Ways You Can Help

SPREAD THE WORD!!!!!

story:
Part of a letter I wrote to myself a year ago:

Dear Self,

A year ago you were sitting on a bed in Ica, Peru with blisters on your thumbs. You have one more day of this experience. Remember the women and Padre Miguel. Remember the children that touched your heart. Remember your family here. 

Love unconditionally, pour your heart out, be selfless, take care of others. I also hope you are doing some sort of volunteer work.  

This was written during a volunteer trip I won with TOMS.  The experience (which I am so grateful for) inspired me to volunteer with GRID Alternatives in Nicaragua to install solar on school and a heath center.  

The Goal

  • $1,500
  • For every $10 I receive, my company SunShare has offered to match $5 (up to $500)
  • Any amount raised over $1,500, I will donate to GRID Alternatives. 
  • Perk: For every person who donates $25 or more, I will send you a postcard

The Impact

GRID Alternatives' International Program brings solar power to rural off-grid communities in Nicaragua, providing electricity for schools, health clinics and farms, and energy education for residents. By providing these rural facilities with solar energy, we are doing more than just providing a clean and safe supply of electricity that will last for decades. We are demonstrating that solar is an effective, reliable, and cost-effective energy source that can be adopted into Nicaragua's future energy mix both in rural communities and in more urban centers. Currently, only about 73% of Nicaragua has access to grid-connected energy. Unconnected communities often rely on oil-based lamps to provide the necessary light to continue education and family-based activities into the evenings. This can be an expensive and sometimes unsafe choice, (not to mention carbon-intensive).  Enter the need for solar-energy.  Furthermore, once exposed to the benefits of solar energy, community residents are then more likely to advocate for their additional use in applications ranging from electrical fencing for livestock to water pumping.  


As Nicaragua's economy grows, renewable energy advocates need proven, local, and demonstrable success stories to compete against traditional fossil-fuel generation and propel solar and other less-polluting technologies into the mainstream. By starting small and acting locally, continuing the work of Grid Alternatives and other organizations in the region, we hope to accomplish big audacious goals in the region, the nation, and beyond!

- See more at: http://gridalternatives.org/learn/programs/international-program#sthash.fbear1vW.dpuf

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Please help spread the word! Share this link.  http://igg.me/at/mckGRID

      • Packing advice or used camping items welcome (lightweight sleeping bag, mosquito net, a normal backpack).  

      Thank you so much!

story:
About Us

Mental Health is Not a Crime is an upcoming nonprofit organization helping to bring awareness to the stigma surrounding mental health in today's society. Our approach to mental health is unlike any other organization. We will be tackling real world problems such as current events, pharmaceutical companies and how they profit, over-medicating, misdiagnosis, and wrongful medicating. Many individuals just need someone positive to confide in; we intend to help locate beneficial resources and support that these individuals can count on. Together we can help save lives and end the stigma surrounding mental health by providing unbiased insight into mental health conditions and their symptoms. This is the future of mental health and we intend to make it a bright one.

Our Goal

    Mental health in the United States is poorly funded and often mocked within society. Law enforcement officials are poorly trained in dealing with individuals suffering from mental health conditions, often times resulting in violence, imprisonment, or death towards the individual needing help. Pharmaceutical companies frequently push new psychiatric medication onto the market for profit, aiding the state in generating revenue and contributing to the over and wrongful medicating by the physician. Until awareness is raised, these trends will continue to occur and negatively impact the lives of millions of innocent people around the country every day. Our goal is to bring these issues to light and help end the stigma surrounding mental health.

    What We Need

    • $1,500 to file for the 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization status and federally register the logo.
    • Regardless of whether or not we reach our goal, all money raised will go towards the cost of these two fees.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please visit our website www.mhinac.org and participate in our forums!
    • Merchandise is available on the website! All proceeds go towards the filing fee and logo registration.
    • Please share this page and help us reach our goal!

story:
Hi, I am Brian Francis. Currently I am dire need of some funding help. My teeth are soft, brittle, and painful. My insurance will cover all of the dental work, pay for dentures, and everything is paid for.

But I need an IV sedation that costs just over $400. Being retired, disabled, diabetic, well I just can not afford the sedation needed for this work. I really need help here. Any little bit helps. I may be able to cover a bit of this, but not much at all.

Please consider passing this on to others who may be able to help. I will say a prayer for all those who are able to donate. The sooner I can raise the money, the sooner I can be completed and have a good smile.

Thank you and God Bless you.


Brian

story:
Short Summary

My name is Barbara Shepherd and I am the Community Relations and Events Coordinator for Concord Counseling Services.  Concord Counseling Services is a private nonprofit organization that provides support for people struggling with mental  health issues including drug and alcohol abuse, grief, stress, anxiety, suicide and more.  More than 2,000 clients including men, women, and children of all ages and economic conditions pass through the doors annually.  Over 90 doctors, psychiatrists, nurses, social workers, are so passionate in helping their clients.
The organization is in desperate need of an exhibit that reflects the excellent services the organization provides.  This exhibit will be used at health fairs, community, college, and schools' wellness events, as well as senior conferences.

Your funding will help Concord Counseling Services provide continued support to those people who struggle day to day with mental health issues.

 What We Need & What You Get

We need a flexible up-to-date, lightweight and portable exhibit that tells the story of Concord Counseling services.  Easy assembly and disassembly is necessary for our employees to prepare rapidly for these events.  We have identified a display system that meets all of our criteria.  The distributor has offered a nice discount for the system.  Because the organization serves so many different age groups and clients, we need several different panels (each is 27 1/2 " w x 76 3/4" h) with services customized to the age group i.e., college students, high school students, seniors, and alcohol and drug addiction.

We need $3,500 in order to purchase the basic display unit and 6-8  fabric panels.  That figure also includes artwork necessary to produce the panels.

If we do not reach our entire goal, we will create as many panels as we have the funds to do.  

Should we exceed our goal, the extra money will be used to hire an additional psychiatrist.  Currently the wait to see one of our psychiatrists is one year.  This is unacceptable.  When someone is bleeding internally, waiting one year, is disastrous.

The Impact

The clients we serve could be your parent dealing with the demise of another parent and the ensuing grief; it could be a family member dealing with a nasty, gut-wrenching divorce; or it could be one of your children who is being bullied and feels suicide is the only answer.  We currently provide counseling services in four major school districts helping children with many issues including drugs, suicide, poor grades.

Your contribution is invaluable to helping Concord heal people in mind and spirit with programs and services that change lives.

Risks & Challenges

In the past there has been such a stigma to "mental health"; yet today times are changing and people are learning that mental health is just as important as physical health.  This exhibit will certainly aid in getting the word out and helping to overcome the stigma associated with  these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute but would like to help, please tell others about our needs and make some noise about this campaign.

story:
Hi y’all, My name is Jayna Anderson and I'm the owner and creator of 5th Dimension-  an herbal skincare company based out of Maurice, Louisiana.  I am crowdfunding for my business to expand my production volume and offerings! Read on for more info, and check out the exclusive perks only available through this campaign!

I started 5th Dimension years ago while problem solving my own ailments from chronic dry skin and anxiety to the common cold and menstrual cramps with herbal remedies and handcrafted topicals. After sharing my creations with solely friends and family for some time, 5th Dimension was released for online sale in January 2018, offering small batch herbal skincare. But I didn’t just stop there- in order to deepen my understanding of herbalism, I attended the Samara School of Community Herbalism in New Orleans, which fortified the knowledge I acquired over the years of personal study and practice. 

My education coupled with my self-taught business skills has fully empowered me to take my tiny business to the next level in order to serve more people. I’m so happy with the impact that my little skincare brand has had- whether it be through the hundred of positive responses from patrons or being able to connect with people from across the country - I want to be able to do more, and I need your help to do that.

"5th Dimension products are hands down the best thing that's ever happened to my skin! The Sub Rosa Serum and Mystic Mud are a true revelation and are the products I HAVE to use every day, leaving me moisturized and zit free. In a time where I'm constantly worrying about where all my products come from- if they have added ingredients, and if they are made ethically,-5th Dimension makes me feel at ease knowing that each product is handcrafted ethically by an individual who is really invested in the well being of my skin!" - Lea H.

FearlessCon artisan market 

 

Recently, 5th Dimension was offered the opportunity to be introduced through a major skincare house. This is such an exciting opportunity, but it comes with it’s own set of challenges, and in order to accommodate the launch and do it in a productive and safe way, we need to open a legitimate production facility. (I currently make my products in a tiny 100 square foot apothecary that overlooks my chicken coop). This production facility would open the doors to huge growth for 5th Dimension and allow me to grow my team while connecting to a greater audience. Outside of expanding into this production facility, I want to expand the brand beyond topical products. My studies have equipped me with the knowledge to create herbal supplements, but I can’t do that without the backing for this facility!

my small apothecary space where all products are currently made!

some of our fabulous customers!

My focus for herbal supplements will be alcohol free preparations. As a sober person of over 3.5 years, I have noticed how many herbalists predominantly craft alcohol extracted supplements, with alcohol-free as an afterthought. My hope is to release a full line of alcohol-free herbal extracts for daily support and rebalancing disrupted systems. Sober folks deserve to have access to potent herbal extracts without feeling triggered by alcohol. Once I have the line established, and I am set up in my new facility, I intend to start serving the community with sliding scale consultation and herbal support. 

"I've been using 5th Dimension for over a year now, and I can say that nothing has ever helped my skin as much as 5D. From the beautiful, earthy scents to the non-wasteful packaging, it's eco-friendly and made from a hardworking, beautiful lady who is beyond passionate about her work! I recommend everyone add 5th Dimension to their skincare regime!" -Liv T

5th Dimension has become a mighty little business, sending packages all over the states each week. By staying true to myself, I have built this brand to be one that exemplifies quality and community. Ask any of my customers, and they'll probably tell you that we've slowly become friends. To me, building a relationship with my clients is so important. I hope to continually deepen that relationship with folks as I expand into supplements.  

teaching a face mask making workshop!

 

5th Dimension is a *super* small business! I want to stay true to my mission of providing effective, safe and clean products to people, and as an independent business, I hope to receive funding from those of you that are also invested in this! This is one way for you to show your support of a small woman run business- one that consistently puts their business dollars into the hands of other small businesses!

5th Dimension’s skincare line is designed to heal while promoting a stronger relationship with you, yourself and the land. It's true that nothing heals like mother nature, and something as simple as your herbal infused face oil can fill that missing link on days when a hike in the woods isn't on the menu! 5th Dimension relies on strong medicinal plants grown in nutrient dense soil to heal- not just our skin’s imbalances, but the relationship with us and the planet that feeds us. We source a good portion of our herbal ingredients from small scale sustainable farms.

Together, we are working to create a better, greener future. 5th Dimension is invested in our commitment to respecting the earth, each other and ourselves along the way. With your help, we can increase our support of small U.S. farms and make a greener, greater difference. 

We need $10,000 to take on this major project of growth! Here's more details on the funding goal:

  • The fundraising goal is flexible, meaning we will keep all funds raised even if I don't hit the 10k goal.
  • If we don't reach our goal of 10k, the acquired funds will be dispersed from production facility to buying packaging in bulk to keep costs low. It will delay the release of our supplement line, as I won't be able to get my set-up compliant by the end of the year without funding.

From production to creation, I believe in transparency so here’s what the money will help me do:

  • Securing a production facility
  • Filling the facility with high quality equipment to operate up to code. 
  • Purchase high quality glass packaging for our products 
  • Continuing to support small farms with larger orders of bulk organic herbs
  • Expanding our offerings to include herbal supplements
  • Expanding our team and further support the team we have
  • Marketing assistance that will allow us to reach new clients
  • Creative assistant for branding and design 

 

    Having this improved workspace and growth for 5th Dimension will mean:

    • The ability to craft our products in line with industry regulation
    • A broader and more potent reach with our herbal skincare and supplements
    • A transition to more eco-friendly packaging to drastically reduce our contribution to plastic packaging waste.
    • Increased distribution scope of our organic toxic free products
    • The ability to offer sliding scale consultations and supplements to those who need it

      Some of the Challenges I anticipate:

      • Finding the perfect space to start ramping up production in time for the Fall
      • Switching all of our packaging and branding over during this time 
      • Getting enough sleep

      Have no fear though...

      • There is a local commercial kitchen with affordable rental time that I can work from while we set up my production space!
      • The branding project is underway, and I have a team of amazing people that I've been working with to help make this all happen so my focus can remain on ramping up production and expanding the line!
      • Luckily I have the knowledge to craft myself some alcohol-free sleep aids to help me get a solid night's sleep so I am energized through the long days!

      selling at market in New Orleans

      • Please, share on social media! Facebook, Twitter, Instagram. Share at least once a week to really make an impact!
      • Do you have high quality kitchen equipment you would like to donate?! I would forever appreciate the donation. I am currently seeking donations of: glass measuring cups, glass, ceramic or non-reactive aluminum bowls, spoons, mixers, blenders, thermometers, double boilers, digital scales, sifters, pots and pans, or anything else you think might be useful!
      • Have another way you'd like to help? shoot me an e-mail at shop5thdimension@gmail.com and let's talk! 

      Thank you!

      xoxo,

      Jayna, Founder of 5th Dimension

my small apothecary space where all products are currently made!
some of our fabulous customers!
My focus for herbal supplements will be alcohol free preparations. As a sober person of over 3.5 years, I have noticed how many herbalists predominantly craft alcohol extracted supplements, with alcohol-free as an afterthought. My hope is to release a full line of alcohol-free herbal extracts for daily support and rebalancing disrupted systems. Sober folks deserve to have access to potent herbal extracts without feeling triggered by alcohol. Once I have the line established, and I am set up in my new facility, I intend to start serving the community with sliding scale consultation and herbal support. 
"I've been using 5th Dimension for over a year now, and I can say that nothing has ever helped my skin as much as 5D. From the beautiful, earthy scents to the non-wasteful packaging, it's eco-friendly and made from a hardworking, beautiful lady who is beyond passionate about her work! I recommend everyone add 5th Dimension to their skincare regime!" -Liv T
5th Dimension has become a mighty little business, sending packages all over the states each week. By staying true to myself, I have built this brand to be one that exemplifies quality and community. Ask any of my customers, and they'll probably tell you that we've slowly become friends. To me, building a relationship with my clients is so important. I hope to continually deepen that relationship with folks as I expand into supplements.  

teaching a face mask making workshop!
 

5th Dimension is a *super* small business! I want to stay true to my mission of providing effective, safe and clean products to people, and as an independent business, I hope to receive funding from those of you that are also invested in this! This is one way for you to show your support of a small woman run business- one that consistently puts their business dollars into the hands of other small businesses!

5th Dimension’s skincare line is designed to heal while promoting a stronger relationship with you, yourself and the land. It's true that nothing heals like mother nature, and something as simple as your herbal infused face oil can fill that missing link on days when a hike in the woods isn't on the menu! 5th Dimension relies on strong medicinal plants grown in nutrient dense soil to heal- not just our skin’s imbalances, but the relationship with us and the planet that feeds us. We source a good portion of our herbal ingredients from small scale sustainable farms.
Together, we are working to create a better, greener future. 5th Dimension is invested in our commitment to respecting the earth, each other and ourselves along the way. With your help, we can increase our support of small U.S. farms and make a greener, greater difference. 

We need $10,000 to take on this major project of growth! Here's more details on the funding goal:

The fundraising goal is flexible, meaning we will keep all funds raised even if I don't hit the 10k goal.
If we don't reach our goal of 10k, the acquired funds will be dispersed from production facility to buying packaging in bulk to keep costs low. It will delay the release of our supplement line, as I won't be able to get my set-up compliant by the end of the year without funding.

From production to creation, I believe in transparency so here’s what the money will help me do:

Securing a production facility
Filling the facility with high quality equipment to operate up to code. 
Purchase high quality glass packaging for our products 
Continuing to support small farms with larger orders of bulk organic herbs
Expanding our offerings to include herbal supplements
Expanding our team and further support the team we have
Marketing assistance that will allow us to reach new clients
Creative assistant for branding and design 

 


Having this improved workspace and growth for 5th Dimension will mean:

The ability to craft our products in line with industry regulation
A broader and more potent reach with our herbal skincare and supplements
A transition to more eco-friendly packaging to drastically reduce our contribution to plastic packaging waste.
Increased distribution scope of our organic toxic free products
The ability to offer sliding scale consultations and supplements to those who need it




Some of the Challenges I anticipate:

Finding the perfect space to start ramping up production in time for the Fall
Switching all of our packaging and branding over during this time 
Getting enough sleep

Have no fear though...

There is a local commercial kitchen with affordable rental time that I can work from while we set up my production space!
The branding project is underway, and I have a team of amazing people that I've been working with to help make this all happen so my focus can remain on ramping up production and expanding the line!
Luckily I have the knowledge to craft myself some alcohol-free sleep aids to help me get a solid night's sleep so I am energized through the long days!


selling at market in New Orleans



Please, share on social media! Facebook, Twitter, Instagram. Share at least once a week to really make an impact!
Do you have high quality kitchen equipment you would like to donate?! I would forever appreciate the donation. I am currently seeking donations of: glass measuring cups, glass, ceramic or non-reactive aluminum bowls, spoons, mixers, blenders, thermometers, double boilers, digital scales, sifters, pots and pans, or anything else you think might be useful!
Have another way you'd like to help? shoot me an e-mail at shop5thdimension@gmail.com and let's talk! 

Thank you!
xoxo,
Jayna, Founder of 5th Dimension

story:
What is Brushean?  

Brushean is a smart beauty device that easily and safely sanitizes makeup brushes after every use. Our patent-pending design features UV-C sterilization technology that kills up to 99.9% of all bacteria and viruses. Our easy-to-use hydraulic lift function and dust cover help safely store brushes in a safe and clean environment. Brushean also includes an automatic five-minute timer and operates with a rechargeable battery. It’s simple, sleek and safe.

 

Say goodbye to gross bacteria and germs that quickly accumulate on your makeup brushes and can lead to serious skin problems! Dermatologists recommend cleaning makeup brushes every day to remove harmful bacteria yet a recent study found that more than 80 percent of women don’t wash their bushes after each use.

The truth is the average person doesn’t have time to thoroughly clean their brushes each day. We are busy and have more important things to do. That’s why we created Brushean! Use our device on a daily basis to keep your tools sanitized and bacteria-free. You’ll look and feel your best when your makeup brushes are clean and performing at their best. Brushean can’t replace washing out the brushes with soap and water, but it absolutely helps prevent bacteria and germ build up.

Why is it important to clean our brushes?  

Without consistent sterilization, bacteria builds up over time and is extremely harmful to your skin’s health. Our UV-C lamp can remove up to 99.9% of bacteria with the UV-C wavelength. Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) is a disinfection method that uses short-wavelength ultraviolet (UV-C) light to kill or inactivate microorganisms by destroying nucleic acids and disrupting their DNA, leaving them unable to perform vital cellular functions. The technology is used in a variety of spas and across a variety of industries. 

Weight 1.4 kG / Dimension 7”, Height 14.5” / 9.2" x 3.3" x 3.3" (235 mm x 84 mm x 84 mm ) 

Weight 1.4 kG / Dimension 7”, Height 14.5” / 9.2" x 3.3" x 3.3" (235 mm x 84 mm x 84 mm ) 

Foundation Brush / Blush Brush / Contour Brush / Eyeshadow Brush  / Concealer Brush 

Risks and challenges

We are excited to deliver a high-quality and important skin care product to all of our supporters. We are working hard to ensure seamless production and delivery of the product.

Our team includes experienced engineers, operations manager, leading manufacturers and fulfillment companies standing by to start production once our campaign is funded.

1. Manufacturing: We are planning to place our manufacturing order by the end of April 2018. From April to September, we will be working on the production mold, quality control testing, and a production test run.

2. Fulfillment and Shipment: We already have our third-party fulfillment center secured. They will be ready to ship in the United States and around the globe. We are planning to ship our product by the end of November with hopes that it arrives before the holidays.

3. Battery: During our product testing phase, the testing showed that the battery life is up to 20 hours.

We thank you for your interest in and support of Brushean. We look forward to sharing this journey with you and will send email updates along the way. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Please email us with questions or concerns at hello@brushean.com

story:
We need to raise funds for my baby girl's liver transplant so she can survive and win against this rare chronic liver disease called biliary atresia. Please help us. www.facebook.com/saveSybylShynn

Full name: Sybyl Shynn Sansolis Mabulay
Birthday / Age: May 25, 2014 / 12 months old
Parents: *Emmanuel Delon Ang Mabulay (Father) & *Lavinia Sansolis Mabulay (Mother)

Baby Sybyl Shynn was diagnosed of Biliary Atresia which is a chronic liver condition and the liver progressively deteriorates. She is required to undergo liver transplant which costs about 4 Million PhP (PhP 4,000,000.00) that can be done in Taiwan where the cheapest liver transplant is, or in The Medical City here in the Philippines which costs about 4.5 Million PhP. We were told by her pedia gastroenterologist specialist that baby Sybyl Shynn should undergo liver transplant as soon as she's 1 year old because of very high success rate and hopefully we will have enough funds by then or latest should be done before she turns 2 years old because it's very rare that babies with the same condition to live beyond 2 years old without liver transplant.

Please help us raise funds for my baby's liver transplant. Even the medicines and vitamins/supplements needed for her are very expensive which costs us about PhP 1,000.00 per week.

For donations:
Account name: c/o Lavinia S. Mabulay (mother of baby Sybyl Shynn)
*BPI Savings Account # 8199192567
*BDO Savings Account # 002620118235
*UNIONBANK Account# 109453280377
*PayPal: emmanlav@gmail.com

Contact numbers:
Globe - +639174230263
Smart - +639497542887
PLDT Landline - +6328466841

Email: lavinia.mabulay@live.com
or lav_104@yahoo.com

Thank you very much in advance, we appreciate any help that will come.
