story:
We have decided to suspend development of AmpStrip as a fitness product. We are offering full refunds to all contributors. 

Please visit www.ampstrip.com to learn how to get your refund.




Ask the world’s best athletes "What’s the single most important biometric you monitor while training?" and they all answer the same. Heart rate. But the devices available today have some major limitations. Heart rate straps are uncomfortable, they chafe, and can’t transmit in water. Watches are notoriously inaccurate during workouts and can’t retain much, if any, data. And because all the devices are so uncomfortable, most everybody takes them OFF when they’re not working out, losing critical data about their cardiovascular fitness, exercise recovery and readiness to train.

The FitLinxx AmpStrip™ addresses these limitations and enables competitive athletes to take heart rate training to the next level. 


Like you, we are competitive athletes.  We understand your desire to squeeze out every last bit of performance by training right to the edge. We know the pain and agony of a season cut short by an overtraining injury.

That's why we built the AmpStrip. AmpStrip enables athletes to “Train to the Edge” while avoiding injury. AmpStrip accurately monitors heart rate, exercise load, resting heart rate, recovery heart rate and other biometrics all day, every day, helping you understand exactly how hard you are pushing your body and where you are in the training-recovery cycle. 


The FitLinxx AmpStrip™ is a thin, waterproof device that tracks heart rate and activity around the clock with accuracy – all within a device as discrete and comfortable as a Band-Aid®. It can be comfortably worn all day, every day. It easily sticks to your torso and automatically tracks heart rate, activity, exercise load, skin temperature and posture.  It also provides critical fitness insights like resting heart rate and heart rate recovery.







Here are some questions that have come up from contributors during the campaign. Thanks for the feedback. Be sure to see our FAQs for more.

Do you have plans to support ANT+ in a later version?

We are not able get ANT+ into this round of the product, but it is definitely something we will revisit after we ship this version. At this stage, we cannot commit to an exact time when we will support ANT+.

How will you handle international orders?  Will I be charged import tax or other charges on delivery?

EU customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping+VAT.  Your order will be shipped out of our UK office, and this additional contribution will cover all import/delivery charges. 

All other international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or other fees which may be added on import/delivery.

* If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original order.

What about Windows Phone?

We are not planning on Windows Phone Support for product launch. But, it is something we are strongly considering for later in 2015.

I'd love to be a Beta tester! How will the Beta program work?

Anyone who contributed to our Indiegogo campaign at the Podium level will be eligible for our Beta program – which is anticipated to kickoff in March 2015. We will hold a random drawing to determine who gets in. Unfortunately, we will not be able to support everyone in the Beta, so we will be leaning toward the folks that supported us early on. 

Will the adhesive cause any skin sensitivity or an allergic reaction?

The AmpStrip uses a hypoallergenic medical-grade adhesive that has been tested on large populations and therefore should not cause any issues. As with anything that touches the skin(materials, fabrics, soaps, etc.), we do anticipate that a very small percentage of the population may develop a reaction. In these cases we will honor our money-back guarantee.

Will the AmpStrip work for me if I have an irregular heart beat?

The AmpStrip is a single lead ECG that does "see" the entire QRS complex. But, to detect an AFib or other irregular heart rate event it would need to be a medical device - which it is not. A future version of the product may have those capabilities, but it would be marketed separately from this device.

Read More FAQs



“I’m a fitness junkie and track all my biometrics with a heart rate strap.  But since I can’t wear it 24x7 I lose a ton of data about recovery and readiness.  AmpStrip SOLVES that problem."- Jenn

"I have a power meter to measure my WATTs on the bike and a GPS watch for my pace on runs.  Finally there’s something for my pool and open water training that helps me improve my performance by understanding what heart rate zones I’m operating in." - Rob

"I’m a serious, competitive age-grouper.  I train hard and demand the best equipment.  My AmpStrip allows me to track my heart rate not just during an event but leading up to it and during recovery.  And that’s how I stay at the top of my age group and on top of the podium." - Walter



                     



“A perfect example of where fitness tracking — or life tracking — can go as technology shrinks.”


“…Certain kinds of athletes … would prefer to wear a discrete and nearly invisible patch on the midsection as opposed to a tracker on their wrist.”


“…Medical science has been working on a way to build health sensors into stickers. AmpStrip might have gotten there first.”


"Look, whatever, I just want one."



AmpStrip is smart enough to track all of your training activity, whether it’s running, cycling, swimming, cross fit, weights, walking or sleeping. It also knows when to take measurements like resting heart rate and heart rate recovery, without you having to do anything. It sends this data to the AmpInsights™ App (both iOS and Android) where you can track progress during and after your workouts.





This is our first foray into consumer products that we would sell directly - and we want to get it right. We know how to manufacture. We know how to distribute.  We need your help to innovate even faster and take the AmpStrip to the next level. Please help us change the way athletes train and compete. 

We'll be asking some of our early contributors to be part of our beta program where you'll get a Beta version of the product to test and give us feedback. Get in early and be one of the first to get an AmpStrip.




We have completed the prototyping and Alpha stages of the device development and are starting to make the Betas.   Key lessons on how to make this advanced type of wearable have been learned and incorporated; how to turn the sensor data into information and insight; how to make the durable, incredibly thin electronics over-molded device; and how to make low cost replacement adhesives that capture the heart signal and get it into the AmpStrip. Next step is to translate all of this into manufacturing at scale – something we have extensive experience doing. 


MARCH, 2015. Launch beta

OCTOBER, 2015. Ship AmpStrip starter pack to Podium Package contributors

NOVEMBER, 2015. Begin shipping AmpStrip to remainder of contributors

FEBRUARY, 2016. Publicly available.



 

Help us spread the word about AmpStrip by email and social media. Earn a AmpStrip starter pack for every 5 friends you refer who buy AmpStrip Podium Package or better.

The fine print: Once the Indiegogo campaign is over we will apply all your earned credits for referrals to your account for use in future purchases of AmpStrips or Adhesives. Contributors cannot refer themselves. Only the contributor named by a referred person at the time of the referred person’s purchase will receive credit. To receive credit, you must first be an AmpStrip Indiegogo contributor.





If you like to know the gritty details behind technology we’re happy to share!

  • Dimensions. The AmpStrip is 3.5 inches long, 1 inch wide and is less than one quarter of an inch thick including the adhesive. It weighs less than .4 ounces.
  • Sensors. AmpStrip uses a single lead ECG sensor to capture heart rate with precision. We use a 3-axis MEM’s accelerometer to detect motion in all planes which is converted by our proprietary algorithms into specific activities and effort levels. We also include a skin proximity Thermistor to detect skin temperature.
  • Adhesives. To begin we will offer one level of replaceable adhesive for use with AmpStrip - the Competitor grade.  Competitor grade is designed to stay on under the most rigorous conditions, including pool and ocean workouts and strenuous whole body efforts for 3 or more days.  The adhesives are bio-compatible to ISO 10993 and are the same formulations used by similar body adhesive products.
  • Communications. We use our patented techniques in conjunction with Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) to achieve significantly reduced energy consumption and maximize data capture and battery life. The AmpStrip is FCC and CE compatible.
  • Power source. The AmpStrip uses a 20 mA wireless rechargeable battery. Under constant daily use in normal conditions the battery will only need to be recharged every 7 days or so.
  • Housing. The sensors, processing unit and battery are housed in a fully sealed medical grade silicone module for durability and protection. The entire module is waterproof and can operate in temperatures from 40-110 degrees Fahrenheit.
  • Memory. Integrated memory allows for up to 24 hours of data collection between background syncing, giving users untethered freedom to train without worrying about their gear.
  • Processing unit. AmpStrip uses a 32-bit ARM MO processing unit to manage the continuous heart rate, activity, body position, etc. monitoring.


How much is shipping?

Shipping is free to the US and Canada.  International orders will require an additional contribution for shipping on top of the amount paid for the Perk (please see the details listed in each of the Perks).

How will you handle international orders?  Will I be charged import tax or other charges on delivery?

EU customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping+VAT.  Your order will be shipped out of our UK office, and this additional contribution will cover all import/delivery charges. 

All other international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or other fees which may be added on import/delivery.

* If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original order.

What is the AmpStrip's warranty?

The AmpStrip is backed by a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee and covered by a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

We are dedicated to your complete satisfaction. If you have any problems at all, simply contact our Support team at support@fitlinxx.com and we’ll make it right or issue you a full refund.

What is the AmpStrip and how does it work?

The AmpStrip is a waterproof, rechargeable, wearable device that adheres comfortably to your torso and continuously tracks your heart rate, physical activity, and other vital bio signals 24/7 – during activity, rest, recovery, and sleep. The AmpStrip is applied to the left side of your torso, where a super-sensitive single lead ECG sensor captures a clear heart rate signal. It uses the industry standard Bluetooth LE® to continuously communicate with your mobile app of choice and display real time data and insights. It will store up to 24 hours of data when you’re away from your mobile device, and sync as soon as it is within range.

What does the AmpStrip track?

  • Heart rate and heart rate zones
  • Resting heart rate when worn while sleeping
  • Heart rate recovery
  • Respiration
  • Skin temperature
  • Posture
  • Steps
  • Calories burned
  • Active time
  • Sleep
  • Stress

What types of activities does the AmpStrip track?

The AmpStrip is an all-day acitivty and heart rate monitor. It is designed to be worn during workouts, rest, recovery, and sleep. It tracks popular activities like walking, running, cycling, swimming, cross fit, etc..

How do I wear the AmpStrip?

The AmpStrip is worn on the left side of the torso, under the left pectoral muscle.  For women, it should be positioned just below the sports bra.  To wear it, you will put a new adhesive on it, then simply remove the backing from the adhesive and press it firmly to your body (Just like a Band-Aid®).

How long can I wear the AmpStrip?

The AmpStrip is designed to be worn all day and will last between three and seven days depending on the length and intensity of your activity.  Our AmpInsights mobile app will notify you when it’s time to remove your AmpStrip.

How/When should I remove the AmpStrip?

You should remove the AmpStrip adhesive once the device peels away from your body enough that the data stops flowing to the App or the App tells you to change the adhesive. 

How often should I replace my adhesives?

You should replace the adhesive with a new one each time you put the AmpStrip on.  This will typically be every 3-7 days. It helps to rotate the areas where you put the AmpStrip each time.

How much will the replacement adhesives cost?

3-6 month supply of adhesives cost $30.

Is the battery rechargeable or does it need to be replaced?

The AmpStrip comes with a wireless recharging station. The rechargeable battery will last up to 7 days and take about 60 minutes to recharge.

Can I swim/shower/immerse the AmpStrip in water?

Yes, the AmpStrip is waterproof and the adhesives are designed to resist, absorb and release water while retaining adhesion to your body.  The AmpStrip is encased in a durable, biocompatible silicone housing for worry-free use in the pool or open water, while showering or under conditions of extreme perspiration.

Is the AmpStrip FDA approved?

No.  The AmpStrip is intended for consumer use only and is not a medical device.

Which devices are compatible with the AmpStrip?

The AmpStrip can be used with Bluetooth LE® mobile devices such as smart phones and tablets.

Will the AmpStrip work with my existing apps?

The AmpStrip is compatible with fitness apps that support BlueTooth LE® heart rate monitors, such as EndoMondo, MapMyRun, RunKeeper, and Strava.

Will the AmpStrip be compatible with smart watches like the Apple Watch or the Samsung Galaxy Gear?

We intend to make sure the AmpStrip will work with smart watches, but those details are not yet finalized.

Who should I contact with questions about my order?

Please contact our Support team at support@fitlinxx.com with any questions related to your order.


Fitlinxx has been around for over 20 years. Traditionally we've embedded our technology into other products and solutions, including very popular consumer fitness devices. Over 5 million devices have been shipped with FitLinxx technology. In some respects, FitLinxx is the most popular fitness technology company no one knows. We have deep expertise in fitness and health sensors. Our technology has been used in outer space, at the Olympics and on the battlefield.


Dave Monahan | Head Guy


Dave joined FitLinxx from Microsoft in 2006 as Executive VP of Products and Markets, becoming President and CEO in 2008. With expertise in sales, marketing, engineering and growing businesses through partnerships, Dave has helped transform FitLinxx into an industry-leading provider of fitness, activity wireless healthcare devices.  Dave is an avid runner.
Doug McClure | Head of Product

Doug is a digital health expert with a successful track record in developing and commercializing IP and products in the consumer health engagement space. He leads a team of talented designers and product people that are focused on making things people want. Doug is also a "Clydesdale Triathlete" - so you know any equipment he will use can withstand real punishment.
Tom Quinlan | Head of How to Make it and then Make it

Tom has 25 years of diverse technical and business background in engineering, manufacturing and customer service with extensive experience in high-growth startup companies.  Tom leads a team of gifted and experienced engineers in the domains of signal algorithms, embedded systems, wireless communication, and advanced manufacturing.
Catherine Davis | Head of It Does What it Says it Does


Catherine joined FitLinxx in 1997. She was the first Quality Assurance person hired at FitLinxx and has spent the past 17 years ensuring that FitLinxx provides the highest quality products. It doesn't ship until Catherine says its ready to ship.
Steven Schwartz | Head of Spreading the Word

Steven joined FitLinxx in 2012 as an expert in Digital Marketing. He is responsible for all product marketing, design and messaging. If you think our materials and messages look great (and we do), you can thank him.
Eric Booth | Head of Making it Usable and Beautiful

Eric sketches, information architects, user researches, user experiences, visualizes, web-izes, mobile designs and photographs, to make ANY idea (big or small) get out this team's heads & onto paper where anything can and does happen.
Jon Thomas | Head of Product Success

Jon joined FitLinxx in 2013 with a background in customer success and implementations.  He is responsible for making FitLinxx products successful in the market and managing our partner implementations.  Jon is currently running the AmpStrip Alpha and Beta programs and driving the product towards launch this Spring.
Carrie Greeley | Head of Make it Happen


Carrie recently joined FitLinxx and is responsible for managing new and existing partners on the FitLinxx Wellness Platform.  She assists partners in optimizing the use of FitLinxx’s product suite to define, build, and implement health and wellness programs.  She makes sure things get done.
story_txt:
We have decided to suspend development of AmpStrip as a
fitness product. We are offering full
refunds to all contributors. Please visit www.ampstrip.com
to learn how to get your refund.Ask the world’s best athletes "What’s the single most important biometric you monitor while training?" and they all answer the same. Heart rate. But the devices available today have some major limitations. Heart rate straps are uncomfortable, they chafe, and can’t transmit in water. Watches are notoriously inaccurate during workouts and can’t retain much, if any, data. And because all the devices are so uncomfortable, most everybody takes them OFF when they’re not working out, losing critical data about their cardiovascular fitness, exercise recovery and readiness to train.The FitLinxx AmpStrip™ addresses these limitations and enables competitive athletes to take heart rate training to the next level. Like you, we are competitive athletes.   We understand your desire to squeeze out every last bit of performance by training right to the edge.  We know the pain and agony of a season cut short by an overtraining injury.
That's why we built the AmpStrip. AmpStrip enables athletes to “Train to the Edge” while avoiding injury. AmpStrip accurately monitors heart rate, exercise load, resting heart rate, recovery heart rate and other biometrics all day, every day, helping you understand exactly how hard you are pushing your body and where you are in the training-recovery cycle. The FitLinxx AmpStrip™ is a thin, waterproof device that tracks heart rate and activity around the clock with accuracy – all within a device as discrete and comfortable as a Band-Aid®. It can be comfortably worn all day, every day. It easily sticks to your torso and automatically tracks heart rate, activity, exercise load, skin temperature and posture.  It also provides critical fitness insights like resting heart rate and heart rate recovery.




Here are some questions that have come up from contributors during the campaign. Thanks for the feedback. Be sure to see our FAQs for more. 
Do you have plans to support ANT+ in a later version?

    We are not able get ANT+ into this round of the product, but it is definitely something we will revisit after we ship this version.  At this stage, we cannot commit to an exact time when we will support ANT+.How will you handle international orders?  Will I be charged import tax or other charges on delivery?EU customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping+VAT.  Your order will be shipped out of our UK office, and this additional contribution will cover all import/delivery charges. All other international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or other fees which may be added on import/delivery.* If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original order.

    What about Windows Phone?

    We are not planning on Windows Phone Support for product launch. But, it is something we are strongly considering for later in 2015.

    I'd love to be a Beta tester!  How will the Beta program work?

    Anyone who contributed to our Indiegogo campaign at the Podium level will be eligible for our Beta program – which is anticipated to kickoff in March 2015. We will hold a random drawing to determine who gets in.  Unfortunately, we will not be able to support everyone in the Beta, so we will be leaning toward the folks that supported us early on. 

    Will the adhesive cause any skin sensitivity or an allergic reaction?

    The AmpStrip uses a hypoallergenic medical-grade adhesive that has been tested on large populations and therefore should not cause any issues.  As with anything that touches the skin(materials, fabrics, soaps, etc.), we do anticipate that a very small percentage of the population may develop a reaction.  In these cases we will honor our money-back guarantee. 

    Will the AmpStrip work for me if I have an irregular heart beat?

    The AmpStrip is a single lead ECG that does "see" the entire QRS complex.  But, to detect an AFib or other irregular heart rate event it would need to be a medical device - which it is not.  A future version of the product may have those capabilities, but it would be marketed separately from this device.
Read More FAQs“I’m a fitness junkie and track all my biometrics with a heart rate strap.  But since I can’t wear it 24x7 I lose a ton of data about recovery and readiness.  AmpStrip SOLVES that problem."- Jenn"I have a power meter to measure my WATTs on the bike and a GPS watch for my pace on runs.  Finally there’s something for my pool and open water training that helps me improve my performance by understanding what heart rate zones I’m operating in." - Rob"I’m a serious, competitive age-grouper.  I train hard and demand the best equipment.  My AmpStrip allows me to track my heart rate not just during an event but leading up to it and during recovery.  And that’s how I stay at the top of my age group and on top of the podium." - Walter


                       











“A perfect example of where fitness tracking — or life tracking — can go as technology shrinks.”





 “…Certain kinds of athletes … would prefer to wear a discrete and nearly invisible patch on the midsection as opposed to a tracker on their wrist.”





“…Medical science has been working on a way to build health sensors into stickers. AmpStrip might have gotten there first.”


"Look, whatever, I just want one."

AmpStrip is smart enough to track all of your training activity, whether it’s running, cycling, swimming, cross fit, weights, walking or sleeping. It also knows when to take measurements like resting heart rate and heart rate recovery, without you having to do anything. It sends this data to the AmpInsights™ App (both iOS and Android) where you can track progress during and after your workouts.
  















This is our first foray into consumer products that we would sell directly - and we want to get it right. We know how to manufacture. We know how to distribute.  We need your help to innovate even faster and take the AmpStrip to the next level. Please help us change the way athletes train and compete. 
We'll be asking some of our early contributors to be part of our beta program where you'll get a Beta version of the product to test and give us feedback. Get in early and be one of the first to get an AmpStrip.







We have completed the prototyping and Alpha stages of the device development and are starting to make the Betas.   Key lessons on how to make this advanced type of wearable have been learned and incorporated; how to turn the sensor data into information and insight; how to make the durable, incredibly thin electronics over-molded device; and how to make low cost replacement adhesives that capture the heart signal and get it into the AmpStrip. Next step is to translate all of this into manufacturing at scale – something we have extensive experience doing. 





MARCH, 2015. Launch beta
OCTOBER, 2015. Ship AmpStrip starter pack to Podium Package contributors
NOVEMBER, 2015. Begin shipping AmpStrip to remainder of contributors
FEBRUARY, 2016. Publicly available.



 





Help us spread the word about AmpStrip by email and social media.  Earn a AmpStrip starter pack for every 5 friends you refer who buy AmpStrip Podium Package or better.


The fine print: Once the Indiegogo campaign is over we will apply all your earned credits for referrals to your account for use in future purchases of AmpStrips or Adhesives.  Contributors cannot refer themselves.  Only the contributor named by a referred person at the time of the referred person’s purchase will receive credit.  To receive credit, you must first be an AmpStrip Indiegogo contributor.









If you like to know the gritty details behind technology we’re happy to share!


Dimensions. The AmpStrip is 3.5 inches long, 1 inch wide and is less than one quarter of an inch thick including the adhesive. It weighs less than .4 ounces.

Sensors. AmpStrip uses a single lead ECG sensor to capture heart rate with precision. We use a 3-axis MEM’s accelerometer to detect motion in all planes which is converted by our proprietary algorithms into specific activities and effort levels. We also include a skin proximity Thermistor to detect skin temperature.

Adhesives. To begin we will offer one level of replaceable adhesive for use with AmpStrip - the Competitor grade.  Competitor grade is designed to stay on under the most rigorous conditions, including pool and ocean workouts and strenuous whole body efforts for 3 or more days.  The adhesives are bio-compatible to ISO 10993 and are the same formulations used by similar body adhesive products.

Communications. We use our patented techniques in conjunction with Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) to achieve significantly reduced energy consumption and maximize data capture and battery life. The AmpStrip is FCC and CE compatible.

Power source. The AmpStrip uses a 20 mA wireless rechargeable battery. Under constant daily use in normal conditions the battery will only need to be recharged every 7 days or so.

Housing. The sensors, processing unit and battery are housed in a fully sealed medical grade silicone module for durability and protection. The entire module is waterproof and can operate in temperatures from 40-110 degrees Fahrenheit.

Memory. Integrated memory allows for up to 24 hours of data collection between background syncing, giving users untethered freedom to train without worrying about their gear.

Processing unit. AmpStrip uses a 32-bit ARM MO processing unit to manage the continuous heart rate, activity, body position, etc. monitoring.






How much is shipping?
Shipping is free to the US and Canada.  International orders will require an additional contribution for shipping on top of the amount paid for the Perk (please see the details listed in each of the Perks).

How will you handle international orders?  Will I be charged import tax or other charges on delivery?
EU customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping+VAT.  Your order will be shipped out of our UK office, and this additional contribution will cover all import/delivery charges. 

All other international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or other fees which may be added on import/delivery.
* If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original order.
What is the AmpStrip's warranty?
The AmpStrip is backed by a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee and covered by a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty.
We are dedicated to your complete satisfaction. If you have any problems at all, simply contact our Support team at support@fitlinxx.com and we’ll make it right or issue you a full refund.
What is the AmpStrip and how does it work?
The AmpStrip is a waterproof, rechargeable, wearable device that adheres comfortably to your torso and continuously tracks your heart rate, physical activity, and other vital bio signals 24/7 – during activity, rest, recovery, and sleep.
The AmpStrip is applied to the left side of your torso, where a super-sensitive single lead ECG sensor captures a clear heart rate signal.  It uses the industry standard Bluetooth LE® to continuously communicate with your mobile app of choice and display real time data and insights.  It will store up to 24 hours of data when you’re away from your mobile device, and sync as soon as it is within range.
What  does the AmpStrip track?

  Heart rate and  heart rate zones
Resting heart rate when worn while sleeping
Heart rate recovery
Respiration
Skin temperature
Posture
Steps
Calories burned
Active time 
Sleep
Stress

What types of activities  does the AmpStrip track?
The AmpStrip is an all-day acitivty and heart rate monitor. It is designed to be worn  during workouts, rest, recovery, and sleep. It tracks  popular activities like  walking, running, cycling, swimming, cross fit,  etc..
How do I wear the AmpStrip?
The AmpStrip is worn on the left side of the torso, under the left pectoral muscle.  For women, it should be positioned just below the sports bra.  To wear it, you will put a new adhesive on it, then simply remove the backing from the adhesive and press it firmly to your body (Just like a Band-Aid®).
How long can I wear the AmpStrip?
The AmpStrip is designed to be worn all day and will last between three and seven days depending on the length and intensity of your activity.   Our AmpInsights mobile app will notify you when it’s time to remove your AmpStrip. 
How/When should I remove the AmpStrip?
You should remove the AmpStrip adhesive once the device peels away from your body enough that the data stops flowing to the App or the App tells you to change the adhesive. 
How often should I replace my adhesives?
You should replace the adhesive with a new one each time you put the AmpStrip on.  This will typically be every 3-7 days. It helps to rotate the areas where you put the AmpStrip each time. 
How much will the replacement adhesives cost?
3-6 month supply of adhesives cost $30. 
Is the battery rechargeable or does it need to be replaced?
The AmpStrip comes with a wireless recharging station. The rechargeable battery will last up to 7 days and take about 60 minutes to recharge.
Can I swim/shower/immerse the AmpStrip in water?
Yes, the AmpStrip is waterproof and the adhesives are designed to resist, absorb and release water while retaining adhesion to your body.  The AmpStrip is encased in a durable, biocompatible silicone housing for worry-free use in the pool or open water, while showering or under conditions of extreme perspiration.
Is the AmpStrip FDA approved?
No.  The AmpStrip is intended for consumer use only and is not a medical device.

Which devices are compatible with the AmpStrip?

The AmpStrip can be used with  Bluetooth LE® mobile devices such as smart phones and tablets.
Will the AmpStrip work with my existing apps? 
The AmpStrip is compatible with fitness apps that support BlueTooth LE® heart rate monitors, such as EndoMondo, MapMyRun, RunKeeper, and Strava.
Will the AmpStrip be compatible with smart watches like the Apple Watch or the Samsung Galaxy Gear?
We intend to make sure the AmpStrip will work with smart watches, but those details are not yet finalized.
Who should I contact with questions about my order?
Please contact our Support team at support@fitlinxx.com with any questions related to your order.






Fitlinxx has been around for over 20 years. Traditionally we've embedded our technology into other products and solutions, including very popular consumer fitness devices. Over 5 million devices have been shipped with FitLinxx technology. In some respects, FitLinxx is the most popular fitness technology company no one knows. We have deep expertise in fitness and health sensors. Our technology has been used in outer space, at the Olympics and on the battlefield.






Dave Monahan | Head Guy









Dave joined FitLinxx from Microsoft in 2006 as Executive VP of Products and Markets, becoming President and CEO in 2008. With expertise in sales, marketing, engineering and growing businesses through partnerships, Dave has helped transform FitLinxx into an industry-leading provider of fitness, activity wireless healthcare devices.  Dave is an avid runner.






Doug McClure | Head of Product






Doug is a digital health expert with a successful track record in developing and commercializing IP and products in the consumer health engagement space. He leads a team of talented designers and product people that are focused on making things people want. Doug is also a "Clydesdale Triathlete" - so you know any equipment he will use can withstand real punishment.



Tom Quinlan | Head of  How to Make it and then Make it






Tom has 25 years of diverse technical and business background in engineering, manufacturing and customer service with extensive experience in high-growth startup companies.  Tom leads a team of gifted and experienced engineers in the domains of signal algorithms, embedded systems, wireless communication, and advanced manufacturing.



Catherine Davis | Head of It Does What it Says it Does








Catherine joined FitLinxx in 1997. She was the first Quality Assurance person hired at FitLinxx and has spent the past 17 years ensuring that FitLinxx provides the highest quality products. It doesn't ship until Catherine says its ready to ship.



Steven Schwartz | Head of Spreading the Word






Steven joined FitLinxx in 2012 as an expert in Digital Marketing. He is responsible for all product marketing, design and messaging. If you think our materials and messages look great (and we do), you can thank him.



Eric Booth | Head of Making it Usable and Beautiful







Eric sketches, information architects, user researches, user experiences, visualizes, web-izes, mobile designs and photographs, to make ANY idea (big or small) get out this team's heads & onto paper where anything can and does happen.



Jon Thomas | Head of Product Success






Jon joined FitLinxx in 2013 with a background in customer success and implementations.  He is responsible for making FitLinxx products successful in the market and managing our partner implementations.  Jon is currently running the AmpStrip Alpha and Beta programs and driving the product towards launch this Spring.



Carrie Greeley | Head of Make it Happen







Carrie recently joined FitLinxx and is responsible for managing new and existing partners on the FitLinxx Wellness Platform.  She assists partners in optimizing the use of FitLinxx’s product suite to define, build, and implement health and wellness programs.  She makes sure things get done.

story:
The Need

One of the primary felt needs in our neighborhood is for safe places where children can play, learn and engage in healthy creative activities. The summer months are particularly difficult for families due to the lack of quality, affordable summer programs in Southwest Baltimore. Many children in our neighborhood spend hours every day completely unsupervised – wandering the streets or watching hours and hours of television. This leaves them susceptible to many negative influences and unsafe situations.

The Camp

This summer, Wilkens Avenue Mennonite Church, with the help of volunteers from InterVarsity Christian Fellowship's Baltimore Urban Program, will once again be running a 4-week Summer Day Camp for kids in the Mt. Clare Neighborhood of Southwest Baltimore. Our vision is to provide a safe, nurturing, and enriching environment for kids in the Mt. Clare Community.

Help make this camp happen!

We want to invite you to help us make this Day Camp happen! Any contribution that you are able to give is appreciated. Help us provide healthy snacks, buy arts and crafts supplies and recreational equipment, or sponsor a field trip!

story:
Natural Light for Mind, Body and Soul!


"We have a Bottled Sunshine lamp in our bedroom. When I am getting ready to go to bed, the warm evening light is so inviting and comforting.  And in the morning, I love how energizing the natural morning light is - makes me feel ready to go tackle the day (even before coffee!)”
- Krista B. in Albany CA

“I love the lamp and the way the lighting mirrors the arc of the sun from dawn to dusk.”
- Roger R. in Alamo California

"I live in Michigan which has long winter with grey sky on most days. Bottled Sunshine sits at the center of our kitchen island and lets us forget the outside.  Its changing light from warm to cool gets my kids active and going out the door in the morning and then the shift from cool to warm calms them down as we finish dinner and get ready for bed. It is really setting the rhythm of our house." 
- Sonali V. in Ann Arbor Michigan

“I love the warm evening glow - particularly on a cold and dark Norwegian winter evening.”
- John T. in Oslo Norway

“My family has been lucky enough to have a prototype light in our home and we LOVE it. Even though our house is bathed in natural light during the day, we enjoy our Bottled Sunshine on the dark winter mornings when it shines with a dawn-like light and helps us get our day rolling. When evening falls so early the house feels so cozy with our lamp switched on. We feel like we have candles burning or something. It is a warm cozy light that makes us feel calm and happy.”
- Jillian B. in El Cerrito CA.

 “We've placed Bottled Sunshine on both sides of our bedside table, and we love the soft/warm evening light.”
- Uli K. in Mainz Germany

“We have been using the lamp extensively for two months and we LOVE it. Our house gets plenty of natural sunlight during the day so mostly we use the lamp at night to set the tone for our infant daughter (and ourselves). The soft, amber glow is beautiful and really helps as a cue for our household to start winding down once the sun sets. It’s basically the only light we use after 9pm to make sure our baby isn’t getting mixed messages during late night or early morning feedings.”
- Todd J. in Charleston South Carolina

 "I absolutely love noticing the colors change!"
- Sandy D. in Naples Florida

"One or two nights each week I have late evening conference calls with China-based coworkers and using bottled sunshine has made all the difference.  Instead of feeling ‘wired’, bottled sunshine casts a soft candle-light glow making it easier to relax and fall asleep after my calls end."  
- Hamlin M. in Minneapolis Minnesota

“Your craftsmanship is superb. Well done.”
- Anonymous, in Menlo Park California

“Bottled Sunshine is easy on the eyes in both the looks department and in it's soft sunset glow in the evening. For many years I've experimented with lighting that mimics the natural light cycle, but with little luck. Sunlight Inside cracked the code. It's a great addition to my bedside table. After I bought it, my wife got jealous, so I ordered a second one!”
- Josh M. in Fairfax California

“We are enjoying our bottled sunshine lamp since its purchase. It is on most of the time in a windowless room which keeps us connected with the outside. I particularly like that it's functional right out of the box and doesn't need an app or a phone to make is shine."
- Steve P. in Saratoga CA
 

 

experience light the way nature intended

We evolved with natural light.  Until 100 years ago our days were filled with bright sunlight, and our evenings were lit with the soft warm glow of a flame.  We are programmed to respond to the daily and seasonal variations of natural light.  We feel bright and energized on a sunny day, and down on rainy days, during dark winter months or when we’ve been stuck inside for too long.  Exposure to light is what drives our hormone cycles and synchronizes our circadian rhythms – profoundly impacting how we feel, work, play and rest.  Unfortunately, most of us don’t get enough natural light during the day and get too much artificial light at night.  The science linking light and health is clear, and the technology to recreate natural light is now available.  We founded Sunlight Inside to design and build products which deliver the benefits of natural light!




 

We've been shipping bottled sunshine since December! 

Is there someone in your life who struggles with sleep, or has the winter blues?  Is your family blessed with a new baby or a moody teenager?   Is it difficult for you to get outside regularly?  Do you know someone who works in a windowless cubicle?  Our bottled sunshine lamps automatically produce sunlight during the day (to boost your mood/energy) and then switch to candle light at night to make it easier to unwind and sleep.  Our lamps are hand-made in California from locally sourced materials, order now so you don't miss our limited 2016 vintage production!



Natural light is full spectrum and dynamic, ranging from bright and cool during the day to soft and warm in the evenings.  These daily cycles of sunlight (rich with bio-active blue) and candle or fire light at night (reddish light with no bio-active blue) are a cornerstone of our health and wellness.  For the first time, a new class of LED light engines makes it possible to deliver these daily and seasonal cycles of natural light by actively mixing together the different colors of the rainbow!  These next-generation light sources are now being adopted in high-end design projects around the world – unfortunately you can’t get this technology without talking to an architect or lighting designer and hiring contractors.   We founded Sunlight Inside to make natural light available in simple, easy to use products which you can buy direct!   


Our first product is a simple and elegant table lamp which automatically delivers the daily and seasonal cycles natural light right out of the box – just plug it in, there is nothing to install and nothing to set-up!   We believe that natural light is the smartest light - so we preset bottled sunshine to match your address before it ships - you don’t ever need to connect it to a smartphone or wifi router!    Now if you want more control than Mother Nature provides, our products are Bluetooth enabled.  You can pair bottled sunshine with the Sunn App to track natural light anywhere in the world.  You can pair bottled sunshine with a commissioning App for full color gamut control to perfectly match your light to your aesthetic!     We have more awesome features in the works (stay tuned).   These Apps provide unlimited control, but remember they are entirely optional - bottled sunshine delivers natural light right out of the box - just plug it in and enjoy the perfect light at every time of day!  


We need your help to bring the benefits of natural light back into people's lives!  Our experienced team has been testing and refining prototypes over the past year and we started producing and shipping our first bottled sunshine lamps in December.  We are seeking more feedback and referrals, and are working to grow our community of early adopters!  Check out our Sunlight Inside website (www.sunlightinside.com) for more details on the products, benefits and science.  Order now to be among the very first to enjoy the benefits of natural light.  Consider giving the gift of natural light to brighten the lives of your friends and loved ones!   Please help us spread the word about the benefits of natural light – email us about our referral program to learn about rewards and discounts!



Sunlight Inside delivers the perfect light for all ages!   Bring bottled sunshine home to brighten your space and lift your mood with extra sunlight during the day.  Relax and connect with candle light in the evenings, and then recover and sleep with fire light at night.   Give natural light to new parents so they can take care of night time feedings and diaper changes without stimulating the baby or the caregiver!   Studies show that sunlight improves concentration in students which makes bottled sunshine the perfect homework light.  Bring natural light to your office to offset those ugly flourescents and boost your productivity.   Use bottled sunshine for extra sunlight to brighten those winter blues.  Give natural light to lift the spirits of an aging loved one who can’t get outside as much as they like.  Don’t settle for artificial light, Sunlight Inside is light the way nature intended!



We’re an experienced team of scientists, engineers and designers dedicated to unlocking the benefits of natural light.  We believe that business should be a force for positive change, and this infuses everything we do.  We believe that every dollar spent and hour worked should help make the world a better place.  Our products are energy efficient and are designed to last over 20+ years - we build them out of glass, metal and wood (almost no plastic).  We source and build our products in California, do our best to pay a living wage, and use sustainable sources wherever possible.  Our goal is to deliver the benefits of natural light to as many people as possible, so we’re pricing our products close our initial costs - we need your help to drive the volumes we need to bring natural light back into more people's lives.  We do not use sales gimmicks, nor are we able to offer aggressive discounts - we treat our customers, employees and suppliers as family - these products are designed to benefit everyone in our community.  Please help us give the gift of natural light this winter!  We've also extended our giving campaign = for every twenty bottled sunshine lamps we sell, we’ll donate one to Hospice.  Your orders and referrals will help us brighten someone’s final days with the gift of natural light!

are a cornerstone of our health and wellness.  For the first time, a new class of LED light engines makes it possible to deliver these daily and seasonal cycles of natural light by actively mixing together the different colors of the rainbow!  These next-generation light sources are now being adopted in high-end design projects around the world – unfortunately you can’t get this technology without talking to an architect or lighting designer and hiring contractors.   We founded Sunlight Inside to make natural light available in simple, easy to use products which you can buy direct!   Our first product is a simple and elegant table lamp which automatically delivers the daily and seasonal cycles natural light right out of the box – just plug it in, there is nothing to install and nothing to set-up!   We believe that natural light is the smartest light - so we preset bottled sunshine to match your address before it ships - you don’t ever need to connect it to a smartphone or wifi router!    Now if you want more control than Mother Nature provides, our products are Bluetooth enabled.  You can pair bottled sunshine with the Sunn App to track natural light anywhere in the world.  You can pair bottled sunshine with a commissioning App for full color gamut control to perfectly match your light to your aesthetic!     We have more awesome features in the works (stay tuned).   These Apps provide unlimited control, but remember they are entirely optional - bottled sunshine delivers natural light right out of the box - just plug it in and enjoy the perfect light at every time of day!  We need your help to bring the benefits of natural light back into people's lives!  Our experienced team has been testing and refining prototypes over the past year and we started producing and shipping our first bottled sunshine lamps in December.  We are seeking more feedback and referrals, and are working to grow our community of early adopters!  Check out our Sunlight Inside website (www.sunlightinside.com) for more details on the products, benefits and science.  Order now to be among the very first to enjoy the benefits of natural light.  Consider giving the gift of natural light to brighten the lives of your friends and loved ones!   Please help us spread the word about the benefits of natural light – email us about our referral program to learn about rewards and discounts!Sunlight Inside delivers the perfect light for all ages!   Bring bottled sunshine home to brighten your space and lift your mood with extra sunlight during the day.  Relax and connect with candle light in the evenings, and then recover and sleep with fire light at night.   Give natural light to new parents so they can take care of night time feedings and diaper changes without stimulating the baby or the caregiver!   Studies show that sunlight improves concentration in students which makes bottled sunshine the perfect homework light.  Bring natural light to your office to offset those ugly flourescents and boost your productivity.   Use bottled sunshine for extra sunlight to brighten those winter blues.  Give natural light to lift the spirits of an aging loved one who can’t get outside as much as they like.  Don’t settle for artificial light, Sunlight Inside is light the way nature intended!We’re an experienced team of scientists, engineers and designers dedicated to unlocking the benefits of natural light.  We believe that business should be a force for positive change, and this infuses everything we do.  We believe that every dollar spent and hour worked should help make the world a better place.  Our products are energy efficient and are designed to last over 20+ years - we build them out of glass, metal and wood (almost no plastic).  We source and build our products in California, do our best to pay a living wage, and use sustainable sources wherever possible.  Our goal is to deliver the benefits of natural light to as many people as possible, so we’re pricing our products close our initial costs - we need your help to drive the volumes we need to bring natural light back into more people's lives.  We do not use sales gimmicks, nor are we able to offer aggressive discounts - we treat our customers, employees and suppliers as family - these products are designed to benefit everyone in our community.  Please help us give the gift of natural light this winter!  We've also extended our giving campaign = for every twenty bottled sunshine lamps we sell, we’ll donate one to Hospice.  Your orders and referrals will help us brighten someone’s final days with the gift of natural light!

story:
We have created MiniDive to allow everyone to breathe normally underwater for several minutes regardless of the application and be able to fill himself his own breath system.

Main application is for pleasure to see underwater life like swimming with fishes rather than watching them from the surface.

But it’s also made for others applications and fields like boating when sailors and boaters need to check or scratch something under a hull.

MiniDive Pro is a mini scuba tank that give you the possibility to breathe underwater for 5 to 10 minutes, autonomy depends of several parameters but mainly of your physical activity.

MiniDive Pro is very easy to use, you put it in an harness especially designed for and you have hands free to swim underwater.

Specials hand made protections has also been designed to dress it and protect from small shocks.

You don’t feel the MiniDive Pro underwater, it’s very light and compact.

MiniDive Pro has a 0,5 L (30,5 cu in) aluminium tank, better than steel for rust and weight.

A patent was even filed to protect the product.

The interest of the MiniDive Pro is its ease of filling by the user.

There are 4 ways to fill the tank :

• A special high pressure hand pump very simply to use (just like a bicycle pump) can fill entirely the tank anywhere you are

• A mini electric compressor that you can plug in any 220 V plug (or 12 V plug with an inverter)

In addition the tank can also be filled by :

• Another (bigger) classic scuba tank (need a little adapter called "filling station" to transfer the air), DIN and a yoke models are available

• A classic diving compressor (directly) in the DIN valve available in all dive shops

For those who want more autonomy, the MiniDive Pro has another advantage.

You can remove (very simply - screw/unscrew) the air tank from the regulator system, so you can easily change an empty tank by a full one.

You can dive several times without having to buy as many MiniDive Pro.

A special harness has also been developed to attach the MiniDive Pro to the torso, it’s very simple to fix it with just few clips and press studs.

The materials used have been selected and tested to withstand stringent conditions.

• The priority in the design was the safety of products towards the user, that either during storage, during use underwater or during filling, even if there is an unintentional manipulation

• Scuba diving is a potentially hazardous activity if the user doesn't respect  basic safety instructions. Although the product is intended for non-divers users, it has been thought by divers. Products are intended for people who are comfortable in the sea and trained to swim underwater

• With the product, are included safety instructions and the behaviors to follow and avoid, all this is provided in the manual & safety instructions that the user must be aware before use the product

• A reminder of the most important information is on the mouthpiece (2nd stage regulator) like you can see below

• All products answers to the scuba diving mandatory standards (EN250, 2014/68/EU, etc…)

• Just one example to show the importance that is given to the security : the tank that contains the compressed air has a pressure service (maximum operating pressure) of 200 bar (3000 psi), but it is tested at 300 bar (4350 psi) and burst pressure is 470,7 bar (6827 psi)

Some others dive masters participated to the project, especially to define the general public use and risk awareness.

MiniDive is a French start-up, founded in 2016 by two friends who wish to make the shallow scuba diving accessible to everyone. 
The project started in 2015 with the idea the breath freely and normally during several minutes underwater with something as lighter and compact as possible while being able to fill itself the breathing system. One year later we have solution tested hundred times to do it and we’re proud to show you that in here. 
All has been done beforehand to assemble the products on time, we strive to deliver our backers on time, following the success of the campaign and if there are unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide you an estimated delivery date.

story:
If you realize that making time for fitness is often a challenge in your busy world, then now, WISENFIT designs smart solutions that maximize your time and efforts while giving you more time to enjoy life.

OVERVIEW

  • 30 mins training = 2 hours workout
  • Burn more calories and fasten the metabolism
  • Grow muscle efficiently and increase strength effectively
  • Improve endurance level and accelerate power rehabilitation
  • Relax your muscle and speed up recovery
  • Multiple modes and continuous APP upgradation available

 

 

Traditional EMS devices used to be complicated and expensive. During the rapid development of E-textiles science since the 2010s, EMS technology becomes widely used by fitness enthusiasts and successfully remarketed and reintroduced to the masses in the forms of EMS training studios and EMS sportswear.

In 2016, we completed the development and manufacture of Wisnefit-EMS suits, but it still required bulky wires and external hub(battery). Of course, that inconvenience is hard to accepted by the mass. So we decided to redesign the whole structure and make it from Suits to Sportswear.

In 2018, Wisenfit made an innovative breakthrough in electro-fabric and phone-powered technology, then thoroughly test in 2019. Finally, we achieve the lightest and the most comfortable EMS clothing in the world.

After only a few weeks of regular practice, you may achieve desired results such as muscle strengthening or shaping, fat burning, and muscle relaxation.  That's why EMS gaining popularity with athletes and average gym-goers alike.

The effects achieved by EMS during a workout is similar to the results obtained by increasing the level of weight resistance during exercise— the higher the current density, the more massive the resistance. For this reason, we recommend using EMS no more than 30 minutes in a workout as it is equivalent to 2 full hours of intensive training sessions. 

Thanks to the portability of WISENFIT, EMS training is no longer limited to members of EMS training centers and studios. WISENFIT users can also combine our product into training sessions for optimal results.

After stimulating the growth of muscles, these active muscles will continue to burn even within a few hours after exercise. Our body system can continue to maintain a higher metabolism, and prolong the calorie consumption. 

WISENFIT can be used for practical EMS-assisted training at any time, whether for static or dynamic exercises so that endurance can be effectively improved during each workout. Studies conducted on animals by NASA have proven the positive effects on the muscle-skeletal system by long-term use of EMS.  

Muscle release is one of the widely-recognized usages of EMS technology. In the quiescent state of motion, the WISENFIT relaxation mode can regularly emit pulse signals that cause the muscles to contract and relax.  WISENFIT can also be used to help relax the stiff shoulder, neck, and back muscles of office workers and anyone else who must sit or stand for long periods. Since EMS can speed up metabolism, it has the overall potential to relieve pain and accelerate muscle recovery.

Yes, muscles move autonomously and Wisenfit brings an effect enhancement while you are training. It feels like using a fascia gun.

The total weight of Wisenfit is about 400g, almost the same weight as a can of Coca.  

Don't worry about the battery, the power consumption is really very low, even lower than your earphone.  

The fabric has high resilience, which ensures the comfortability of wearing and makes sure it is fit enough to a workout.

Conductive fabric offers the softness and malleability of material, while also having electrical properties. Wisenfit adopts the best in class materials 'Conductive rubber by Carbon Nanotubes,' and that will make our users feel like touch to a second skin. Compare to the other EMS devices. The users do not require to spray water to the power zone before wearing it!

The sportswear is highly durable. It can be washed by a washing machine, but not only limited to hand washing. It is highly recommended to wash it in a laundry bag to prolong the washability. WISENFIT easily withstood over 1000+ hours of washing machine testing.

We understand that EMS applies electrical stimulation to various muscle groups while the individual performs exercise movements. Here is the working principle behind this.

EMS generates electrical pulses that stimulate the human muscles by simulating the brain’s natural electrical pulses and standard input-output patterns.

Wisenfit is so easy to use in just a few steps:

1. Put it on and connect the shirt with the pants/ trousers by the inner snap

2. Connect your mobile with the sportswear by the outer snap

3. Open the APP and choose the mode

4. Put your mobile in the pocket, and you are ready to go! 

Each mode corresponds to different electrical stimulation intensities and intervals that suit various applications and scenarios. 

WISENFIT can also be used to help relax the stiff shoulder, neck, and back muscles of office workers and anyone else who must sit or stand for long periods. 

Now, access to EMS fitness will no longer be limited only to professional athletes— now fitness enthusiasts around the world can also enjoy staying in great shape.

Risks and challenges

Logistics and Customs
Wisenfit-EMS is a new type of product. We reckon that customs may request further clarification on the product, so the users need to understand the nature and use of the product. At the same time, because international logistics is involved, there may be delays in logistics delivery. We will try our best to track and urge third-party logistics companies to deliver our products to customers as soon as possible.

Product iteration
After the first generation of products, our team has a passion for further improving our products. However, every update iteration needs to go through much work, which may take a certain amount of time. We hope both our prospective and current users can understand and wait patiently for the upcoming products. 

Product Size
The product needs to be attached close to the skin while using it. Meanwhile, we pay great attention to the user experience, so we are also aware of the importance of comfortability when wearing the product. As a result, we strive to choose the best material for clothes. However, please do understand that each person's body size is different, so we can only meet the needs of most users as much as possible. However, every individual's experience may differ due to various body types.

story:
Stand up paddling (SUP) is one of the fastest-growing water sports nowadays. Within a few seconds and requiring no tools SCUBAJET turns every stock board into a powerful e-SUP-board. On top of that, SCUBAJET can be used for other water sports, like canoeing, dingys and even for diving.

While conventional diving scooters are often big and bulky and weight between 10 and 25 kg (22 to 55 lbs.), the SCUBAJET has a streamlined appearance with only 3 kg (6.6 lbs.) including the Dive Adapter. Additionally underwater scooters are most often unwieldy, whereas the SCUBAJET allows to decide even during the dive whether to be used or not. If the SCUBAJET is not needed at the moment, it can simply be fixed to the buoyancy compensator – without any compromises. This simple solution is unique, there's nothing like it on the market. 

The SCUBAJET is constructed for max. pressure of 6 bar/87psi. We use a special shaft seal that can handle this amount of pressure. The theoretical depth limit based on the pressure is max. 50m/196ft. We give a warranty up to 45m/147ft.

 

 

 

One of the big advantages is the innovative adapter system that provides various possibilities to use SCUBAJET on any imaginable water sports equipment. No technical skills are needed at any point. The plug&play system and the water resistant remote control make it easy to start, stop and select different speeds while using it on the water.

 

Take your existing board or equipment and extend it with SCUBAJET easily. Select the appropiate adpater and you are ready to go in a few seconds. We provide adapters for SUP, kanu, dinghi boats and dive. Many of the adapters use standardized finplugs for maximum convenience. By now we support and provide adapters for more than 20 different manufactures and many of them use standardized finplugs. So it's easy for us to provide compatible adapters. 

 

One of these Finbox Adapter is included with every SCUBAJET: 

  • Future Fin System  
  • O'Fish'l Fin System  
  • LokBox Fin System  
  • ProBox Fin System  
  • US Finbox System   
  • Sevylor Fin System  
  • FCS II Fin System

Special Adapter (available as pledges) 

  • Dive Adapter (speed and motor activation can be controlled directly on the adapter)  
  • Dinghi Adapter (will be delivered with a trim function and pivot up/down)  
  • Kayacat Adapter (can be pivot up/down – for sailing for example)  
  • Universal Adapter Boats/Kayak/Kanu (Tilt/Trim, steering with original rudder or with the Scubajet Adapter, self-supporting swivel arm, adapater will be fixed with 4 screws)

Until now we support the following manufactures. We continuously extend the list. If you can't find the right adapter, please inform us about the desired manufacturer and we'll get in touch to put it on our adapter request list.

 

Upcoming Adapter in the next months:

  • Hobie Adapter that fits into the MirageDrive box  
  • ONAK Adapter  
  • Universal Adapter for SUP  
  • Universal Adapter for KANU/KAYAKS- DIY Adapter Templates

 

Our electric motor allows you to go further to find your perfect spot to enjoy. You are able to stay on the water longer and tackle bigger trips with your water buddies. SCUBAJET brings you back to the shore safely and is made for active people and sports enthusiasts as well as families.

 

 

 

 

 

SCUBAJET offers various engine mappings for scuba diving (slow speed and long battery lifetime), power mode (short high speed sprints), SUP (paddling support or surfing without paddle) or freehand. 

We have tested and implemented a bunch of great features like the SmartPower Technology. It offers long battery time up to 240 minutes with the internal battery and up to 720 minutes with the external battery pack. The external battery pack will be available with beginning of 2017.

 

Due to the latest safety and security regulations for batteries, there is a limit of two spare batteries per person for the larger lithium ion batteries (up to 160 wh per battery). But as we know traveling is particulary important of many water sports fans, it was very important to us to meet your expectations and so we now provide a travel battery pack that consists of 2x160 wh batteries, that is allowed on airplanes!

 

 

 

Measuring only 58 cm (~22 inch) length and a diameter of 7,2cm (~2,8 inch) and weighing just 3kg (~6,6 lbs), SCUBAJET is easy to transport and fits in every backpack.

 

 

You can control the SCUBAJET easily with the included remote control. Three buttons control all the functions, for increasing/decreasing speed, as well as to spot the engine. The auto-shut off system stops the engine immediately if you fall into the water and it will also be used for initial power on SCUBAJET over magnetic switch. SCUBAJET is also safe for kids as well since we use jet-power instead of regular propeller motors.

 

Every SCUBAJET has a high tech LED light in the front with 500 Lumen.

It's not only super practical while staying on the water during your canoe-, dinghi- or SUP trip for underwater lighting, its also possible to use the lamp without the engine unit. The lamp alone is also proofed for a depth of 45m.

And that's not all! If you need more Lumen for diving as example you will be able to upgrade the lamp to 1.500 Lumen or add it as accessory.

 

During the entire development process, SCUBAJET was used by a lot of different people to get their opinion and as much feedback as possible.

 

We've started to create a jet-engine for different applications two years ago and we already started the serial production, so it's a great opportunity for you to get the best price ever for the SCUBAJET.  

Patrizia has always been a sporting ace and a real water lover. She grew up in Italy near Lake Constance and pursued her water hobbies ever since. Three years ago, her daughter was born and she was confronted with reconciling family life and her beloved hobby. She didn't want to give up water sports but she felt insecure about taking her daughter on the SUP board. "What if there is a thunderstorm coming up?", was one of the thoughts fostering her tentativeness. In addition, she wanted to take the whole family to the water without buying a motorboat to enjoy the beautiful summer in Carinthia.

Out of these thoughts the idea of creating a flexible motor for water sports emerged. Consequently, her boyfriend Armin and his father Gert developed the SCUBAJET. Nowadays, Patrizia enjoys standing on her SUP board together with her daughter to escape the crowds at Lake Wörth's beaches.

Patrizia has a strong background in marketing in the sea freight industry. With SCUBAJET she turns her hobby into profession.

 

Please help us to make our dreams come true, share our amazing project and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for further news.
story_txt:
Water sports are a great way to exercise, but in life, it’s all about choices. SCUBAJET accepts the challenge and brings some of the most popular aquatic activities to the next level. The water sports gear allows to make decisions based on individual needs or habits by combining motor power and paddling.  Comparable to an e-bike, it turns your aquatic equipment into fast, comfortable and reliable devices.Stand up paddling (SUP) is one of the fastest-growing water sports nowadays. LokBox Fin System  
ProBox Fin System  
US Finbox System   
Sevylor Fin System  
FCS II Fin System
Special Adapter (available as pledges) 
Dive Adapter (speed and motor activation can be controlled directly on the adapter)  
Dinghi Adapter (will be delivered with a trim function and pivot up/down)  
Kayacat Adapter (can be pivot up/down – for sailing for example)  
Universal Adapter Boats/Kayak/Kanu (Tilt/Trim, steering with original rudder or with the Scubajet Adapter, self-supporting swivel arm, adapater will be fixed with 4 screws)
Until now we support the following manufactures. We continuously extend the list. If you can't find the right adapter, please inform us about the desired manufacturer and we'll get in touch to put it on our adapter request list.manufacturers Upcoming Adapter in the next months:
Hobie Adapter that fits into the MirageDrive box  
ONAK Adapter  
Universal Adapter for SUP  
Universal Adapter for KANU/KAYAKS- DIY Adapter Templates
 Our electric motor allows you to go further to find your perfect spot to enjoy. You are able to stay on the water longer and tackle bigger trips with your water buddies. SCUBAJET brings you back to the shore safely and is made for active people and sports enthusiasts as well as families. the handy dive adapter SCUBAJET on SUP-board with kids in a dinghi on the water perfect for snorkeling SCUBAJET offers various engine mappings for scuba diving (slow speed and long battery lifetime), power mode (short high speed sprints), SUP (paddling support or surfing without paddle) or freehand. We have tested and implemented a bunch of great features like the SmartPower Technology. It offers long battery time up to 240 minutes with the internal battery and up to 720 minutes with the external battery pack. The external battery pack will be available with beginning of 2017. Due to the latest safety and security regulations for batteries, there is a limit of two spare batteries per person for the larger lithium ion batteries (up to 160 wh per battery). But as we know traveling is particulary important of many water sports fans, it was very important to us to meet your expectations and so we now provide a travel battery pack that consists of 2x160 wh batteries, that is allowed on airplanes! 
   Measuring only 58 cm (~22 inch) length and a diameter of 7,2cm (~2,8 inch) and weighing just 3kg (~6,6 lbs), SCUBAJET is easy to transport and fits in every backpack.  You can control the SCUBAJET easily with the included remote control. Three buttons control all the functions, for increasing/decreasing speed, as well as to spot the engine. The auto-shut off system stops the engine immediately if you fall into the water and it will also be used for initial power on SCUBAJET over magnetic switch. SCUBAJET is also safe for kids as well since we use jet-power instead of regular propeller motors. Every SCUBAJET has a high tech LED light in the front with 500 Lumen.It's not only super practical while staying on the water during your canoe-, dinghi- or SUP trip for underwater lighting, its also possible to use the lamp without the engine unit. The lamp alone is also proofed for a depth of 45m.And that's not all! If you need more Lumen for diving as example you will be able to upgrade the lamp to 1.500 Lumen or add it as accessory. 
 

 

 

 

 

 
During the entire development process, SCUBAJET was used by a lot of different people to get their opinion and as much feedback as possible. We've started to create a jet-engine for different applications two years ago and we already started the serial production, so it's a great opportunity for you to get the best price ever for the SCUBAJET.   Scope of delivery: SCUBAJET, charger, remote control, finbox adapter
After we receive your order you can choose between different adapters for SUP (FCS II Fin System, Future Fin System, O'Fish'l Fin System, LokBox Fin System, ProBox Fin Systems, US Finbox System) or kanu (Sevylor, universal adapter).
 
 Patrizia has always been a sporting ace and a real water lover. She grew up in Italy near Lake Constance and pursued her water hobbies ever since. Three years ago, her daughter was born and she was confronted with reconciling family life and her beloved hobby. She didn't want to give up water sports but she felt insecure about taking her daughter on the SUP board. "What if there is a thunderstorm coming up?", was one of the thoughts fostering her tentativeness. In addition, she wanted to take the whole family to the water without buying a motorboat to enjoy the beautiful summer in Carinthia.Out of these thoughts the idea of creating a flexible motor for water sports emerged. Consequently, her boyfriend Armin and his father Gert developed the SCUBAJET. Nowadays, Patrizia enjoys standing on her SUP board together with her daughter to escape the crowds at Lake Wörth's beaches.Patrizia has a strong background in marketing in the sea freight industry. With SCUBAJET she turns her hobby into profession. Please help us to make our dreams come true, share our amazing project and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for further news.

story:
Short Summary

Reunion Care puts seniors in the driver’s seat. Aging is a journey best travelled with a map and emergency kit for the road ahead. A senior’s retirement journey requires careful planning, declarations and organization that involves all the important people in your life. Reunion Care combines healthcare, health, social services, legal and financial services into one integrated model that eliminates the brick walls that separated and compartmentalized these worlds. Reunion Care empowers each senior to record goals and aspirations into a personalized life record for your journey ahead. BON VOYAGE!



 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $3,000.00 to pay for the invitations to seniors, family members and health care providers to join the Reunion Care pilot. It also covers the marketing campaign that accompanies the personal invitations we send.

Your contribution enables us to reach you parents and grandparents.  Eighty percent of Americans say they want to stay home as they age and live independently.  The family home is filled with memories.   A place where everyone can gather and relive the good times.  However aging changes our abilities and our needs.  Reunion Care is your tool to bridge that gaps that are created as our health care needs change.  The Reunion Care resource section contains over 80 different resources that we will make available to you in exchange for your contribution.  We invite you to use them to assist your own family members in their aging journey of safe and independent living.  

All the contributions will be used to advance the implementation of Reunion Care and other Dovetail Care, Inc. software.

 

The Impact

Your contributions will enable us to test our software with a large group of senior citizens, their family and friends and health care providers.  This pilot project shows insurance companies and other customers that  purchasing Reunion Care does keep seniors out of hospitals and nursing homes and support their personal health journey.  Join us, your contribution benefits seniors and connects us together. 

Electronic Health Record Patent Portals and  patient engagement organizations strive to empower consumers as we do with Reunion Care.  Our difference is two fold.  Reunion Care's central focus is creating and activating a Circle of Care.  The senior user invites family, friends and professionals to join in his/her health journey.  Circle of Care members use the six forms of communication to create a well coordinated care plan.  The second difference is we build concentric circles of long term service and support by inviting community based resources, financial and legal professionals to join with all the health care providers in the senior consumer’s Circle of Care.  We extend health care’s reach into the neighborhood where each senior lives.

Thank you in advance for joining our revolution to transform health care.  Reunion Care targets seniors and their family where the Affordable Care Act has the greatest impact right now.  Your participation in Reunion Care helps us to do what banking did a decade ago – move the control of information from the institution out to the consumer/owner. Your contribution helps to  accelerate the consumer empowerment movement to chart your own personalized health journey.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways to show your support for Dovetail Care, Inc.’s Reunion Care.  Talk about us!  Give us your buzz to your doctors, social workers, nurses, insurance company but most importantly to your family and friends.  You are our very best marketing tool.  Your words support our efforts to get the attention of insurance companies who can afford to provide this for their Medicare and Medicaid insured.  Indiegogo share tools are the quickest and easiest way to make this happen.  Go ahead, talk about us!

story:
EVAN GIRARD  - World University Games


MATTHEW HUDEC  - European Championships


SCOTT PERRAS  - OLYMPICS

These three Saskatchewan born athletes have been selected to represent Canada and race in Europe.  All train over 700 hours per year in pursuit of excellence.

This campaign is designed to help offset the steep team fees these athletes must pay to travel to Europe and race for Canada.  You can make a difference...

Other Ways You Can Help

  • help get the word out by showing how much noise you can make on facebook twitter,    
  • request the song "My First Beer Was A Pilsner" on your local radio station.  Each time the song is played on the radio, the athletes get the writer's share of the royalties.
  • support with a "perk" of your choice  - Trading Card, Signed 8X 10 photo, limited edition CD, Giant Poster, Biathlon Canada Toque, Official World Cup Race Bib, Ticket to The First Annual Non-Supper
