story:
Scrumptious, Gluten Free, High Protein Snacks made with Sprouted Grains, Honey, and a Variety of Super-Foods.


Millions of people today are in need of all natural foods and are seeking to better their quality of life through diet and exercise.  Grocery stores are filled with products that claim to be healthy but are filled with processed sugars, sugar substitutes, preservatives and other unwanted ingredients. People are looking for all natural ways to satisfy their food cravings and nourish themselves when they are on the go. Our mission is to provide you with great tasting, non-toxic, organic snacks that leave you feeling energized and satisfied.

As a personal trainer with a long and intimate history of Crohn’s disease I sought to improve my health through improved diet and exercise. After spending two years recreating all of my favorite foods I developed this line of Bodhi Snacks that are easy to digest and made with all natural super-foods.


We make our Bodhi Snacks with the freshest, most nutrient dense ingredients. They are filled with fiber, protein, and healthy fats such as Omega 3's. They contain much needed minerals such as Iron, Calcium, Potassium, Magnesium, and Zinc ; as well as Vitamin C and E keep you going strong all day long. Help us produce our first large run of this unique and remarkable product by finding a perk you like and pledging.

What do we need the money for?

We have finalized the recipes to our first line of products, and with your help we will be able to produce them on a large scale. We need $15,000 for our first large production run, this includes the ingredient cost, labeling, and custom packaging. We will need an additional $5,500 to purchase extra stand mixers, and large quantities of commercial muffin trays and baking sheets. It will cost us $2,000 to certify our Bodhi Snacks as organic and gluten free, $2,500 for legal fees and insurance, and $5,000 for a marketing budget. We need your help to raise a total of $30,000.

(Our special recipe, Beat Coconut, going into the oven!)

What goes into a Bodhi Snack?

We make our products out of the freshest organic fruits and vegetables, honey, light coconut milk , and sprouted gluten free grains. Each recipe is packed with flavor, high in protein, filled with vitamins and minerals to keep you energized throughout your day. Have on as a mid-day snack to give you a boost, or as a perfect pre/post workout snack.


We also make these Bodhi Snacks out of Organic Date Sugar, that means we have Vegan versions of each flavor!




The Bodhi Living Food Story:

A couple of years ago while working as a personal trainer in NYC juggling a hectic life style i found it hard to find the foods that I need to eat on the go. My clients would always ask what they should be eating. I encouraged them to eat clean healthy foods and increase their protein intake. I had always enjoyed cooking and baking, and began recreating all of my favorite food items in a healthy manner. There would always be plenty of extra left over so I handed them out to my friends, coworkers, and clients,  and people began to ask for fresh batches of snacks. After i felt i had some delicious recipes and a unique product, I partnered up with my friend who is also a personal trainer and we spent last 6 months doing the research to make this a successful company. Now we need your help to produce these great unique snacks on a larger scale.



What are your Rewards?

Our Limited Edition Bodhi Living Food Apron, perfect for everyone who enjoys baking and cooking.


Personal Trainer Background: (photos coming soon)

Dan Boterashvili:  Weight Loss, Strength and Conditioning, Breathing and Meditation, Climbing

Felicia Hernandez:Dance, Competitive Swimming, Strength Training, Competitive Bodybuilding

Brian Munoz: Tae Kwon Do, Boxing, Soccer, Strength and Conditioning, Life Coaching


Whats Next For Bodhi?

We are passionate about creating change in peoples lives and helping them become healthier and happier. 10% of all revenue is put aside for our Better Living Programs, these programs will bring together some of the brightest and most talented health professionals in NYC, where we will offer the community courses and workshops and health and wellness. We are driven to provide people with healthy food as well as the proper information so that they can take their lives in their own hands and attain a level of wellness they never felt before. Please pledge to the campaign by finding a perk that best suits you.

Please pledge to the campaign by finding a perk that best suits you.

story:
Uttam finds abandoned children

Uttam Kumar is a living saint who finds unwanted and abandoned children on the streets of India and brings them home. But Uttam needs our help because he just had a near fatal heart attack and he has no way to pay for his medical expenses.

In April 2015, Uttam had angioplasty surgery with vascular stents placed in his blocked arteries and he is slowly recuperating. But Uttam has no time to be sick because he is responsible for the care of the 52 children he rescued from the streets, from child trafficking, starvation and abuse.

 World’s Children helps with expenses for the children through its child sponsorship program. But Uttam and Shobha have no paying job and no medical insurance. They quit their jobs as social workers when they took in all these unwanted children. So when catastrophe struck last month in the form of a massive heart attack, they had to take out loans just to ensure Uttam’s life could be saved.

Uttam is a rare individual who has dedicated his life to saving unwanted children with no thought for himself. But Uttam has no safety net. They can’t leave the children and go to work somewhere else to pay off their debt. 

Sometimes when you do the right thing, you don’t get paid for it

On behalf of these 52 children who need their father to be healthy and to care for them, we are asking for your help. Uttam has always been there for these children and now it is our turn to be there for him.

Uttam and his wife Shobha have no money to pay for the loans they took out for his hospital expenses. In the US the cost for angioplasty averages $57,000. In India, the medical costs for his angioplasty treatment came to $6,500. To Uttam and Shobha these bills are staggering. 

Please help this saintly man

If you have ever had a kind hand lift you up the way Uttam has lifted up these children, please offer him a hand now. Every penny of your donation will go to pay Uttam’s bills and your donation is tax-deductible in the US through World's Children. 

If we exceed our goal, 100% of donations will go to set up an emergency medical fund for the Balavikasita Orphanage. That way Uttam, Shobha and the 52 kids who live there will have a health safety net. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help. Please spread the word however you can. Use the Indiegogo share tools, social media and word of mouth. Every little bit helps. Together we can do this. Thank you so much.

story: Darion is my 19 year old son. He is awesome and has been through a lot and accomplished so much in his short 19 years. Darion is hearing impaired and has worn a cochlear implant since he was 7 years old. He is now going into his senior year of high school. Darion has made so many strides to be able to graduate with a regular diploma and go into college to study to become a physical therapist. He has overcome so many hurdles but he has never said that he cannot do anything. He does whatever he puts his mind to. I am asking for help at this time for my son because his current BTE (the device that enables him to hear) no longer works. The model that he has is obsolete and there are no replacement parts available so when his current supply of batteries and cords are depleted he will lose the ability to hear. He has Florida Medicaid and health insurance through my job, but the company where he needs to get the BTE no longer has a contract with Florida Medicaid and the health insurance will only cover $1,000 of the $8,764 needed for the new BTE. I have tried many avenues and keep coming to dead ends. I have emailed and written letters to numerous companies and organizations asking for help to no avail. We do not know what to do anymore. Darion needs this device to be able to hear and be able to be successful in his senior year of high school and to go on to college and be successful. God Bless and please help in any way possible.

story:
What We Do

In 2011 we introduced Tibet's first women's sports program to the refugee community in India. A revolution has begun! To date we've formed 13 club teams in settlements located around India (with more coming soon), and are in effect changing Tibetan society by addressing women's empowerment issues at all our soccer training camps. Soccer is simply the tool through which we are giving Tibetan women a voice and opportunity to represent themselves and their country as never before.

By 2017, Tibet's first women's national team in ANY sport will be ready to debut on the international scene - a remarkable moment in the history of Tibet.

What We Need

We need your help for our Winter Training camp. 16 of the top players will gather for a three-week soccer/empowerment training, followed by a trip to distant Manipur (click here to see map of location) for three highly publicized matches against some of India's top teams. The entire process will be filmed for a full-length documentary called KICKING BOUNDARIES. It's amazing... it's incredible... it's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for these girls!

We are asking you to support one of our players, or a portion of one - whatever you can afford. These girls don't have the most basic of equipment, and need your help to make this training possible. We need them looking and feeling good - and believe me, they deserve it.

Soccer boots/cleats: $9

Sports bra: $3

Ball: $6

Travel Ticket to Manipur (bus & plane): $130

Accommodation & Food in Manipur: $100

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

$248 to support one of our 16 players for their winter training and competitions in Manipur!

TOTAL $3,968

BEST THING about making a donation to TWS? 100% goes to the girls. 100%!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help by spreading the word and forwarding this campaign to all your contacts.

You can also organize a small fundraiser in your community - a lot of our supporters have tried this with great success! Contact us for ideas...

If you work for or know a company that might be interested in corporate partnership with Tibet Women's Soccer, please let us know :)

Every little bit helps - especially in networking !

What We Need

We need your help for our Winter Training camp. 16 of the top players will gather for a three-week soccer/empowerment training, followed by a trip to distant Manipur (click here to see map of location) for three highly publicized matches against some of India's top teams. The entire process will be filmed for a full-length documentary called KICKING BOUNDARIES. It's amazing... it's incredible... it's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for these girls!
We are asking you to support one of our players, or a portion of one - whatever you can afford. These girls don't have the most basic of equipment, and need your help to make this training possible. We need them looking and feeling good - and believe me, they deserve it.
Soccer boots/cleats: $9
Sports bra: $3
Ball: $6
Travel Ticket to Manipur (bus & plane): $130
Accommodation & Food in Manipur: $100-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------$248 to support one of our 16 players for their winter training and competitions in Manipur!
TOTAL $3,968
BEST THING about making a donation to TWS? 100% goes to the girls. 100%!






Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute financially, you can still help by spreading the word and forwarding this campaign to all your contacts.
You can also organize a small fundraiser in your community - a lot of our supporters have tried this with great success! Contact us for ideas...
If you work for or know a company that might be interested in corporate partnership with Tibet Women's Soccer, please let us know :)

Every little bit helps - especially in networking !

story:
We're Looking for a Little Womb Service...

If you know us, you know that we are two passionate, dancing, fun-loving fools in love who have been married and excited to start a family for the past 7 years. You may also know that in all those years we have not been able to have a baby. What you might not know, is that Lauren was recently diagnosed with a rare disorder that prevents pregnancy from happening naturally. 

Our only answer for a baby is In-Vitro Fertilization(IVF).  While we are determined to cover most of the expensive costs of IVF ourselves, we know that we will not be able to do this alone. So we are asking you to join Team “Womb Service” and donate what you can to help bring our baby into this world!

We are Jarad and Lauren, two people who fell madly in love and couldn’t wait to start a family. But nature had other plans...we’ve been trying, waiting and riding a roller coaster of miscarriages, tests and emotions for almost a decade. This is our story...

Our Story

From our very first date, back in 2005, Jarad told me he knew I was to be the mother of his children. Walking through Barnes and Noble, picking out books after our dinner,  we read to each other as a way to get to know one another.  He stopped in the aisle listening to me read a paragraph from the book in my hands and says he flashed forward to a vision of me reading to our children one day. He tells me all of the time, “That’s when I fell in love with you!”

From the beginning, we knew we wanted to have a family together. We were engaged and planning our wedding in April of 2005 when we first found out we were expecting. We were ecstatic! Just two short weeks later, we miscarried. For the next 8 years we continued to experience unbearable losses and a full range of emotions.  We saw multiple doctors but none ever seemed to take our situation seriously. All of our tests continuously came back as “normal” and for years we were told that there was “no reason we weren’t getting pregnant” and that we were “still  young” and should “give it more time.” This was beyond frustrating! Feeling hopeless; we remained without answers and still without a baby.

With deeper research into infertility and further testing which we had to save to pay for due to no health insurance at that time, we finally got answers:

I was diagnosed with a  rare disorder that affects less than 1% of caucasian women known as Isthmic Salpingitis Nadosa. This basically means my fallopian tubes will never allow sperm and egg to meet, and on the rare chance they do, they will never make their way out. Thus only ever ending in ectopic pregnancy (never viable, and sometimes life threatening). This news left us completely overwhelmed. We were relieved to finally have an answer after 8 years (8 years!), but devastated to think that we wouldn’t be able to make our dream a reality.

Our Answer

Now, we know our dream of having a child can still come true! Our only option of having our own baby is through IVF, where they can bypass my tubes by fertilizing the egg in a petri dish and putting it directly into my uterus (baby needs a womb!). But this comes with a hefty cost.  For most couples trying to start a family, the looming costs can be overwhelming. For us, we have to first tackle the very high cost of simply making the baby!

We are determined to start the family we’ve wanted since our first date. As small business owners and first time homeowners, we’re working hard to save up for our bambino. We’re also blessed to have parents who are willing to help with as much as they can. But unfortunately, crunching the numbers we can see that it is still not going to be enough.

We’re up against a time clock because IVF gives best results before age 35, and let’s just say we don’t have another 8 years! (lol)  So we have decided to turn to our family and friends - all of you! - for help. We hope you can find it in your hearts to help us get the “Womb Service” we deserve and bring a baby into this world. 

Please give what you can and know that you will be helping to give our family a new little life!

IVF Costs

Below is a summary of the costs for our IVF procedure. As you will see, the costs are much higher than what we are asking for because it is important to us that we pay out of our own pockets as much as we can and not put that burden on our community:


Preliminary testing/blood work - $2,500.00

One round IVF cycle - $9,700.00 (procedure)

                                  - $4,000.00 (medications)

                                Total:  $16,200.00

We are asking for help to raise $6,500 of that. 


Donate and Get Awesome Baby Perks!   (see perks listed on the right)


This Means the World to Us...

We Love You for your Support! 

Thank You So Much!!


If you can't make a donation, please help us make some noise and spread the word!

story: Most of you know that I have been ill for some 5 years now, it starting with whole body pains and extreme fatigue, then evolving to constant pain and extreme weight loss and fatigue. I have been to many doctors and specialists, tried every alternative procedure , with no success. When i heard that Rory and Paul were organizing this fund raiser i really didn't know what to say, i still don't. I mean what do you say about people you haven't seen in so long, yet there is an unbreakable bond. This is a bond that I have been blessed with for a long time and with many people. I've had people help me so much during this, they literally saved my life. This i very tough place for me right now, as I've never been helpless or needed help from anyone. I know there are a lot of people behind the scenes that are making this happen. My goal is to make it to the mayo clinic in AZ. Its a cliche, but sometimes you have to lose everything to realize what you have. Much love to all my friends, it seems I'm one of the lucky ones to be blessed with knowing you all.- Ken

story:
NFL PLAYER TACKLES CANCER

see story below

http://www.prlog.org/11972595-nfl-defensive-tackle-supports-new-cancer-fight.html

 

 

 

About 'UP for 5'   National High Five Day



Join us in the movement, April 18th 2013 at 5pm EST. Put up 5 with family & friends across the country, to show your support in the fight to END cancer .

 

 

How You Can Help
 

With your support, UP for 5 can better help educate patients, families and help heal & fight against cancer. Showing your support has never been EASIER! A small $5 donation is all that is needed to join in our quest to END cancer.

 
With large multi-million dollar operations & extremely high over-head costs & salaries, although very worthy, traditionally only 30-40% of your donations end up going directly to the recipients.
 
KSM does not believe in a high cost, big box mentality. Although we operate very professionally, we will NEVER be a big box foundation but still produce high-end results. Our small staff does the job of 100, keeping overhead costs very minimal.
 
 
As a 100% non-profit, our funds generated  go directly to the recipients quicker and larger.
 
 
 
We may be small, but we are MIGHTY!   
 
 
 

OUR MISSION

 
  • The UP for 5 long term goal is to fund a working cattle & horse ranch for kids with cancer. 

 

  • To provide a COMPASSIONATE, welcoming home to all our supporters and new KSM family members.

 

  • With your help, we can make this happen. Won't you join us on our journey!
 
 
 
 
Your support makes a difference & goes a long way in our fight. Together we can make all of your goals a reality!
  
 
 
 
 

ABOUT KSM sports media 

 


With over 12 years experience in Sports Marketing & EXPLOSIVE growth with team sales departments through first class event operations. KSM ventures to coach and share creative ideation tactics, partnership best practices and philanthropic campaigns in giving back as a steward to the community.

 

KSM sports media is the proud creator of the 'Hockey Fights Cancer' campaign, 'Cancer Survivor Celebration Fundraiser' and the 'kickplate sponsorship' new to the hockey industry in 2007 seen for the first time internationally at the IIHF World Junior Hockey Championships in 2008.

Kickplate property creates over 50 billion unique impressions per year, 24X more powerful then (10) Super Bowl ads.
 

Expert Sports Property analysis, assessment and value appraisal in an industry & economy when direct post event sales and ROI are in greatest demand.

Specializing in sponsorship and event marketing, the firm has served such power brands as Subway, Denny's, Johnsonville Sausage, West 49, Billabong Canada, Re-Max, Flooring Canada, Planters Peanuts, Harvey's, NASCAR, Goodlife Fitness, Lumber Liquidators, Cundari, Publicis US and SUN Media to name a few. KSM Sports Media is a Canadian based media services provider with partnered US affiliates.
 


What We Need & What You Get

 

A small $5 donation. 

Proceeds are donated to hospitals, research centers, individuals and families across North America.

 

Associate Partners get your name mentioned & create new followers with your social media link as a partner on www.ksmsportsmedia.com with 2.7 million fans served in 2012. With a minimum $100 contribution, 'UP for 5' will send a personalilzed card in memory or honor of your chosen recipient.

 

Platinum & Gold CHAMPION partners have your name & Corporate brand featured at the KSM sports media site along with a National TV mention by USA #1 Pro Beach athlete, Whitney Pavlik.

 

 

 

The Impact

Every two minutes another North American is faced with the fight against cancer.

By taking a stand against cancer, you are supporting:

  • life-saving cancer research.
  • information and support services for patients and their families
  • prevention efforts that reduce the risk of cancer
  • advocacy initiatives that protect the health of all North Americans

This generous support gives us the power to have more impact, against more cancers, in more communities.

 

Every gift counts

Your donation helps us move closer to a cancer-free future. Through groundbreaking research, evidence-based prevention campaigns and support for patients and families, the money you give has a big impact.

 

Ways You Can Help

 

  • You can also help by sharing our campaign media at www.facebook.com/KSMsports

 

  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools or by copying and sharing the URL link.http://www.indiegogo.com/UPfor5 

 

  • Visit us at www.ksmsportsmedia.com

 

 

 

  • Corporate Partnerships

As a corporate partner, you can help us reach new audiences, and raise funds for cancer research.

 

  • Gifts In Honor

Recognize someone important in your life by giving a gift in their honor. In honor gifts are a great alternative to traditionals gifts for many occasions: milestones, birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, or anything you like. We will send a notification card of your gift to someone of your choosing.

  • Gifts In Memory

Help us grow hope and remember a loved one with a memorial donation to cancer research.  Your gift in memory is a meaningful tribute to someone special. We will send a notification card of your memorial donation to the person(s) of your choosing

  • Donate Now

We need your help to advance cancer research, reduce North Americans cancer risk, and assist cancer patients and survivors.

 

 

 

 

 

Do you have a friend or family member that could use financial support?

We understand the significant cost your family faces.  Our goal is to help with the financial fight, as the fight for your loved ones life is a tremendous battle on its own. Get in touch with us through our Professional Sports Partner at www.ksmsportsmedia.com  and let us assist in reducing the stress & financial worry.

 

 

 

                       Contact our President directly today

                                      You're KSM, You're FAMILY!

In honor gifts are a great alternative to traditionals gifts for many occasions: milestones, birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, or anything you like. We will send a notification card of your gift to someone of your choosing.

Help us grow hope and remember a loved one with a memorial donation to cancer research.  Your gift in memory is a meaningful tribute to someone special. We will send a notification card of your memorial donation to the person(s) of your choosing


Donate Now

We need your help to advance cancer research, reduce North Americans cancer risk, and assist cancer patients and survivors.
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a friend or family member that could use financial support?
We understand the significant cost your family faces.  Our goal is to help with the financial fight, as the fight for your loved ones life is a tremendous battle on its own. Get in touch with us through our Professional Sports Partner at www.ksmsportsmedia.com  and let us assist in reducing the stress & financial worry.

story: Tricia has been going through chemotheropy for tumors in her abdomen these tumors will never go away the treatments are helping keep them from growing further and are acctually shrinking them to a tollerable point she is also having problems with her kidneys due to the tumors, without these treatments the tumors will eventually take over her body and  take her from us. We need a reliable car so we can make the hospital trips for the treatments, the car will also help me get back and forth to work i work 7 days a week 11 hrs a day so we can afford to live and pay for Tricias care so any help will be greatly appriciated thank you all.

story:
For everybody, who sleeps with their quilt in between their legs

 

 

Everybody knows that sleep is important in the life of each and every person. Sleep takes approximately 1/3 of our entire life, therefore we should care about how good our sleep is.

How does a quilt with a hole help me to sleep better?

Many people sleep with their quilt in between their legs. The problem with that is that when you have a quilt in between your legs, your lower back is mostly uncovered. Having your lower back uncovered during the night is not healthy at all and it's not much comfortable either.

With our Holey Quilt, we make it easy for you to lay your legs in a position that’s comfortable, but you still have your lower back fully covered. Now that’s something!

 


Why is it so different from a regular quilt?

You will feel more comfortable

It’s so much more comfortable to sleep with your leg or knee in the hole. You try it ones and you will never want to come back to a regular quilt.

You will be healthier

Your lower back is fully covered even though you have your quilt in between your legs. You wil not wake up in the middle of the night just because you were feeling cold.

You will sleep better

It’s been proved many times that sleep is an important part of our life. The better you sleep, the more productive you become during your awakened hours. The more refreshed you wake up in the morning, the less stressed you are during the day.

It does matter, how well you sleep at night.

 

 

What we try to achieve

With the help of contributors like you, we will be able to help people all around the world to have a better sleep, to wake up refreshed and experience less stress in life.

We have invested lots of money into this invention and testing and now, we need your help to support the production costs, which are higher than the production of regular quilts.

 

It's not easy nor cheap to start producing and shipping worldwide. Our goal is to raise $3.500 to produce first 100 Holey Quilts and Holey Covers.

 

 

The quality and materials

Our Holey Quilts and Pillows are premium quality, light, soft and pleasantly warm. We use Scandinavian technology, which is based on layering of soft, high quality hollow polyester fiber webs. Hollow fibers provide additional thermal isolation due the air inside the fibers.

Our Pillows are filled with hollow polyester fibers in the shape of small balls. Each Pillow has a zipper on one side, which enables you to add, remove or mix the filling.

Our Holley Quilts and Pillows are anti allergic, suitable for year-long use.

 

 

Materials

Surface: 100% cotton

Filling: 100% polyester

Color: White

Washing: 60°C (140°F), max. 600 spins

Weight:

Holey Quilt: 1200g (2.65 lb)

Pillow: 850g (1.88 lb)

Sizes:

Holey Quilt: 140 x 200 cm (55.1 x 78.7 inch)

Pillow: 70 x 90 cm (27.6 x 35.4 inch)

 

 

Made in Slovakia

Our Holey Quilts and Holey Covers are made in the heart of Europe, in a little big country named Slovakia. All the Holey Quilts pre-ordered trought this Indiegogo campaign will be produced exclusively in Slovakia and then shipped anywhere you live in the world.

 

 

Holey Cover Design Options

We have managed to offer you 5 different designs of the Holey Covers and Pillow Cases. If you purchase one of the packages which include a quilt cover and/or pillow case, you can choose the design you like.

Frequently asked questions

Can I wash my Holey Quilt?

Of course. Just wash it the same way you would wash any regular quilt.

Are the quilts and pillows anti allergic?

Yes, they are, don’t worry. Our quilts and pillows are made from high quality materials, which are soft and don’t cause allergic reactions.

What's the size of the Holey Quilt?

It’s 55.1 x 78.7 inch (140 x 200 cm).

We will produce specific sizes for specific markets, but we are not able to do that just yet. Sign up for our newsletter and we will inform you when more sizes are available.

Do you have Holey Quilts in kids sizes?

Nope, sorry. We don’t have kids sizes yet. Let us know you would like one. When we will see the demand is large, we will make them too.

What if I don't like my Holey Quilt?

It’s easy. Just put a regular quilt cover on your Holey Quilt and you can use it as a regular quilt. The hole in the middle will not bother you.

If you are not happy with this solution, you can just return it to us. We have our special 30-day hustle-free return policy. You will have to pay for the postage though.

I forgot to add shipping costs. What can I do?

You can still contribute the shipping cost on top of your current pledge by clicking the pink "Contribute now" button and adding the $13 or $33 on top of your current contribution.

Another question?

Do you have a question which we didn't answer? Please keep in touch. Send us a comment, email us at hello@holeyquilt.com, or call on +421 905 393 598, or +421 948 101 585.

 

About the team

Igor Siroky and Miroslav Lacko have been in the quilting business for more than 9 years now. They produce and sell high quality quilts, quilt covers, pillows, pillow cases and other home textile products such as blankets, towels and bathrobes.

Lubo Jurik and Lukas Sutka are in the online business and marketing industry, responsible for the presentation of the Holey Quilt and possible future products.

Lubo Jurik is fuent in English and therefore he's responsibe for all overseas communication and expansion.

 

THANK YOU

Sincere thanks to everybody who has supported our project. We appreciate every single one of you.

Special thanks goes to all our partners.

 

Want to help even more?

If you like the idea of a quilt with a hole and a more comfortable sleep, please share this campain with your friends. We appreciate every like, share, tweet or repin.

Thanks ones again!

Team Holey Quilt

Everybody knows that sleep is important in the life of each and every person. Sleep takes approximately 1/3 of our entire life, therefore we should care about how good our sleep is.
How does a quilt with a hole help me to sleep better?
Many people sleep with their quilt in between their legs. The problem with that is that when you have a quilt in between your legs, your lower back is mostly uncovered. Having your lower back uncovered during the night is not healthy at all and it's not much comfortable either. With our Holey Quilt, we make it easy for you to lay your legs in a position that’s comfortable, but you still have your lower back fully covered. Now that’s something!
 

Why is it so different from a regular quilt?
You will feel more comfortable
It’s so much more comfortable to sleep with your leg or knee in the hole. You try it ones and you will never want to come back to a regular quilt.
You will be healthier
Your lower back is fully covered even though you have your quilt in between your legs. You wil not wake up in the middle of the night just because you were feeling cold.
You will sleep better
It’s been proved many times that sleep is an important part of our life. The better you sleep, the more productive you become during your awakened hours. The more refreshed you wake up in the morning, the less stressed you are during the day.
It does matter, how well you sleep at night.
 

 
What we try to achieve
With the help of contributors like you, we will be able to help people all around the world to have a better sleep, to wake up refreshed and experience less stress in life.
We have invested lots of money into this invention and testing and now, we need your help to support the production costs, which are higher than the production of regular quilts.
 
It's not easy nor cheap to start producing and shipping worldwide. Our goal is to raise $3.500 to produce first 100 Holey Quilts and Holey Covers.
 

 
The quality and materials
Our Holey Quilts and Pillows are premium quality, light, soft and pleasantly warm. We use Scandinavian technology, which is based on layering of soft, high quality hollow polyester fiber webs. Hollow fibers provide additional thermal isolation due the air inside the fibers.
Our Pillows are filled with hollow polyester fibers in the shape of small balls. Each Pillow has a zipper on one side, which enables you to add, remove or mix the filling.
Our Holley Quilts and Pillows are anti allergic, suitable for year-long use.
 

 
Materials
Surface: 100% cotton
Filling: 100% polyester
Color: White
Washing: 60°C (140°F), max. 600 spins
Weight:
Holey Quilt: 1200g (2.65 lb)
Pillow: 850g (1.88 lb)
Sizes:
Holey Quilt: 140 x 200 cm (55.1 x 78.7 inch)
Pillow: 70 x 90 cm (27.6 x 35.4 inch)
 

 
Made in Slovakia
Our Holey Quilts and Holey Covers are made in the heart of Europe, in a little big country named Slovakia. All the Holey Quilts pre-ordered trought this Indiegogo campaign will be produced exclusively in Slovakia and then shipped anywhere you live in the world.
 

 

Holey Cover Design Options
We have managed to offer you 5 different designs of the Holey Covers and Pillow Cases. If you purchase one of the packages which include a quilt cover and/or pillow case, you can choose the design you like.

Frequently asked questions

Can I wash my Holey Quilt?
Of course. Just wash it the same way you would wash any regular quilt.


Are the quilts and pillows anti allergic?
Yes, they are, don’t worry. Our quilts and pillows are made from high quality materials, which are soft and don’t cause allergic reactions.


What's the size of the Holey Quilt?
It’s 55.1 x 78.7 inch (140 x 200 cm).We will produce specific sizes for specific markets, but we are not able to do that just yet. Sign up for our newsletter and we will inform you when more sizes are available.



Do you have Holey Quilts in kids sizes?
Nope, sorry. We don’t have kids sizes yet. Let us know you would like one. When we will see the demand is large, we will make them too.


What if I don't like my Holey Quilt?
It’s easy. Just put a regular quilt cover on your Holey Quilt and you can use it as a regular quilt. The hole in the middle will not bother you.
If you are not happy with this solution, you can just return it to us. We have our special 30-day hustle-free return policy. You will have to pay for the postage though.


I forgot to add shipping costs. What can I do?
You can still contribute the shipping cost on top of your current pledge by clicking the pink "Contribute now" button and adding the $13 or $33 on top of your current contribution.
Another question?
Do you have a question which we didn't answer? Please keep in touch. Send us a comment, email us at hello@holeyquilt.com, or call on +421 905 393 598, or +421 948 101 585.
 
About the team
Igor Siroky and Miroslav Lacko have been in the quilting business for more than 9 years now. They produce and sell high quality quilts, quilt covers, pillows, pillow cases and other home textile products such as blankets, towels and bathrobes.
Lubo Jurik and Lukas Sutka are in the online business and marketing industry, responsible for the presentation of the Holey Quilt and possible future products.
Lubo Jurik is fuent in English and therefore he's responsibe for all overseas communication and expansion.
 
THANK YOU
Sincere thanks to everybody who has supported our project. We appreciate every single one of you.
Special thanks goes to all our partners.
 
Want to help even more?
If you like the idea of a quilt with a hole and a more comfortable sleep, please share this campain with your friends. We appreciate every like, share, tweet or repin.
Thanks ones again!
Team Holey Quilt

story:
Hi my name is Michael O' Brien. I am Bianca's father. On the 16th march our daughter was diagnosed with leukemia 3 days after her 6th birthday.

We are now faced with 2 and a half years chemotherapy and her childhood has been taken from her. we are trying to raise funds to help us pay for travel and accommodation with treatment as we live over 100 miles from hospital and neither of us can work at moment.

Our dream is to help Bianca through this and when she is better please god we could bring her to Disneyland and help get some of her childhood back. 

I have down through the years ran many a fundraiser for Crumlin hospital and cancer society's but until it came to my house i never realised the actual impact and cost it has on a family's life. 

We have a group on facebook #teambianca and please feel free to visit and follow her progress. 

All we want is our baby back healtly but for now we must fight on.

Mick

story: My name is Jennifer, I am reaching out in behalf of my sons stepmother Melissa who is very sick with advanced stages of Crohn's disease. She is a young vibrant mother of two boys and is without medical insurance or employment. She has always been a healthy woman and once had a very promising college basketball career and is a very active person and out of no where she was taken down with several bouts of Crohn's disease symptoms over this past year and half, she had been working hard to keep herself healthy by eating well and exercising but it didnt seem to be enough as the disease progressed over this past six months and today has put her in the hospital for a 4 weeks undergoing 5 blood transfusions a surgery to remove 4 feet of her colon. The ability to pay for these medical bills is overwhelming and an unreachable goal to her and her family. Both her and her husband unemployed at the moment this is a great financial burden upon them. I care about this family so very much and want to reach out to the loving, compassionate and emphathetic people of this world to consider this family by assisting in helping this family meet their growing financial medical needs. Thank you so much!! Blessings, Jennifer

Thank you so much!! Blessings, Jennifer

story: My team recently qualified for World Cup VIII, which will be held in Rock Hill, South Carolina this April. This is a HUGE deal, since this is our second time qualifying in the two short years that the team has existed. However, since we got our bid two months before the tournament, that means we don't have much time to fundraise before we need to pay for things like our plane tickets and hotel rooms. I've started this Indiegogo page to help pay for some of those costs. I'm putting many of my special skills to good use with some great perks up for grabs, but any donations are welcome :) Stay Funky!

story:
Nan's Radiation Fund

My name is Caitlynn.  On May 27th 2013 my mom, Nan, was diagnosed with Stage 2b Invasive Ductal Carsinoma.  Since then she has undergone a Double Mastectomy with lymph node involvement and completed 8 rounds of chemotherapy.  We have already exhausted our personal funds on these expensive procedures and are so close to the end! She still needs Radiation Therapy

Because of the Affordable Healthcare Act, my mom had to change her insurance company in order to keep the doctors she already had. Unfortunately with this change came an increase in the price of her co-pays. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $2000 to cover the expense of her co-pays and any other surprise expenses. The co-pays are $50 for each session. She will have to undergo a total of 32 sessions of Radiation Therapy.  

  • Donator Perks:

    $5- Weekly updates

    $10- Pink Handmade Bracelet +Above perk

    $25- Handmade Wooden Support Ribbon +Above perks

    $50- Handwitten Personal Thank You Letter +Above perks

    $100- Pink Tye Dye T-Shirt +Above perks

  • What happens if we don't reach our goal?  - Every penny helps! The money will still go to helping cover the cost of the treatments and everyone will still get their perks.
  • What happens if we exceed our goal? -Anything we receive that exceeds our goal of $2000 will go to several of the charities that help women who cannot afford to get a mammogram receive this lifesaving screening.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Share this with others! The more people that know the closer we can get to raising our goal amount!
  • Indiegogo has many ways to share our campaign with your friends!

story:
Hey Guys!

My name is Rob O'Brien, and I'm running a marathon in support of the diabetes association's fight against diabetes .

Everyone knows someone who's been affected by diabetes, here's a couple quick facts.

  • Among U.S. residents ages 65 years and older, 10.9 million, or 26.9 percent, had diabetes in 2010.
  • About 215,000 people younger than 20 years had diabetes—type 1 or type 2—in the United States in 2010.
  • Diabetes is the leading cause of kidney failure, non-traumatic lower-limb amputations, and new cases of blindness among adults in the United States.
  • Diabetes is a major cause of heart disease and stroke.
  • Diabetes is the seventh leading cause of death in the United States.

    So, he's where doing my part comes in.

    In December of 2013 I was overweight, at 225lbs and only 5'8", increasing my chance of diabetes, smoking a pack a day, Increasing my chances of everything terrible in life and having a pretty low physical activity level.

    But Since then, I've lost 28lbs from running, i'm working on quitting smoking, and i'm exercising at least 4 times a week. As of now my training has me running upwards of 35 Km's a week, and that's increasing every week as the marathon is approaching. 

    But in order for me to get there, I need to fund raise $6100.

    I'm working as hard as I can to reach this giant life goal of mine, but I can't do it without your help. I know nothing in this life is free. so In exchange for your donation I'm offering some perks for your help.

story:
OUR STORY

Scott Duncan’s battle with codependency ended when he discovered the 12 step recovery program. The freedom he experienced from his own recovery convinced him that the 12 step recovery program in a support group could help anyone carrying an overwhelming personal burden find freedom and healing.Sharing The Burden was born.

Then, in 2012, the loss of his son to addiction raised the bar. The key message from Sharing The Burden would be the bonding that, prior to the death, he shared with his son because of the common understanding that they acquired from 12 step recovery. Scott understood that the togetherness they both experienced was enabled by 12-step recovery and its spirituality, providing communication that went far beyond any ordinary conversation. From that point the key message of Sharing The Burden would be the bonding that, he says, my son and I experienced prior to his death. From the bonding and communication my son and I really knew each other and we also knew that we loved each other; we experienced Co-recovery.

Now, through Sharing The Burden, Scott and his wife Julia include the message of Co-recovery at every opportunity. They’ve shared Sharing The Burden's 12-step recovery and spirituality with recovery groups in hospitals, churches, community centres, correctional facilities, and other places. The message is simple yet powerful, sharing and listening can set people who are hurting on the road to the healing that comes with freedom and recovery.

Now it is time to broaden our horizons, move beyond our communities to encourage the development of Sharing The Burden, programs across the continent providing hope, help and recovery to those in need. STB Radio will provide audio broadcasting transmitted through the Internet that reaches listeners in their homes, on their travels, and in their local, regional, national, continental and global communities.

STB Radio will give voice to spiritual wisdom, support sharing of experiences, and provide healing to individuals and their family caregivers who are hurting from the effects of mental illnesses, addictions and involvement in the justice systems.

Digital Internet radio is listened to with computers, notebooks, laptops, tablets, smartphones and any other device that can access the Internet. The STB online library is available so anyone can listen to any episode that has been broadcast at any time.

Sharing The Burden is a Registered Charity, charitable registration number 84489 5938 RR0001. Our website is www.sharingtheburdenradio.org

WHAT WE NEED

We need $15,000 that will fund our expansion into the central Ontario communities surrounding the Toronto region, a densely populated area where the Sharing the Burden Program is in great demand.

Part of this donation will be used to fund the first six months of STB Radio, providing us with an opportunity to attract advertisers, partners and sponsors so that the radio station becomes financially self-sustaining.

Sharing The Burden is a Registered Charity.

OUR THANK YOU GIFTS

We recognize the caring and generosity of donors, in the spirit of developing and spreading the message that the Sharing The Burden program brings to people that are hurting, their families and friends, we are providing donors with the following tools:


>  Sharing The Burden Handbook with full instructions on establishing and running meetings
>  monthly e-newsletter
>  income tax receipt for your charitable donation
>  Life Recovery Devotional Guide
>  Life Recovery Bible
>  Life Recovery Bible embossed and dedicated for major donors
>  recognition on our website

MEASURING OUR SUCCESS

We have been delivering the STB program in our local communities for three years with a great deal of success. As the demand increases from other communities we need to be able to address those needs and we have an obligation to carry this proven program beyond our local communities into the world, and we will be doing that using Internet radio.

BE PART OF THE SOLUTION

While money is necessary to make our program a success there are so many other ways you can help us.

>  Pass the word to everyone you know
>  Talk to your friends about us
>  Mention us on Facebook and share with all your Facebook friends
>  Think about how you can become part of the Sharing The Burden community
>  Invite us to start a meeting in your area
>  Come to a meeting, you are always welcome

story: Yesterday afternoon, our dear friend and family member lost his home to a gas explosion.  His dog, Niko, was taken to the emergency vet for treatment.  Niko had some lung problems but he is responding well to treatment.  He should be released today but there is a $500 bill that has to be paid in order to get him out.  His "dad" is also in a hospital and lost all of his cash and belongings in the explosion.  Would anyone be willing to pitch a few dollars towards Niko's vet bill?  We will be bringing his dad to our home for recovery and would love to have Niko here waiting for him when we do.  It will go a very long way towards healing both of them.  Thank you for your time and consideration as both are, very much, appreciated.

story:
SleepAssure

SleepAssure is a medical grade consumer device developed by a recognized team of physicians to deliver a better night's sleep for people who snore.   It is unlike anything else on the market: simple, comfortable, and easy to use. It really could become the #1 sleep solution in the world! 

The SleepAssure System delivers a pleasant flavor inside the front mouth during sleep, utilizing the body's taste reflexes to move the tongue forward toward this flavor.  This prevents the tongue from falling back to block breathing during sleep, allowing you to enjoy a normal night of sleep.

If you snore or you know someone that snores, you know the impact it can have on our relationships, our performance, and even our health. 

Please join us in helping people Sleep Better!

In The Press:

Yahoo! Finance: 

Doctors Make Technology Breakthrough To Deliver a Better Night's Sleep For Snorers

Simple to Use: 

                                                

           

The SleepAssure System includes three components: a pump the size of an iPod, thin tubing, and a mouth insert that is worn over the upper teeth at night.  The tube connects to the mouth insert so that it can provide liquid from the pump to the front of the mouth.  The pump can we worn on a comfortable armband at night or placed next to your bed.

                        

                            

                     

                  

              

   

While you sleep, the SleepAssure System delivers the natural flavor that stimulates the taste reflex, brings the tongue forward, and keeps the airway open to deliver a better night's sleep

          

SleepAssure Benefits:

• Natural: uses body’s natural taste reflexes to improve tongue position

• Pain Free: no jaw or teeth discomfort, no side effects

• Normal Sleep: no disruption of normal sleep patterns

• Comfortable: use with mouth open or closed, no user acclimation needed

• Better Oral Health: prevents tooth decay, provides fresh breath


What causes snoring and sleep apnea?

The tongue plays a major role in snoring and obstructive sleep apnea, as it relaxes during sleep and falls back into the airway to block breathing.

Our throat is basically a tube surrounded by muscles, and the tongue is the largest of these muscles. Everything works well when we are awake. When we sleep, the muscles in our bodies relax, and the tongue falls backwards to narrow the space for breathing. This sets people up for snoring and poor sleep.


Research from Harvard Medical School and other leading institutions shows that even a small change in tongue position can make a big difference in snoring and better sleep. SleepAssure achieves this and more.

Truly revolutionary - Not just another mouthpiece 

We have discovered a way to move the tongue based on stimulating the taste buds and using the body’s natural reflexes. Our initial studies demonstrated that a small amount of pleasant, natural flavor in the mouth can activate the taste buds during sleep, moving the tongue forward and keeping the airway open.  

                             

Our team of highly recognized physicians and engineers have successfully combined efficacy and patient acceptance into a product to address snoring and improve sleep quality.

What people are saying after trying it

-- "Now, I just need to know when this product will be available to buy.  I'm anxiously awaiting!  ;)"

-- "I think this is better than my CPAP machine"

-- “I had a better night sleep with the device, ... my wife said I did not wake 

her up with snoring at all”

-- "I'm looking forward to getting one.  My husband can't wait either" 

How you can help

Snoring can be a serious sleep issue for both the snorer and their bed partner. A good night's sleep affects your mood, your weight, and intimacy with your partner. It is not surprising that people resort to everything from special pillows to earplugs to sprays to uncomfortable mouthpieces to stop snoring and get better sleep. These have all been proven ineffective for many people.

The SleepAssure System has demonstrated user acceptance and success in initial studies. To achieve our goal of being the #1 sleep solution for snoring and obstructive sleep apnea, we will need additional data for an application to the Food and Drug Administration.

This is where we need your help.  Right now we are providing access to the latest version of this product to address customer demand and to gather feedback to make the best product possible. This device is made available for a better night's sleep, and we cannot make any official claims at this time. You may contribute to make this revolutionary product a reality. This campaign will provide the additional data needed for regulatory submission, product commercialization, and full market delivery.

Want to know more?

  1. What are the Gels made of?

They contain only natural ingredients, including the sweetener found in fruits called xylitol, which is recommended by the American Dental Association to prevent cavities.

  1. How much will replacement Gels cost and last?
    2.  

Around $15 for a month supply

  1. Do you get molded for the mouth-insert?
    2.  

Most people choose from a selection of sizes included with the device, alternatively, a custom mouth-insert can be made.

  1. How is the unit itself powered? 

Battery powered

  1. Where does it go while your sleeping?  

Can be worn on a light arm band or beside, near the user

  1. Looks like the straw/tube could get in the way during sleep  

The tube does seem strange at first to most people, but once they used the device, none of them found it an issue at all.  They were pleasantly surprised at how well they slept. 

We look forward to delivering you a better night's sleep!

Chris Hermanson, M.D. 

CEO & Founder, SleepAssure

If you have questions, please email me at: Chris@hmedical.com.
story_txt:
SleepAssure

SleepAssure is a medical grade consumer device developed by a recognized team of physicians to deliver a better night's sleep for people who snore.   It is unlike anything else on the market: simple, comfortable, and easy to use. It really could become the #1 sleep solution in the world! 
The SleepAssure System delivers a pleasant flavor inside the front mouth during sleep, utilizing the body's taste reflexes to move the tongue forward toward this flavor.  This prevents the tongue from falling back to block breathing during sleep, allowing you to enjoy a normal night of sleep.
If you snore or you know someone that snores, you know the impact it can have on our relationships, our
performance, and even our health. 
Please join us in helping people Sleep Better!In The Press:
Yahoo! Finance: 


Doctors Make Technology Breakthrough To Deliver a Better Night's
Sleep For Snorers
Simple to Use: 

                                                 
           
The SleepAssure System includes three components: a pump the size of an iPod, thin tubing, and a mouth insert that is worn over the upper teeth at night.  The tube connects to the mouth insert so that it can provide liquid from the pump to the front of the mouth.  The pump can we worn on a comfortable armband at night or placed next to your bed.                        
                            
                     


                  
              



   
While you sleep, the SleepAssure System delivers the natural flavor that stimulates the taste reflex, brings the tongue forward, and keeps the airway open to deliver a better night's sleep          SleepAssure Benefits:• Natural: uses body’s natural taste reflexes to improve tongue position• Pain Free: no jaw or teeth discomfort, no side effects• Normal Sleep: no disruption of normal sleep patterns• Comfortable: use with mouth open or closed, no user acclimation needed• Better Oral Health: prevents tooth decay, provides fresh breathWhat causes snoring and sleep apnea?

The tongue plays a major role in snoring and obstructive sleep apnea, as it relaxes during sleep and falls back into the airway to block breathing.
Our throat is basically a tube surrounded by muscles, and the tongue is the largest of these muscles. Everything works
well when we are awake. When we sleep, the muscles in our bodies relax, and the tongue falls backwards to
narrow the space for breathing. This sets people up for snoring and poor sleep.


Research from Harvard Medical School and other leading institutions shows that even a small change in tongue position can make a big difference in snoring and better sleep. SleepAssure achieves this and more.
Truly revolutionary - Not just another mouthpiece 
We have discovered a way to move the tongue based on stimulating the taste buds and using the body’s natural reflexes. Our initial studies demonstrated that a small amount of pleasant, natural flavor in the mouth can activate the taste buds during sleep, moving the tongue forward and keeping the airway open.  


                             
Our team of highly recognized physicians and engineers have successfully combined efficacy and patient acceptance into a product to address snoring and improve sleep quality.What people are saying after trying it

-- "Now, I just need to know when this product will be available to buy.  I'm anxiously awaiting!  ;)"
-- "I think this is better than my CPAP machine"
-- “I had a better night sleep with the device, ... my wife said I did not wake 
her up with snoring at all”
-- "I'm looking forward to getting one.  My husband can't wait either" 

How you can help
Snoring can be a serious sleep issue for both the snorer and their bed partner. A good night's sleep affects your mood, your weight, and intimacy with your partner. It is not surprising that people resort to everything from special pillows to earplugs to sprays to uncomfortable mouthpieces to stop snoring and get better sleep. These have all been proven ineffective for many people.
The SleepAssure System has demonstrated user acceptance and success in initial studies. To achieve our goal of being the #1 sleep solution for snoring and obstructive sleep apnea, we will need additional data for an application to the Food and Drug Administration.
This is where we need your help.  Right now we are providing access to the latest version of this product to address customer demand and to gather feedback to make the best product possible. This device is made available for a better night's sleep, and we cannot make any official claims at this time. You may contribute to make this revolutionary product a reality. This campaign will provide the additional data needed for regulatory submission, product commercialization, and full market delivery.

Want to know more?
What are the Gels made of?

They contain only natural ingredients, including the sweetener found in fruits called xylitol, which is recommended by the American Dental Association to prevent cavities.



How much will replacement Gels cost and last? 
Around $15 for a month supply

Do you get molded for the mouth-insert?  
Most people choose from a selection of sizes included with the device, alternatively, a custom mouth-insert can be made.
How is the unit itself powered? 
Battery powered
Where does it go while your sleeping?  
Can be worn on a light arm band or beside, near the user
Looks like the straw/tube could get in the way during sleep  

The tube does seem strange at first to most people, but once they used the device, none of them found it an issue at all.  They were pleasantly surprised at how well they slept. 

We look forward to delivering you a better night's sleep!
Chris Hermanson, M.D. 
CEO & Founder, SleepAssure
If you have questions, please email me at: Chris@hmedical.com.

story:
Who We Are

We are a not-for-profit hospital providing care to the poorest of the poor in southern Ethiopia.  Our hospital is one of two facilities that serves a population of over 3 million inhabitants.  We are also a teaching hospital that trains Ethiopian medical students and residents.  We are passionate about providing excellent medical services and building capacity in the Ethiopian healthcare workforce.

Part of developing excellent care is leveraging technology when possible.  We recently acquired a broadband internet connection.  Here's what will be able to do if we can develop this technology:

  • "Telemedicine" consults with specialists around the world.  We can show a patient in real time to consultants, and get advice on how to manage them.
  • Provide access to clinical resources like UpToDate to our providers throughout the hospital at the point-of-care.
  • Disseminate important clinical data like patient lab results to the appropriate places in the hospital.
  • View x-rays and CT scan throughout the campus, including on the wards and in the ICU at the point-of-care.

This is technology that is commonplace in any Western hospital.  And now, it's within our reach, too!  Help us get there...

What We Need

Here's where your donation will go:

  • We need desktop workstations - at least 10 of them - spread throughout the hospital.
  • Cat5 network cable laid throughout our campus
  • Network equipment like a router, switches, and access points for the various wards
  • A few laser printers throughout the hospital in key locations

If you donate at least $25, we'll personally thank you on our website

Spread the Word!

Even if you can't give, share this with a friend!  Do you know anyone in the tech industry who might find this to be an interesting project?  Share it with them!

story:
THE FORM COLLAR: THE FIRST OF ITS KIND

Upgrade your training experience

Let's face it, 1 RMs don't cut it anymore. Being able to efficiently train at maximal power output at every session will allow you to see real gains in performance. No BS. Just key metrics and feedback to give you the ultimate unfair advantage on and off the field. If you’re an athlete, you train to win which means you need the best, most effective tools available, and the FORM Collar is available now.


FOR EVERY TYPE OF LIFTER

The FORM Collar is a vital tool to help you become a better, faster and more powerful lifter. Speed and strength are two essential components in lifting and for every lift you make, FORM analyzes the velocity, force production, and various acceleration metrics to give you helpful insights into when to push and when to back off your training. FORM then provides real-time data visualizations to give you insight into exactly what part of the lift you need to improve. 

It's all in the data.

Functional Fitness

Nail your form on light weights before going heavy and find the most efficient movement patterns for those long workouts. The FORM Collar is designed to capture touch and go reps so that you can truly maximize your work to rest ratio and crush your WODs.

Olympic Lifters

The FORM Collar is the first device that can actually give you metrics on individual parts of the Snatch and Clean & Jerk. Improve your technique by fine tuning your first to second pull transition (transitional force gap), hip drive (second pull force), and speed underneath the bar (drop time) all while increasing your explosiveness (push time) for squats and accessory lifts. 

Power Lifter

Identify strength imbalances that would otherwise be impossible to see with the human eye. With the FORM Collar, you can train efficiently on Dynamic and Max Effort days and by tracking your progress week over week, you'll be able to see exactly when to taper off and when to peak for competition.

Sport Specific

Speed and power are everything on the field so it's time to dump the 1RM and focus on your actual force production and velocity to see measurable and translatable increases in performance. Lift fast to be fast. 

Team Coaches

Create custom training programs, measure player improvements, and ignite competition in the weight room with the FORM Coaching Platform (Coming Soon).

Remote Coaching

Stay better connected to your athletes, from anywhere at anytime and get unbiased, unfiltered feedback on each of their training sessions to maximize your coaching effectiveness. If you usually use video analysis on your athletes, why not back it up with real data? With in-app video capture (coming soon), you'll be able to visually dissect your athletes' lifts with side-by-side metrics to back it up. Perfect practice creates perfect lifts.

TESTIMONIALS 

“If you train athletes, this is a no brainer. The FORM Collar has transformed the way we look at the power and olympic lifts by empowering the athlete's performance. Up until now, an athlete had to rely on an experienced strength and conditioning coach to pick apart their form and performance of a lift. With the FORM Collar, you can now see that information instantly in the palm of your hand to vastly improve results.” -John Welbourn, CEO of Power Athlete and Head Coach of FORM

THE COLLAR

The FORM Collar is not your average wearable. In fact, it's not a wearable at all. Instead, we've created a patent pending design that attaches directly to the barbell and contains over 7-motion sensors that produce metrics on par with similar tethered based devices.

The Collar was born out of a necessity to finally get accurate data in real time which it does seamlessly at a rate of 200 samples per second via bluetooth to the FORM Lifting app. 

We don't just track how fast you move, like other less accurate, wearables, but how the elements of each lift are breaking down and can therefore, be directly attributable to potential weaknesses and imbalances within an athlete. We've been able to effectively measure metrics like hip drive, transitional force gap, and drop time, that have previously remained undetected by the human eye. 

This is a great start to a new conversation about performance training, but none of it matters without progress. Access all your data from the FORM mobile or tablet app so you can share them with your coaches to get more feedback from them or brag about your sessions to your friends . You can even take your lifting profile with you between gyms to give other coaches and athletes insight into your current level of experience. Finally, a universal language for lifting.

This is a game-changer in the pursuit of performance, but  it's only the tip of the iceberg.

Our Vision, Your Expertise

We believe that all athletes train, be we know that FORM athletes train smarter. The FORM Collar has become the ultimate tool for coaches and athletes that want to gain insight into every part of every lift and use the data to drive performance.

While there are many philosophies on metric based training methods, there are still immense trial and error variables that make the process cumbersome, outdated and subjective. By implementing the FORM Collar into any training regimen for any athlete, we can now confidently quantify and test based on metrics that matter. The next generation in performance training is here.

Metrics That Matter

Velocity Based Training is definitely a buzz word in the world of sports performance training and while the FORM Collar is a perfect tool for this application, it provides so much more than just velocity metrics. 

The FORM Collar is constantly tracking the metrics of your lifts based on your height, weight on the bar and timing as well as the force and speed generated into the bar to a level of accuracy which is impossible to be seen visually. You now have access to metrics we've never been able to measure before such as maximum hip drive, enabling you to really drill your technique and maximize your performance.

Check out former NLF Receiver and GRID Athlete, James Townsend's hip drive as he applies nearly 600 pounds of force to the bar!

This graph displays the FORM Collar data, allowing users to quickly and easily review, replay, and, most importantly, truly understand a lift in real time.This groundbreaking feature of the FORM Collar opens a new door to proper form and performance for both athletes and coaches.

However, hip drive is just one of the many meaningful metrics the FORM Collar provides. In fact, we've had to create names for metrics that previously could not be measured!

-Avg Velocity: Are you proportionally fast and explosive with heavier loads as you are with lighter ones? This is one of the true indicators of real gains in performance.

-Transitional Force Gap: Do you know if you're speeding up or slowing down during the transition from the first to the second pull in your olympic lifts? Well you do now.

-Second Pull Force: Hip drive, the holly grail of lifting metrics and all of athletic performance quantified. Finally.

-Yank Index:  Slow is smooth and smooth is fast. Find out if you need to stay more engaged when you start your lift or if you're smooth as butter.

-Push Time / Pull Time: You may be completing the lift but were you fast and explosive? Speed kills and is a better driver of performance in the long run.

-Max Force:  Training hard is great but training smarter is more efficient. Knowing how much wear and tear you're inflicting on your body will give you invaluable insight into when to push and when to back-off.

-Drop Time: Now you'll be able to see exactly what your coach means by "faster elbows". Muscle cleans any one?

FORM helps you analyze these metrics into your technique with intuitive visuals that let you review every lift or see a summary of your entire session. With our insights screen, you can review your lift through each segment of the lift, from start to finish. With our progress screen, we aggregate your lifts to identify your metrics over time creating a true indicator of gains in performance. Using this, you can see if and where you have imbalances and weaknesses that indicate possible areas of improvement.

DESIGN & FEATURES

Battle Tested Design

It's time to 'cut the cord' with other more expensive devices and welcome in the convenience and versatility of the FORM Collar. The device, housed in a tough, glass-filled nylon enclosure, is seamlessly attached to a Lock-Jaw Pro Collar, the industry standard, in heavy-duty, durable barbell collars, and has been battle tested again and again. We've made sure that it can withstand the wear and tear of the weight room but still remain portable and lightweight. While we don't suggest you try to shoot it like a basketball into your collar bucket from across the gym (we know you've tried it), we are confident that it will withstand your training sessions, along side you, day-in and day-out.

How does it work (in case you're wondering)?

At the heart of the FORM Collar is a custom circuit board that contains an array of sensor units housed in the glass-filled nylon enclosure . Each sensor unit is designed to pick up minute changes in every part of every lift. The unit also houses an accelerometer (3-axis), a gyroscope (3 axis) and and a magnetometer (3-axis) which provides the FORM app with information about the motion and orientation of the barbell in 3D space. The FORM Module, weighing in at only 2 ounces, attaches directly to the collar and won't get in the way of any of your lifts!

The FORM Module is powered and controlled by a battery and circuit board which are the brains of the system coordinating data collection at 200 times per second and streaming it in real time to the FORM App via low energy bluetooth.  The FORM Module is  charged using a standard Micro USB cable (included) and charges fully in about 2 hours. 


OUR TEAM 
Scott Mahr - Founder, CEO
John Welbourn - Head Coach
Jacob Portukalian- Electrical Engineer
Brian Jaffe - Head of Operations
Bella Arutyunyan - Product Manager
Brandon Lewis - U/X Designer
Cynthia Chi - Data Scientist


KEEP IN TOUCH

Have questions? Ask away! Please contact us at info@formlifting.com 

Instagram Facebook Twitter YouTube Vimeo

story:
MS & EDS as well as others are supposed to be life limiting conditions, and they certainly can be. That is the last thing I want to happen!

Living with multiple disabilities has spurred me on to make the most of every day. I write and campaign fiercely for the rights of people with disabilities to be acknowledged for who they are and not their diagnosis or ability.

I've taken part in many high profile campaigns to promote the rights of people with disabilities and been featured in dozens of pieces in the papers and glossies - all in my ratty wheelchair, which I am proud to pimp and have featured with me. It is my legs, however like my legs it is now developing serious problems and I'm in desperate need of a new one before it gives out altogether.

Please help me to keep doing what I do by helping fund my new legs. I really don't know what I'd do without them.

story: Hello my friends. As most of you know, I recently earned my 200 hour yoga teacher training certificate, which means I am now eligible to teach yoga all over the world! This is super exciting news for me, and the process to get here has led to many changes in my lifestyle, body, and mind. However, through all of the ups and downs, yoga has been my unwavering passion. It brings me purpose beyond the small self to serve my fellow brothers, sisters, and mother nature through being a channel for this ancient wisdom. The greatest gift that has ever been bestowed upon me has been yoga, and I extend an offer to the universe that for my birthday I receive funds which I commit to use to further my yoga training. I am so very grateful to anyone who extends their monetary energy towards this purpose, and I promise to channel all of your energy to providing my services all over the world. I thank you and send you love, light, and blessings. Namaste.
