It brings me purpose beyond the small self to serve my fellow brothers, sisters, and mother nature through being a channel for this ancient wisdom. The greatest gift that has ever been bestowed upon me has been yoga, and I extend an offer to the universe that for my birthday I receive funds which I commit to use to further my yoga training. I am so very grateful to anyone who extends their monetary energy towards this purpose, and I promise to channel all of your energy to providing my services all over the world. I thank you and send you love, light, and blessings. Namaste.

story:
Caresa's Story

Hello, I am the mother of Caresa Vance. I am also a Marine veteran who has served my country faithfully for over 21 years of active duty.  I have made sacrifices for my country that I don't regret, but now I need my country to sacrifice for me.  If you are a Marine, a military service person, a veteran, or anyone that appreciates the many sacrifices that military members freely make, I ask that you read this and consider giving.  All I need is 12,000 people to give $5 and I can give my daughter and possibly others like her a chance at true healing. Therefore I'm looking for a few good men and women that will stand with me.  If you know of any Marines or other military service members, please pass this on to them.  I know my Marine family won't leave another Marine behind, and I hope you feel the same too.  However, right now, I'm a Marine wounded  and suffering in a world that is not responding to my cries for help. 

I desperately need your help. My daughter Caresa, is a young, vibrant spirit that has suffered with illness most of her life. She has a condition known as schizoaffective disorder which, over the years, has required a lot of treatment and frequent hospitalizations. As of this writing, she is once again in a psychiatric hospital and not getting better. Years of psychotropic drugs and undiagnosed physical illness have robbed Caresa of her spirit of life. I need your help giving life back to my daughter.

Caresa's story started many years ago when she was diagnosed with ADHD in elementary school, forcing me through court order to get her evaluated for meds. Never once did the school system or her doctors consider the traumas that happened to her as a child (while I was serving in the military) might have caused the issues she was having in school. At the time, I never realized that the side effects from these drugs could actually lead to psychosis for some people. When she started displaying symptoms and side effects, I was always told it would only last a short time. Caresa graduated from one drug to another, and from one diagnosis to another, until age 14 when they diagnosed her with schizophrenia, and more recently schizoaffective (Bipolar type) disorder.

Last year, I took Caresa to an outpatient alternative treatment facility and they found she had several severe allergies, infections, toxicity and chemical imbalances in her body. These imbalances cause Caresa to continue to relapse and end up back in inpatient psychiatric care (where they give her more psychotropic drugs). We cannot even begin to get Caresa the treatment she really needs to deal with the traumas she's faced in life, because of the (psychotropic) medication roller-coaster she has been on all of these years. The meds only mask the symptoms of what is really going on, and cause her severe side effects (the reason many mentally ill refuse to take them). The problem is, weaning her off of psychotropic meds in an outpatient setting does not give Caresa the intensive support she needs while her body adjusts to alternative medication treatments. When she feels unstable, the mental health establishment just puts her in a psychiatric hospital, back on higher doses of medications...and the recovery process begins all over again. Repeatedly rescuing Caresa from the abyss of toxic prescription medications has caused an extreme financial burden on my family, and I am still trying to pay expenses from her last outpatient treatment, and Caresa still needs many more treatments to clear her body of toxins and imbalances identified during her outpatient treatment.

Caresa desperately needs an alternative inpatient facility that can help wean her off meds while she gets her bodily imbalances corrected. Only then can she get the help she really needs to deal with her past and move on with her life. We know Caresa will do well with the new treatment program because we have seen so much improvement over the last year since she completed the outpatient program. And if that news wasn't good enough, she has also been blessed to lose over 130 pounds since she the beginning of her treatment regimen (as you can see by the pictures above).

Give Caresa HOPE For The Future

You can make a difference by giving a generous donation towards Caresa's inpatient medical treatment costs. We have set up a Patient Donation Account in her name at the Alternative To Meds Center in Sedona, AZ. Once we raise enough towards her treatment program, we will transfer the funds to her Patient Donation Account so she can start the program and (finally) get the help she really needs. Caresa will likely require a full three-month stay to get her started towards a full recovery.If she doesn't the monies will go to help others seeking treatment.  We really want to start sponsoring others to get this well needed treatment.  If you would like to learn more about the Alternative To Meds Center, please visit their website at http://www.medicationwithdrawal.com. The point of contact for donations is Steve Woodring at (540) 535-8876 (or email him at atmc.steve@gmail.com).

Again, I hope everyone can find it in their heart to contribute at least $5 and share this site with at least ten others who will do the same. We need every possible donation to help my daughter get her life back. Every dollar received will go towards Caresa’s care and treatment!

Once Caresa gets her life back, we plan to publish her book detailing the road to her deliverance for others seeking knowledge and help for these and other similar afflictions.  I am already speaking to groups large and small, any that care to hear, that there is another way to help people with mental illness.  People don’t deserve the treatment they are getting from the government and corporate medical bureaucracy. Just putting people on heavy drugs will never be the answer to their problems. The regular hospitals are overcrowded, jails are becoming holding places for these people.  Now my brothers and sisters are coming back from war and they need REAL help as well.  I need to get the word out nationally, as well as internationally because of what my daughter and I have been through, I know we can make a difference in others’ lives as well so please don't ignore this campaign.  Give and pass it on.  Get it to a Marine or othe military service member and I know they will do what is right.  You may be helping to change the world.  One person at a time.  If we don't get these people the real help they need we are bound to see more incidents of crime and violence from this community who are not getting the true help they need from the current modality of treatment.  Again, please give and leave a comment here so we can generate national and international support for this community of people who cannot advocate for themselves. 

Thank you for your prayers and support,

Crystal E. Kelley USMC, Ret.

story:
Short Summary

I was working as rock climbing guide in Todra gorge Morocco i saved peoples life in the nature in the middle of nowhere. i helped people with what i can and i did a lot of social work with association of the nomads of morocco for 5 years . i feel  shame to not ask for help when i need it right now .

My wife is pregnant in Australia she give birth in 9 weeks she needs my support as a husband  ; i asked for a visa to be with her 7 months ago but the immigration will take 3 months more to get an answer which means i can’t be with my wife at the birth if they give me this visa .

As i am not sure about the visa may be it will be rejected then have to wait for another 18 month to be with my wife and meet my daughter. i need to paye lawyer to get the visa some time before the birth  and be with my wife that i am deeply connected to her .


What We Need & What You Get

I need 5000$ to pay the a lawyer to process my visa even if i had these money here, i can’t send it over from here because i am from a developing country and to send money out has to go through a lot of process and paperwork bay lay to get the right to support my wife and the baby .

I have artisanal things to send to you for exchange!

I need this money to save my love and be with my family, living a part is keeling as , i think it’s normal to be depressed in a situation like this .


The Impact

I believe in love and love has no borders  , helping each other will change the world , we all need each other and we are not poor for giving a hand to somebody who needs .

I made rock climbing guide book and i didn’t get any money out of it and people are using it to go climbing in the gorge and i am thinking to sheer it with everybody in the internet, its in the eco auberge le Festival in Todra gorge morocco.


Other Ways You Can Help

i can help to plan your holydays in morocco and explain to you how travel and visit places.

can you sheer my campaign with your friends and family and let people know about it.

Let people know about your project and get it financed with Indiegogo

story:
Tribble™ is your new device for your home and family. You can monitor everything that happens in your house right from your mobile device, change ambient music, take photos or control your computer and phone remotely. In addition, you can use Tribble™ to track your luggage, car or home pets. Tribble™ is also your irreplaceable companion that will always cheer you up in a moment of solitude. 

Tribble™ is equipped with a sensor display and is absolutely user friendly. Moreover, Tribble™ is very compact and complements any home interior. 

Security mode workflow is straightforward. At any given moment, you can connect to Tribble™ and survey your home from your mobile phone. Besides, Tribble™ tracks sounds and movement and sends instant notifications to your phone in case of a disturbance, for example the creak of a door or a sudden noise. The app allows you to call emergency services, the police or ask Tribble™ to restrain your pet with a sound or phrase that you can speak into your mobile device.


 

Tribble™ recognizes sounds and noise level oscillations in your home. If it senses an uncommon sound in your house, it sends instant notifications to your mobile device.

Anytime you may connect to Tribble™ through your mobile device, you can activate the SAY SOMETHING mode and announce to your pet any command or phrase. For instance: Spunky! Get off the couch, now!


You can receive notification of incoming emails or messages from your friends right on Tribble™.

You will always recognize type of incoming notification or call, it will indeed simplify your life even if your computer or mobile phone is not near you.

You can dictate a reply message to Tribble™ and instantly respond to your interlocutor.


Call answering is extremely easy with Tribble™. You don’t need to search for your phone or run after it upstairs. Just slide to the right on the device if you want to put your incoming call on speaker or slide to the left of the screen if you want to decline.

Your luggage is now safe and under constant control. Put Tribble™ together with your belongings in the traveling bag before checking it in at the airport, activate Tracking mode for easy and fast GPS location right from your mobile device.

Data storage is now easier then ever. Connect Tribble™ to any cloud service (Dropbox iCloud Google Drive etc.)  and safely store all photos and videos. Your video registrations are password protected and cannot be erased even if Tribble™ is stolen.

With the help of Tribble™ you don’t need selfiesticks anymore, just group with your friends in front of Tribble™ and press Photo on your mobile phone. The picture will be stored right away on your iCloud or Google Drive.

Additionally you can record your birthday 24/24 without any concern about storage space on your video camera. Afterwards, all unnecessary data can be erased from the archive.

Controlling your music is much more convenient now with Tribble™. Navigate through music tracks, with just a tap of the finger, slide up or down for volume control and audio scrub with clockwise or counterclockwise finger movements. We selected the best music services for you, integrated with Tribble™.

The most outstanding and interesting feature of Tribble™ is Cheer up mode. Whenever you are not interacting with Tribble™ for over two hours and your mobile device is at least 30 yards away from it, Tribble™ is programmed to welcome you back with a friendly greeting and raise your mood. It boosts you up every morning when passing by Tribble™ you will hear kind words of motivation for the whole day. 

You may use Tribble™ as a platform for advertising deals. Just install Tribble™ at the front desk of your shop or restaurant and it will automatically send your promotional deals review to all bypassing customer’s mobile phones. This method is particularly convenient for you and your clients. You can upload unlimited ads to Tribble™ through your computer.

Use Tribble™ as a navigation device for your bike. Just build the route on your mobile phone and switch it to Tribble™. It’s easy and practical, besides you can see incoming calls and texts hands free right on the road. Thanks to the bright display, you can use this feature during night traveling.   



At this time Tribble™ is available for shipping in the US, Canada, the EU (all 28 countries), Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru & Mexico. 

International shipping dates may vary depend on certification in country.


How long it takes to charge Tribble?

Usually it takes up to 1 hour for full battery charge.


How long Tribble works with full battery?

It all depends on how you are using it. There are a lot of modes and in different modes is different energy consumption. Its up to you in stand by Tribble may work up to 4 weeks.


How can I charge my Tribble™?

It's very simple, you charge it like you regular phone or tablet in the box you have magnetic based wireless charger and cable.


Where can I find Tribble tech spec?

You may find it in technical specs section on our indiegogo campaign page.


Is Tribble™ durable?

Yes it is durable.


How long I will be able to record video?

As long, as you like. You may use direct video cloud repository and shoot video 24/7.


How many Photos I will be able to shoot with Tribble™?

As many as you like. The same situation is with video take a look on previous question.


Am I able to put Tribble™ anywhere?

Yes you are able to attach it to any surface you like anywhere and anytime.


Tribble™ has video history?

Yes you will be able to reach it on your cloud or on local storage.


Tribble™ has alert summary?

Yes. All alert on video are marked, so you wont be able to miss thing.


Tribble™ has active zones?

Yes. Highlight the areas you care about and get alerts when something happens there.


May I share my stored videos and photos?

Yes you may share it anywhere.


Am I able to set Tribble to look for something in special?

Yes please take a look on question "Tribble™ has active zones?"


Tribble™ has night vision?

Yes. He detects the absence of light and automatically start running video recording in night vision mode.


When are you going to ship my Tribble?

Indiegogo isn't like Ebay or Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute for Tribble. you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real product. Estimated national and international shipping date is August 2016.


What if i have changed shipping address since i backed your project and i need it amended?

No problem,when the survey arrives you will be able to amend and verify the shipping address then.


If you have additional question or you have genius idea on how to make Tribble, better feel free to contact us anytime!

story:
UPDATE: It seems that without substantial marketing this project won't be able to be funded. SO WE HAVE RETURNED MONEY TO THOSE WHO BOUGHT ANY PERKS and are looking into future when AR (Augmented Reality) glasses are ready for primetime (currently they are not comfortable enough for this kind of sports application). No perks are visible anymore for this campaign.

 

 

SparWith - working out has never been this fun!

SparWith is the most entertaining new sports application - it is perfect for both, releasing frustration and exercising!

People all over the world have been using punching bags for a long time already, from professional boxing to fitness boxing.

SparWith aims to gamify free standing punching bag training — it does this with a smartphone for measuring the power of punches and giving feedback and instructions during exercise. 

 

Wide variety of physiological and mental benefits

Exercising with SparWith gives you many physiological health and fitness benefits, but it does not end there. Research has shown there are psychological benefits to boxing and fitness boxing too.

Also, starting exercise is compelling, when you have something available all the time to vent your daily frustration and have fun at the same time! Have you ever missed some exercise because you just didn't find it compelling enough to start? No more!

 

Gamification - Adding Fun to Punching!

In primary exercise mode, SparWith offers measurement of power level, record keeping, statistics, different gaming modes - and even sparring partners! 

There are also be different game modes, including Pair Competition: You take turns and the player with more winning sets wins the game.

As you can calibrate the game based on the maximum force of the players, you can have a game with a scoring handicap - great for families!

 

SparWith Kids Game and Party game

Want to offer a unique party-game to your friends?

Or need to let your kids blow off some steam by fighting  Nobleman Warrior Bravefart? Inflatable punching bags are cheap but they offer loads of fun!

Both Kids-game and Party-game focus more on funny stories and characters + releasing some frustration or excessive energy than on accuracy or getting the players fit. Because of this they also work well with cheap inflatable standing punching bags. You can buy one from  SparWith.com/shop.

 

Become part of our development team!

We are also sure that many great ideas will come from you, the supporters.

  • Perhaps there will be someone special to cheer you in your exercise?
  • What would motivate you to start your workout and keep it going?
  • What if you wanted to give SparWith as a gift to someone?
  • Maybe alarm clock voice that doesn't end before you punch the bag would be an efficient way to start your morning?

 

Where and why to buy a punching bag?

We realize that not many people may yet have a punching bag to start. That is why we encourage you to go to SparWith.com/shop and select one from there (sold via amazon.com, amazon.co.uk or amazon.ca). We only list items most suitable for SparWith App. This way you also help us in the development as we get small affiliate reward for each item sold.

 You would maybe be also lightened up to know that many buyers are already having fun with their punching bags even without gamification - let us just quote some Amazon reviewers here:

"This works great to relieve frustration after a day at the office. It provides the best workout without feeling like you are working out."

"Great way to let out a little aggression/stress from the day and get you breathing heavy!"

"I bought this for my son almost as the last effort as I didn't know what to buy him this year and it was the surprise best gift. Everyone is enjoying it and my daughter seems to like it the most. Easy to store and doesn't take up much space."

"Bought as a gift. The recipient loves to work out."

"Great for kids, adults, just have fun letting out some frustration."

"I'm burning 100 calories in 7 mins with this boxing bag (Per myfitnesspal.com). Easy to assemble and fun to use. Play some music and pretend the bag is a bad boyfriend and enjoy the lost inches."

 

The future

This is our very first crowdfunding campaign and we are very excited to see how everything folds out. We will do our very best that in any scenario you will get good value for your money.

If we do not reach our flexible target of $20,000 but do get at least $2,000, we will still publish at the very least playable and fun early versions of all the games (for backers only). The more money we can raise the better they can be - it takes significant effort to build variety into the games. 

If we reach as high as $40,000 in our campaign, we will offer several social benefits via Dreams Oriented Computing web-platform where SparWith App can connect. These include group Top Charts, Badges, Challenges, Cheering from others and other common gamification elements. However the platform will also offer new ways for you to develop yourself, and your willpower. 

The term "willpower" has the word "power" for a reason. Like muscle power, that power can also be practiced. Let's practice together!
story_txt:

SO WE HAVE RETURNED MONEY TO THOSE WHO BOUGHT ANY PERKS and are looking into future when AR (Augmented Reality) glasses are ready for primetime (currently they are not comfortable enough for this kind of sports application). No perks are visible anymore for this campaign.  SparWith - working out has never been this fun!SparWith is the most entertaining new sports application - it is perfect for both, releasing frustration and exercising!People all over the world have been using punching bags for a long time already, from professional boxing to fitness boxing.SparWith aims to gamify free standing punching bag training — it does this with a smartphone for measuring the power of punches and giving feedback and instructions during exercise.  Wide variety of physiological and mental benefitsExercising with SparWith gives you many physiological health and fitness benefits, but it does not end there. story:
Who I am ...

My name is Michael, I have a degree in technical sciences and in medicine. To realize this project I learned a programming language for artificial intelligence in order to code my medical knowledge into the app. I live and work as a doctor in Graz, Austria.

 

Why I started my project ...

Me, an emergency doctor, has encountered many situations where people did not know what to do in medical emergency situations although the very first minutes are most important for outcome. If only one life is saved because somebody uses the app and can provide professional first aid, it was worth it.

 

Why I need your support ...

I have already finished a working prototyp for Android, in order to extend its capabillities, to add English and German language support, to code extension modules (first aid for children) and to create the iOS version I need your support!

 

What you will get ...

You will be the very first to get an English or German copy of the AMI app, the medical emergency assistant, based on artificial intelligence, that helps you voice and video guided to assist persons in a medical emergency more professional, it will work online and offline on your Android or iOS smart phone.

The following medical emergencies are supported in AMI basic (first aid for adults):

respiratory problems, unconsciousness, bleeding, drowning, child birth, heart attack, sunstroke, fracture, collapse, epilepsy, nosebleed, contusion, stroke, snakebite, shock, electric shock, hypothermia, chemical burn, burns, poisoning, suffocation, sprains

Die folgenden Notfallsdiagnosen werden in AMI basic unterstützt (Erste Hilfe für Erwachsene):

Atemnot, Bewusstlosigkeit, Blutung, Erfrierung, Ertrinken, Geburt, Herzinfarkt, Hitzeschlag, Knochenbruch, Kollaps, Krampfanfall, Nasenbluten, Prellung, Schlaganfall, Schlangenbiss, Schock, Sonnenstich, Stromunfall, Unterkühlung, Verätzung, Verbrennung, Vergiftung, Verlegung der Atemwege, Verstauchung

The following medical emergencies are supported in AMI plus (first aid for adults and children):

acute spasmodic laryngitis, tooth loss, stomache ache, febrile convulsions, respiratory distress, unconsciousness, bleeding, freeze, drowning, sunstroke, fracture, collapse, epilepsy, nosebleed, contusion, snakebite, shock, electric shock, hypothermia, chemical burn, burning, poisoning, suffocation, sprains

Die folgenden Notfallsdiagnosen werden in AMI plus unterstützt (Erste Hilfe für Erwachsene und Kindernotfälle):

Allergische Reaktion, Atembeschwerden, ausgeschlagener Zahn, Bauchschmerzen, Bauchverletzungen, Bewusstlosigkeit, Ertrinken, Fieberkrampf, Fremdkörper im Auge, Fremdkörper in der Nase, Herzkreislaufstillstand, Insektenstich, Kopfschmerzen, Kopfverletzungen, Stromunfall, Sturz, Tierbiss, Verbrennung, Vergiftung, Verschlucken von Fremdkörpern, Zeckenbiss

Please contribute to the development of AMI, the first medical app based on artificial intelligence. It might save a life!

story:
Denise from caregiving.com had her mom try out the Carbon Ultralight Walker. Despite her hesitance to use a walker it seems that the Carbon Ultralight has won her over. You can read the full review on Denise's blog right here: caregiving.com.

 

 

Carbon Ultralight is the coolest, lightest rolling walker ever made. It's the perfect tool for an active life filled with adventure. By drawing on design references from the car and bicycle industry and fast animals, we have designed a walker that brings something new to the table. A walker so lightweight, elegant and stylish that it motivates people to continue living their lives after they experience reduced mobility.

Our users around Europe have already fallen in love with the Carbon Ultralight and now  we ask for YOUR support to help us introduce it in more countries around the world and help more people re-activate their lifestyle, one Carbon Ultralight at a time.

 

 

 

What makes Carbon Ultralight perfect for a short stroll or a thousand mile journey?

The name says it all: A rolling walker made from carbon fibre that is truly ultra, ultra light. With the lightweight materials, easy folding, and sleek lines, it will easily fit in any car, train, boat or airplane, so you can keep discovering the world around you.

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

Whether you're looking for something classic, subtle or refreshing and daring we have just what you need. Our colour range offer something for every mood, outfit or taste. 

  • Carbon Black is a classic. The colour is inspired by the deep black colour often seen on fast cars and bicycles. It has a glossy finish and is perfect to compliment and highlight you and your style!
  • Strawberry Red is inspired by summer; filled with fresh, sun-ripened strawberries. The colour is fresh and strong – and it is the wildest colour we have in our range. If you want to stand out this is the colour you should choose! 
  • Oyster White is classy and elegant. As the name indicates, the colour is inspired by the white, pearly inside of an oyster. Besides having a pearly and shiny look, the colour is an almost creamy white that blends smoothly into the surrounding environments.

Choose your colour in the perk checkout flow.

 

To provide you with the optimal comfort we have made two sizes; Regular Track and Wide Track. Which size to choose depends on how much you will sit on the seat and which comfort you'll want when you do it. 

Regular Track is made for the standard European doorway and has a track width of 24.6" and a seat width of 16.5". 

Wide Track has a wider track (26.2") and wider seat (18.5"). It weighs only 0.3 lbs more than the regular Carbon Ultralight, so it is still the world’s (second) lightest rolling walker. Perfect combination of comfort and effortless driving.

Choose your size in the perk checkout flow.

 

You might think it's a stretch to state that a walker enhances quality of life. But nevertheless, we stand by it. Since its introduction into the European market we have been overwhelmed by the feedback we are getting from our users.

 

 

 

 

As we have already sent out Carbon Ultralight in the European market we are ready to produce batches for the US. We have the molds, tools and team in place to make sure that we can ship the walkers to all our backers.

 

 

We're a small Danish design company located in Copenhagen, Denmark. We want to give you the tools you need to keep moving – so you can go wherever you want, whenever you want. In style, of course. We believe we’ve made something where aesthetics and functionality go hand in hand and all our solutions are carefully designed and engineered in Denmark. 

Before designing walkers, our founder, Anders Berggreen, started a baby stroller company, where he designed a stroller that would fit in the trunk of the smallest car in the market. He later sold the company and founded byACRE.

The 4 letters in our name are frequently used within the mobility aid industry and most people would probably go for the word 'CARE' - but not us! We like to be a bit different and adventurous. ACRE is a combination of the word 'active' and 're-habitare', which is the latin word for 'back to normal' or 'back to life'. It is also a way to describe a unit of land area, which is a combination we think go very well to our stylish and modern products that provides people the ability to stay active, 'normal' and to move freely.

 

 

These projects always come with some risks, but we are very confident in our ability to produce and deliver. Our supply chain is already up and running and we have a great team of qualified engineers and mechanics working with leading manufacturing companies. But we need your help to make it all happen! 

Delivery time: There are always risks invovled when it comes to delivery if our suppliers do not deliver on time or the shipping provider is delayed. However, we are very confident that we will be able to meet our January deadline. Regardless, rest assured that we will always notify you in case of any changes. 

 

Even if you're not in the market for a rolling walker for yourself or one of your loved ones, there are still ways to help us reach our goal! We appreciate any and all help we can get to move forward with our mission. From a share, like or mention on social media we promise you that it will go a long way.

We appreciate any and all help we can get to move forward with our mission. From a share, like or mention on social media we promise you that it will go a long way.

story:
Overview

FitTo is a compact and discreet device worn around the neck that works with an app to help make weight loss easier. A large part of successful weight loss is managing (and controlling) temptations. Using gentle vibrations, this device alerts you if you’re eating when you shouldn’t, helping you get back on track and stick to your diet. Along with helping you in the moment, the FitTo app lets you set eating times, choose a diet plan that works for you, and even track your progress. Simply lock the device to maintain your hard-earned discipline and escape food temptations.

 ✅ Aids weight loss

 ✅ Boosts your willpower

 ✅ Supported by science

 ✅ iOS and Android compatible 

 ✅ Comfortable, adjustable, waterproof

 

Resist your cravings and track your progress

 

Know when to eat, when NOT to eat, and let the vibrations keep your temptations at bay

 

 

FitTo helps you

 

 

Simply set and go

 

FitTo reminds you to not to cheat; the app reminds you when to eat

 

 

What you get with FitTo

 

 

 

 

 

Featured on 

 

FitTo is there when you need it most

 

Weight loss is easier when you’re not alone. When it comes to staying on track, FitTo is your personal coach. 

 

1) Take control of your eating habits

Choose from the recommended eating plans or a program of your own and use the app to set the times at which you should eat.

2) Avoid temptations with the help of vibrations

The unique FitTo mechanism senses when you start to eat. If it’s outside of your scheduled eating times, the device instantly vibrates for 30 seconds when you take a bite, effectively discouraging you from giving in to temptation. Then, a push notification from the app further motivates you to stay on track.

3) Lock your temptations away 

An optional locking mechanism makes it even easier to commit to your new diet plan. If you’ve struggled with discipline in the past, lock FitTo in place to help you stay on track. 

We especially recommend this for the first 1-2 weeks of your weight loss journey.

4) Get notifications when it’s time to eat

Never again forget your schedule or skip an important meal. The FitTo app will remind you when it’s time to eat.

5) Monitor your progress

Watch your discipline improve as you go and track the results using the app. Use the app to maintain your motivation to make tomorrow better than today.


Slipping off track? Give yourself a shake

 

You’re only human and slipping on your diet is to be expected. But that’s exactly what FitTo is for with its gentle vibrations. When you do slip, the device steps in to give you a shake to help you back on track.

 

Backed by science, proven by results

 

The secret to weight loss isn’t so much a secret: it takes willpower and an understanding of how your body works. When you eat, your body breaks down food into sugars, such as glucose, which your cells use for energy. Any glucose that isn’t used then gets stored as fat. When you fast, your body uses this spare glucose. In short, your body starts to burn your fat. This process of burning fat is known as ketosis.

Numerous studies show that intermittent fasting is an effective weight loss method. There are a variety of techniques including alternate-day fasting, 5:2 (two days of fasting per week), and 6/18 (18 hours fasting per day). Our app helps you choose the option best for you.

 

 

What people are saying about FitTo?

 

"I love that FitTo gives me a shake when I should NOT eat and will remind when to have my meal. The app constantly provides motivation to stay on track and to achieve my goals."

Johnson
Personal Trainer

"FitTo has given me a new a way of staying consistent with my diet plans. The FitTo app provides instant feedback and progress on how I am doing."

Dwayne
Retail Manager

   "FitTo is very easy and simple to use. This is a unique way to transform to be in better shape and lose weight."

Hannah
Solicitor

"FitTo is such a unique product. Many people will understand the struggle of wanting to lose weight but being unable to commit to an eating schedule. FitTo does that work for you, and your schedule becomes something you don’t even have to think about."

Charlie
English Teacher

 


Designed by Professionals

 

We’ve spent three years perfecting the design of FitTo with style, practicality, and comfort in mind.

 

 

Design that suits you

 

The sleek good looks, second-skin comfort, and waterproof design mean it works anywhere life takes you. It even remains inconspicuous under your clothes.

 

 

Tech Specs

 

FitTo Timeline

 

 

FitTo shipping details



 

We ship worldwide; VAT and GST not included. Please see the details for each reward for the shipping cost that applies to you.

 


 

We plan to begin shipping FitTo in January 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Exact ship dates may vary depending on location. You will be notified as soon as your FitTo ships.


For questions about your order, please email: Fitto_customerservice@hotmail.com

By backing now you not only get one of the very first products off the line, but you also get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Our goal is for FitTo backers to have the absolute smoothest experience possible. If you need to change your address or anything else about your order, FitTo customer service will be there to help. Send us an email so we can easily update any of your shipping or delivery details.

 

Help out by sharing with friends & familes!

 

Share on Facebook

Don’t keep it a secret

An optional locking mechanism makes it even easier to commit to your new diet plan. If you’ve struggled with discipline in the past, lock FitTo in place to help you stay on track. 
We especially recommend this for the first 1-2 weeks of your weight loss journey.

4) Get notifications when it’s time to eat
Never again forget your schedule or skip an important meal. The FitTo app will remind you when it’s time to eat.

5) Monitor your progress
Watch your discipline improve as you go and track the results using the app. Use the app to maintain your motivation to make tomorrow better than today.


Slipping off track? Give yourself a shake You’re only human and slipping on your diet is to be expected. But that’s exactly what FitTo is for with its gentle vibrations. When you do slip, the device steps in to give you a shake to help you back on track. Backed by science, proven by results The secret to weight loss isn’t so much a secret: it takes willpower and an understanding of how your body works. When you eat, your body breaks down food into sugars, such as glucose, which your cells use for energy. Any glucose that isn’t used then gets stored as fat. When you fast, your body uses this spare glucose. In short, your body starts to burn your fat. This process of burning fat is known as ketosis.Numerous studies show that intermittent fasting is an effective weight loss method. There are a variety of techniques including alternate-day fasting, 5:2 (two days of fasting per week), and 6/18 (18 hours fasting per day). Our app helps you choose the option best for you.  What people are saying about FitTo? "I love that FitTo gives me a shake when I should NOT eat and will remind when to have my meal. The app constantly provides motivation to stay on track and to achieve my goals."JohnsonPersonal Trainer"FitTo has given me a new a way of staying consistent with my diet plans. The FitTo app provides instant feedback and progress on how I am doing."DwayneRetail Manager   "FitTo is very easy and simple to use. This is a unique way to transform to be in better shape and lose weight."HannahSolicitor"FitTo is such a unique product. Many people will understand the struggle of wanting to lose weight but being unable to commit to an eating schedule. FitTo does that work for you, and your schedule becomes something you don’t even have to think about."CharlieEnglish Teacher 
Designed by Professionals We’ve spent three years perfecting the design of FitTo with style, practicality, and comfort in mind.  Design that suits you The sleek good looks, second-skin comfort, and waterproof design mean it works anywhere life takes you. It even remains inconspicuous under your clothes.  Tech Specs FitTo Timeline  FitTo shipping details We ship worldwide; VAT and GST not included. Please see the details for each reward for the shipping cost that applies to you.  We plan to begin shipping FitTo in January 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Exact ship dates may vary depending on location. You will be notified as soon as your FitTo ships.For questions about your order, please email: Fitto_customerservice@hotmail.comBy backing now you not only get one of the very first products off the line, but you also get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.Our goal is for FitTo backers to have the absolute smoothest experience possible. If you need to change your address or anything else about your order, FitTo customer service will be there to help. Send us an email so we can easily update any of your shipping or delivery details. Help out by sharing with friends & familes! Share on FacebookDon’t keep it a secret

story:
Quick Update (June 2012)

Thank you to everyone for all your help in our success thus far!! 

We have seen immense support from friends, family and even complete strangers. No matter the amount, we sincerely appreciate your generosity and kindness. As Kristi noted in her most recent blog post,

“I have been so touched by the people who have donated that I have to say THANK YOU!!! How amazing all of you are! I am floored by your sweetness. That you would think of my family in these hard economic times and want to help us realize our dream of having healthy children. You all are so inspiring. I cannot thank you enough. I hope you all realize how incredible you are.” 


In addition, we recorded this video with Quinn giving thanks:

 

The more important update, however is that the geneticists have released the needed information to make pre-implantation genetic testing possible! This gives Quinn and Kristi the green light to proceed with In Vitro as soon as they are ready! So, now it’s time for us to step up our efforts!! We have made some amazing progress but we still have a way to go, please help us keep spreading the word!!

"Like" this page and share tthis page with as many people as you can on Facebook, Twitter, blogs, and through family, friends, etc.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

We have come across some very valid concerns during this campaign, and we’d like to address some of them. We want everyone to feel that they are well informed about our cause and know exactly what our mission is. If you have any questions, please feel free to post them in the comments section.

Do the Kimballs really need my help?

To be honest, the Kimball’s plans for In Vitro do not completely hinge on the success of this campaign. However, that is not to say that our contributions aren’t going to go along way. They have been blessed to have Lila with them for almost 2 years, but it has definitely come with a hefty cost. This campaign was set up to help them continue with their family without adding to their existing burdens.  We also like to think that this is a great opportunity for us and anyone interested to help someone in need.

Why does it cost so much? 

Created by friends, the goal amount was a number we felt was more obtainable; however, the overall cost is significantly more than a standard In Vitro procedure because of the unique nature of being the first people to distinguish Vici syndrome markers.

Is In Vitro necessary in order to have a healthy child?

Because of the genetic nature of VS, each child of the Kimballs would have a 1 in 4 chance of being affected by VS. To put that into perspective, the average woman has less than 1 in 1000 chance of conceiving a child with Down’s Syndrome.  In order to eliminate those risks, In Vitro allows doctors to analyze and select only the healthiest of eggs for implantation.

How likely is the In Vitro going to be successful? 

Their program allows them six attempts at fertilization which gives a high chance of success.  If the fertilization isn't successful, the money donated will be used for fees in relation to adoption.  The money can be used for adoption because of the unique nature of the program.

Have the Kimballs looked into adoption?

Yes, the Kimballs are also open to adoption.  The biological and emotional factors of having their own children is strong enough that given the opportunity is available, they cannot pass up the attempt of fertilization.  That being said, they are currently in the process of becoming approved for adoption.

If this campaign is in the Kimball’s behalf, who are the hosts?

My name is Jeff and I am a long-time family friend of the Kimball’s. A few months before Lila was born, Quinn helped me out by hiring me despite any experience in the optometric field. Quinn taught and trained me everything I know about being an optician which eventually led to my acceptance into optometry school. This was the best way I could think of to try to repay Quinn for all his help over the years.

I am also very happy and excited to have Quinn’s brother, Brady join me on the campaign. Brady has successfully managed crowdfunded campaigns before and brings valuable creativity and experience to the campaign. 

We have seen the stress on Quinn and Kristi with Lila's health issues and the ensuing hospital bills. Therefore, we wanted to help in any way possible, and felt that this was the best opportunity to do so.

Original Campaign Description

Born in July of 2010, Lila Kimball is the twentieth documented person in the world to be found with Vici Syndrome (a rare recessive genetic condition). Her parents, Quinn and Kristi Kimball, started having concerns about her health and abilities at two months of age. A grueling twelve months later Lila was finally diagnosed with VS. Although, diagnosing Lila was a blessing of it's own kind, learning of the long-term affects of VS has been devastating. The Kimballs quickly realized that their dreams of having healthy children would hinge on the ability to perform In Vitro.

Lila's timing in this world has been nothing short of a miracle as she has been able to be a leading subject for ground-breaking Vici research and bring hope to families effected by VS. Using Lila's DNA, geneticists have been able to successfully locate the chromosome and gene responsible for VS and make it possible for families like the Kimballs to have healthy children of their own through In Vitro. In this process, each fertilized egg will be analyzed and only those without the recessive VS gene will be implanted.

All funds raised through this campaign will go directly towards the medical costs of the Kimball's In Vitro fertilization. If the fertizilation is unsuccessful,  

Any donation amount is greatly appreciated. We understand that some people may not be able to contirbute, but that doens't mean that you can't help us. We ask that anyone who sees this campaign talks to at least 3 people about our cause. It's easy to share this with others using the Indiegogo share tools!!

Quinn and Kristi's Blog

  • http://quinnandkristi.blogspot.com/

More information on Vici Syndrome

  • http://www.hindawi.com/crim/genetics/2011/421582/
  • http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/ajmg.a.34244/abstract

story:
MANY THANKS TO EVERYONE THAT SUPPORTED THIS CAMPAIGN!

Short Summary

Hi, I’m Esther Chang and I’m fundraising for my volunteer opportunity as an HIVAIDS Camp Counselor and Mentor for girls at Camp Angelina in rural Uganda. This opportunity is inspired by my own personal experience the last 9 years volunteering as an HIVAIDS Camp Counselor and Mentor to teens living with the virus in Northern California at Camp Sunburst. Signing up to be a volunteer camp counselor in 2005 was one of the best decisions of my life and definitely the most rewarding activity I continue to do. After doing this work for so many years and having such success with the community in the States, I knew I wanted to continue this work abroad and share what I’ve learned with other communities in need.

As a camp counselor I provide information on prevention and medication, esteem building, coping, stress reduction, transmission, disclosure, general reproductive health and overall wellness. Two years ago I started leading yoga at Camp Sunburst. It inspired me to get my certification in teaching kids yoga and mindfulness. Come December, I will continue to lead yoga and mindfulness to all campers at Camp Angelina. I am dedicated to this cause and community, specifically youth. More recently, I produced the build of the first free skateboard park in India with HolyStoked, a local NGO, a skateboard play with local New York skaters and actors, and supported Tribal Link’s United Nations Training for Indigenous Leaders from around the world.

Through these experiences, I have been asked to travel to Uganda in order to volunteer for Camp Angelina, a sister camp to Camp Sunburst. Culturally and contextually, the experience will afford me with the opportunity to gain an understanding of HIV needs from the perspective of both locals and an international NGO, while simultaneously providing the opportunity to assist a community in need of prevention and advocacy.

What Is This Camp About?

Camp Angelina consists of one week of community outreach and one week of empowerment camp for over 80 girls aged 12-17 years who have been infected with or affected by HIVAIDS. Outreach involves actively going into the community to work directly with locals and activities range from health facility strengthening via workshops and trainings, home visits for OVCs (Orphans and Vulnerable Children) and PLWHA (People Living With HIVAIDS), and engaging community members in open dialogue concerning the problems facing the community, as well as the assets and strengths to be drawn upon in improving the community. 

The camp will then emphasize healthy coping mechanisms, raise health literacy and health consciousness, provide life skills development, and draw on community organization techniques to empower women to openly discuss and conceive of solutions to community issues. Campers will also be given a rare opportunity to live free of responsibility and stigma for a week to engage in workshops, sports, yoga, and arts & crafts. 

Important dates:

Outreach: December 16 - December 22

Camp Angelina: December 30 – January 3

Duties & Responsibilities Of Volunteers (What I Will Be Doing)

Home Visits

I will have the opportunity to visit homes in the villages. Here we will conduct needs assessments, basic health screenings and check ups, and psychosocial exercises to promote healthy coping. We may also deliver donated food, medication, and cooking supplies.

Facility Visits & Assessments

I will be visiting local healthcare facilities and provide guidance and training within limited resources. Potential activities include testing and counseling training, HIV sensitivity training, pharmaceutical organization, storage and sorting, and basic storage and sanitation practices. The goal is to enhance quality by improving confidentiality, information delivery, autonomy, privacy, and staff treatment.

The following is a list of needs identified by the facilities themselves to get an idea of the types of issues I will potentially be working on:

  • Lack of dispensers at ART (antiretroviral therapy) clinic (thus need volunteers to train local volunteers and students in dispensing and refilling drugs)
  • Medical records management and file retrieval
  • Need for more skills in management of HIV clients & medication
  • Assist with dosing, including addressing issues of pill burden
  • Support ART clinic team and HIV clients on nutrition education
  • Need for skills in handling HIV status disclosure and stigma management, including issues of partner notification
  • Training local clinic staff, community based-care volunteers and home care givers for HIV patients in palliative care
  • Family caregivers support/sensitization
  • Mentoring expert clients, and psychosocial support for affected families and infected individuals

Camp Angelina

Throughout the camp, I will be expected to be both a role model and a leader for activities. These can range from sports to empowerment activities to facilitating discussions. I will personally lead a daily yoga and mindfulness class for all campers.

AIDS Background

One of the greatest effects of the AIDS pandemic is its impact on the psychological and mental health of children who have nursed and lost their parents under traumatic circumstances. The impact of parental death on children is complex and affects the child’s mental health and social energy, and might further result in stunted development of emotional intelligence and life skills. Many of the children Camp Angelina has worked with show psychosomatic disturbances, depression, very low self-esteem, disturbed social behaviour, hopelessness, low levels of life skills, etc. We have observed that with relatively unsophisticated, direct and culturally appropriate psychosocial and economic support interventions for children affected by AIDS, very encouraging results to improve the resilience and coping capacity of children can be achieved.

Camp Angelina is solving these problems by empowering and advocating for the health and well being of OVC’s through community health education and economic development programs, by preventing the spread of HIVAIDS among young people and the general population using evidence- informed programming, improving the quality of life for people living with HIVAIDS through providing HIVAIDS counseling, care and referral treatment and providing psycho-social support to PLWHIV.

What I Need

My goal is $5,000 and any and all donations are tax deductible. As this is an unfunded position, these funds will be used to offset the costs of travel, transportation, housing, food, and other miscellaneous expenses for 3 weeks. I’m asking for donations from $10 and up. All donations are going to make this opportunity possible and any additional funds will go directly to Camp Angelina. We need funds for gas during outreach among other things and then all expenses for over 80 girls for an entire week of camp. It costs roughly $75 per child for the week of Camp Angelina.

NGO’s across the world rely on volunteers and I am here today to ask you to donate to this cause, to this organization, and to my continued support to teens living with HIV. And even if you can’t donate, if you can, please forward this along to someone you know who may be interested in supporting this cause. Your support is what’s going to make this possible.

Thank you for everything!

Special THANKS to Jimmie Armentrout, Rich Awn (Mombucha), Tati Barrantes, Jarrod Byrne Mayer, Deepak Chopra, Colleen Keane (SCOUT), Kari Morris (Morris Kitchen), Victor Neyra, Hannah Stouffer.

More Information

Camp Angelina

Camp Angelina Facebook

ABC News Special on Camp Sunburst

story:
Do aches and pains make you think twice about doing the things you love? Back pain, neck pain, knee pain...it happens. We have all been there. BioLyte Laboratories' founder, Daniel Kaline, suffered from chronic knee pain for years. He designed NeoRelief, a 100% natural product, to help heal, not just mask pain.

Like us, we believe many people want natural solutions that really work. We don’t want to slather a bunch of synthetic chemicals onto ourselves or our family. And with NeoRelief you don’t have to swallow pills or apply smelly, greasy creams to get relief.

Don’t Mask the Pain, Heal it

Other pain relieving products, such as those with menthol, camphor, and capsaicin, distract the brain by creating another sensation (i.e. cooling or warming). NeoRelief is a synergistic blend of natural ingredients designed to quickly work on healing the area of the pain instead of just masking it. And without synthetic chemicals! The gel is clear, fast-acting, and it absorbs into your skin leaving it smooth and soft, with no greasy feel.

No smell, no stain, no sting. All while providing soothing relief.

NeoRelief - Perfect Pain Relief

NeoRelief increases blood flow and promotes cell regeneration to reduce bruising and speed healing time. It inhibits pain sensitive neurons for fast, long-acting pain relief.  

NeoRelief is listed with the FDA and is patent-pending. NeoRelief is a Complementary and Alternative Medicine containing a blend of 22 natural ingredients; 19 botanicals and 3 minerals. One bottle delivers 120 doses, costing only pennies per treatment.

      

Active Ingredients: Actaea, Aesculus Hipp., Althaea, Arnica, Belladonna, Bellis, Bryonia, Calendula, Caulophyllum, Causticum, Cimicifuga, Guaiacum, Hypericum, Kali Carb., Ledum, Lithium Carb., Rhamnus Calif., Rhododendron, Rhus Tox., Ruta, Salicylicum Ac., Stellaria Med. All ingredients are HPUS and in 4X potency.

A Word from NeoRelief Formulator, Daniel Kaline

“Much of my young adult life was spent playing sports including track, football, swimming, and skiing. As a sophomore in high school, I dislocated my left knee. I spent the next year in rehab, only to dislocate it a second time. This forced me to deal with a series of radical knee operations - at last count five, over the next several years.
While I was suffering through my various recoveries, it paled in comparison to watching my father struggle with the excruciating pain of severe chronic Rheumatoid Arthritis. I found it especially difficult watching him deteriorate; each day his pain becoming increasingly worse, with traditional medicine providing very little relief.
After spending a good portion of my professional life as a therapist working in Cardio Pulmonary, I have seen a good deal of pain, much of it comparable to what my father must have been feeling. The difference was, of course, my father’s pain was personal rather than clinical. This was my dad.
It became my mission to alleviate pain and suffering.” 

What People Say About NeoRelief

“Amazing how quickly it takes the pain away.” 
“You can see the swelling go down.”
“I like that it’s all natural, no synthetics.”
“The bruising, pain, redness – all went down…”

NeoRelief Needs Your Support

We are ready to get NeoRelief into the hands of pain sufferers who want alternative medicines to relieve pain. And we need your help to fund our first mass production run. In return for your early support, you will be one the very first to receive NeoRelief, along with other great perks – all while supporting a company who enhances people’s lives and improves their quality of life, naturally.

Help Us Socially

If you are unable to provide financial support, we kindly ask you to personally spread the word to friends and family who you think would benefit from being pain (and chemical) free. Please share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and email. We thank you for helping to make NeoRelief possible. 

Our website is going live very soon! Check back to see more NeoRelief details.


Why We Created NeoRelief

At BioLyte Laboratories, we are committed to empower people with the knowledge of healthy lifestyle choices. We champion everyone in their pursuit toward the fullness of life, and faithfully support those individuals who desire a healthier quality of life in a natural way. One of our primary goals is to change the outlook of those whose lives are defined by their pain, allowing them to live life to the fullest.

Meet the Team!

  Daniel Kaline - President 
I spent a lot of time playing sports and I am no stranger to pain. I suffered through a series of radical knee surgeries and some very difficult rehab. I also watched my father struggle with the excruciating pain of severe chronic Rheumatoid Arthritis where traditional medicine provided very little relief. BioLyte Laboratories and NeoRelief are a result of my desire to bring natural healing to everyone. With a comprehensive background in science, the medical field, and the health and nutrition industry, I feel privileged to be able to follow my passion as full-time natural products formulator.

  Timothy Powers - CEO 

I’ve spent more than 35 years working in high level roles at Motorola and GE Healthcare. Most recently for GE Healthcare, I was responsible for their global portable X-Ray portfolio and global medical regulatory compliance. Individuals are now taking control of their health decisions. NeoRelief is an all-natural solution that allows people to avoid harsh chemicals while addressing pain relief in a much different manner. Our plea to you is to help BioLyte Laboratories deliver this revolutionary product to the market so that many more people can select an alternative means to relieving pain. Your contribution allows us to take the next step in realizing the goal of providing all-natural, perfect pain relief to people like you who care about what you are putting on your body.

  Joni Kaline - COO

I have always been interested in how natural products can gently assist and interact with the body’s own innate healing powers. I have a long history in the Health and Nutrition field, and have owned and operated several successful businesses that are still thriving today. With an education in biology and chemistry, I can see the potential of NeoRelief to help people heal naturally and I'm excited to help bring it to market.

  Dana Powers - Marketing Director

As a mom, a healthy lifestyle is very important to me and my family. That’s why I look for high quality natural products. I wouldn't put harsh chemicals on my babies or myself. And carrying around kids can take its toll! NeoRelief offers a great alternative treatment to life’s inevitable aches. As Marketing Director of BioLyte Laboratories, I bring expertise in establishing strategic marketing plans, resourcing, and program execution. I spent the past eight years with Motorola Mobility where I successfully launched over 30 products.

  Bridget Zimmerman - Sales Director 

Relieving pain is something I strive to do both personally and professionally. I was diagnosed with basal cell carcinoma on my left cheek this past year, resulting in a surgery that entailed over 30 stitches, swelling, bruising, redness and a scar. I met Dan Kaline a few months before my surgery and he explained the benefits of NeoRelief. I used it after the stitches were removed. The plastic surgeon was very impressed with how quickly I was healing, and so was I! My career as a pharmaceutical sales consultant selling various products, including one for muscle pain relief, has led me to the privilege of becoming the Sales Director for BioLyte Laboratories.

So whether you are an active marathon runner, playing a few rounds of golf, or spending some time in your garden, you can be ready to relieve your pain and discomfort with NeoRelief.

It is great for not only arthritis and sore muscles, but also for bug bites, burns and skin irritations. 

Start using the product that delivers perfect pain relief…..NeoRelief.


We are not approved to ship outside of the US at this time. Our sincere apologies. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Question: Will NeoRelief relieve the symptoms of rashes and itching, or does it only work on pain?

Answer: NeoRelief does work on rashes and itching. One of the powerful characteristics of NeoRelief is its multifunctional use.

Question: Does NeoRelief work on burns as well?

Answer: Absolutely. Gently apply the gel to the affected area, being careful not to rub in. Sit back and allow the natural ingredients to do their work. You may need to apply every 15 minutes for the first hour, depending on the severity of the burn. Then decrease to once an hour and then to every few hours, as needed. Make sure you apply on clean skin and not over another topical cream.

Question: I didn’t feel any cooling or burning sensation when using this product; how do I know NeoRelief is working?

Answer: Don’t confuse this product with conventional topical analgesics, which are counter irritants designed to distract your attention from the pain to focus on a different sensation. NeoRelief  works by stimulating the body to heal itself and relieve the symptoms of pain. Make sure to quantify your level of pain and then 15 minutes after the first application re-quantify your level of pain. If you still have some pain, then reapply until pain is gone or greatly reduced. Going from a pain level 8 down to a level 2, for example, is a huge improvement! You may still have some pain, but at least it’s manageable or tolerable. With natural medicine, the more you use, the better it works. Whereas with conventional medicine, most often the more you use it, the more your body develops a tolerance for the medicine.

Question: Do I need to rub NeoRelief in like most other topical analgesic products to work?

Answer: No, it works better if you simply spread a small amount over the clean area of discomfort and do not rub in. Unlike so many products on the market, this product is non-greasy.

Question: What about scars, will NeoRelief help with those?

Answer: Although not designed specifically for scars, it will help to reduce potential scarring. It will also help reduce the itching and tenderness associated with the healing process. 

Question: Does this product also work on headaches or migraines?

Answer:  We have seen great results on both, although migraines are usually more complex. A little tip: to treat a headache, simply coat the forehead, temples, behind the ears and back of the neck for best result. NeoRelief, more often than not, works immediately with just one application. Sometimes it may take a minute or two to work, or may require a second application after 5 minutes.

Question: Is it unsafe to use this product more than six times a day.

Answer: Our label recommends not to exceed more than six time per day because typically that should be sufficient to do the job. However, consult your physician if you have any concerns. NeoRelief is safe and effective, but some people may have chronic ailments that require more care than NeoRelief can provide. There may be underlying injuries or medical conditions that require the attention or diagnosis of a health care professional. If you do have relief from NeoRelief, then stop use and only use when symptoms reappear.

Question: What if I use this product in the way it is intended to be used and do not get full relief?

Answer: Some relief is better than no relief. We have had a few people say that they did not think the product worked for them. Then when asked if there was any change in their level of pain, most reported going from a high level of pain to a lower level, but may still have some pain. Any reduction in pain is a positive response. If we don’t eliminate all of the pain but reduce it to an acceptable level then that is a step in the right direction. However, if you are not completely satisfied, simply return the product within 30 days and we will refund your money.

Question: Can I use this product with other conventional topical remedies?

Answer: We do not recommend the use of this product with other remedies. In most cases, other liniments will conflict with or block the benefits of NeoRelief and cause it to perform less effectively.
story_txt:
Do aches and pains make you think twice about doing the
things you love? Back pain, neck pain, knee pain...it happens. We have all been
there. BioLyte Laboratories' founder, Daniel Kaline, suffered from chronic knee pain for
years. He designed NeoRelief, a 100% natural product, to help heal, not just
mask pain.
Like us, we believe many people want natural solutions that really work. We don’t want
to slather a bunch of synthetic chemicals onto ourselves or our family. And with NeoRelief you don’t have to swallow pills or apply smelly, greasy creams to get relief.






Don’t Mask the Pain, Heal it



Other pain relieving products, such as those
with menthol, camphor, and capsaicin, distract the brain by creating another
sensation (i.e. cooling or warming). NeoRelief is a synergistic blend of natural ingredients designed to quickly work on healing the
area of the pain instead of just masking it. And without synthetic chemicals! The gel
is clear, fast-acting, and it absorbs into your skin leaving it smooth and soft,
with no greasy feel. 
No smell, no stain, no sting. All while providing soothing
relief.
NeoRelief - Perfect Pain Relief
NeoRelief
increases blood flow and promotes cell regeneration to reduce bruising and speed healing time. It inhibits pain sensitive neurons for fast, long-acting pain
relief.  
NeoRelief
is listed with the FDA and is patent-pending. NeoRelief is
a Complementary and Alternative Medicine containing a
blend of 22 natural ingredients; 19 botanicals and 3 minerals. One bottle
delivers 120 doses, costing only pennies per treatment.
      


Active Ingredients: Actaea, Aesculus Hipp., Althaea, Arnica, Belladonna, Bellis, Bryonia, Calendula, Caulophyllum, Causticum, Cimicifuga, Guaiacum, Hypericum, Kali Carb., Ledum, Lithium Carb., Rhamnus Calif., Rhododendron, Rhus Tox., Ruta, Salicylicum Ac., Stellaria Med. All ingredients are HPUS and in 4X potency.
A Word from NeoRelief Formulator, Daniel Kaline
“Much of my young adult life was spent playing sports including track, football, swimming, and skiing. As a sophomore in high school, I dislocated my left knee. I spent the next year in rehab, only to dislocate it a second time. This forced me to deal with a series of radical knee operations - at last count five, over the next several years.
While I was suffering through my various recoveries, it paled in comparison to watching my father struggle with the excruciating pain of severe chronic Rheumatoid Arthritis. I found it especially difficult watching him deteriorate; each day his pain becoming increasingly worse, with traditional medicine providing very little relief.
After spending a good portion of my professional life as a therapist working in Cardio Pulmonary, I have seen a good deal of pain, much of it comparable to what my father must have been feeling. The difference was, of course, my father’s pain was personal rather than clinical. This was my dad.
It became my mission to alleviate pain and suffering.” 

What
People Say About NeoRelief

“Amazing how quickly it takes the
pain away.” “You can see the swelling go down.”“I like that it’s all natural, no
synthetics.”“The bruising, pain, redness – all
went down…”





NeoRelief Needs Your Support
We are
ready to get NeoRelief into the hands of pain sufferers who want alternative
medicines to relieve pain. And we need your help to fund our first mass
production run. In return for your early support, you will be one the very first
to receive NeoRelief, along with other great perks – all while supporting a
company who enhances people’s lives and improves their quality of life,
naturally.

you to personally spread the word to friends and family who you think would
benefit from being pain (and chemical) free. Please share our campaign on

possible.

story:
Our Story

We are Cindy and Art DeVore, owners of Valley Green Naturals, a start-up company located in Virginia's beautiful Piedmont.  After 9/11, we decided to leave the Washington, D.C. area and move to Virginia's countryside.  On our little hobby farm, we raise chickens, grow our own herbs and vegetables, and make our own body and hair care products. 


We got interested in making natural products several years ago after Art bought a home soap-making kit.  We had a lot of fun in the kitchen of our farm house, making products with dried herbs from our organic garden and honey from the hives located on the neighboring vineyard.  The soaps were so awesome that we began selling them locally, and they were a huge hit!  Shortly thereafter, Valley Green Naturals was born!  


Long story short, we took $250 of our hard-earned money and bought ingredients to create our first lotions, creams and shampoos.  After many months of testing and perfecting recipes, as well as designing and printing all of our own labels, we launched a small product line on Etsy.  That was in the Fall of 2009.  We remember how excited we were when we made our first $100 from online sales!  Two years later, Valley Green Naturals offers over 30 skin, hair and body care products that are free of sulfates, phthalates, parabens and petrochemicals.  Oh, and one more thing... online, the company has sold over $60,000 in products!  


Now, it's time to take Valley Green Naturals products to the masses!  Our goal is to get our affordable, body-safe and eco-friendly product line on supermarket shelves across America.  We believe that everyone should have access to natural and organic goods... and that's why Valley Green Naturals products always will be priced so that anyone who is looking to buck the chemical world can go "au naturel!"  We're starting the push for store shelf space with our #1-selling product, "Gardener's Glee!â„¢ Dry Hand Remedy" which is featured in our video.

The Impact

We know that we're big dreamers.  But hey, you can't be a successful entrepreneur without thinking big!  We also realize that placing Valley Green Naturals products on supermarket shelves across America isn't going to happen overnight.  But by starting small, with local grocery store chains, and sources like our Whole Foods Market regional office, we believe that we can make Valley Green Naturals products available to many thousands of folks.  There's a growing movement to buy local and buy natural.  Our quality products meet the needs of customers who are looking to buy safer items for themselves and their families.  Starting with local store chains also allows our company to grow along with customer demand for our products.


In addition to our brick and mortar store goal, we have been offered a vendor contract with DrugStore.com, which is owned by Walgreen's drug store chain.  At the same time that we're working to ramp up production for supermarket placement, we will be filling wholesale orders for both DrugStore.com and their sister site, Beauty.com.  


If, for some reason, we don't meet our funding goal, we will still go forward to cover expenses of our expansion.  Every penny counts, and our company is just teetering on the verge of growing beyond our wildest expectations.  We've already received feedback from customers whose lives have been positively affected by Valley Green Naturals products.  Just check out the customer reviews on our web site (http://valleygreennaturals.com/testimonial/), and you'll understand why we're so motivated to keep going, and to keep growing.  


What We Need

One of the first questions we've been asked by distributors who work with store chains is, "What's your production level?"  We always cringe at that question because until now, we've blended and bottled all $60,000 worth of products we've sold completely by hand.  Yep, that's a lot of mixing!  In order to increase our production from 1,000 units per month, to say, 5,000 units per month, we need the proper equipment and staff.  This would include purchase of additional stainless steel work tables, burners, commercial-size pots and mixers, bottling and labeling machines, pallets, packing materials, additional trademarks, and the ever-so-necessary (and required) product liability insurance. The funding also would be used to purchase our labels, bottles and ingredients in much larger quantities, thereby reducing our overall production and packaging costs.  


If we don't reach our entire funding goal on IndieGoGo, never fear!  We will use all funds contributed to cover the costs of increasing our production.  For example, if we can afford to buy just 1 commercial mixer, rather than 2, then that's what we'll do.  If we have enough money to pay only 2 staff people instead of 4, then we'll roll up our sleeves and extend our workday to do that extra work ourselves!


From Day 1 of our company launch, we have reinvested every penny earned back into the company (we're not paying ourselves yet!).  Any funding earned through IndieGoGo or other sources will be used solely to cover our growth expenses to meet our ultimate goal:  Valley Green Naturals on supermarket shelves!


So... what's in it for you?  

Oh gosh, we thought you'd never ask!  


With over 30 products in the Valley Green Naturals line, we have much to offer in return for your generous financial backing!  The best part is, at each contribution level, we're offering fantastic perks for less than what you would pay if you purchased them on our web site or from a store... Everything is shipped to you for free!  


A little forward thinking:  Wouldn't you love to be able to pick up your next bottle of Gardener's Glee! Dry Hand Remedy at your local supermarket or drug store?  That's a perk that we all can look forward to!


Other Ways You Can Help


There are some cool share tools that IndieGoGo offers with each campaign.  Please make good use of them, and make some noise about Valley Green Naturals and what we're working to accomplish!  


Got a Facebook page or Twitter account?  Share our link and ask your friends to contribute to our awesome little company!  We'll send them some really cool body-safe and eco-friendly goodies in return, and they'll be able to boast about the role they played in our company's growth!

story:
ABOUT

Wells for Wellbeing is a non-profit organization focused on making a lasting impact in this world by constructing water wells that provide safe, clean, and sustainable water for those in need.

But we don't stop there.

After each well is completed, Wells for Wellbeing hires teachers to educate villagers (especially children) about hygiene, water safety, and how to efficiently use their newly constructed water wells in the hopes of creating a lasting impact on generations to come.


PROJECT | CAMBODIA

Did you know that 75% of Cambodia's annual deaths are attributed to contaminated water? It's an alarming statistic, but it is also a statistic that can be positively changed through support, awareness, education, and more.

Wells for Wellbeing raises funds through partners, sponsors, donors, and store purchases in order to build water wells for Cambodian families in need.

There are two types of water wells that are constructed depending upon the location and need:

The first one is the type of well that most of us are familiar with: the large circular wells where a bucket is used to collect water. These wells are dug real deep, about 25meters, to provide water to a village of many families.

The second one is a pump-operated water well meant to serve individual families. However, these wells can be shared and can serve for a number of families. They have an easy-to-use lever that allows practically anyone to easily pump water for themselves - quicker and easier than the first type of well. These wells are only dug about 12-15meters deep though in comparison to the 25meter well.

After each well is constructed, Wells for Wellbeing hires teachers to educate the villagers (especially children) about hygiene, water safety, and how to efficiently use their newly constructed water wells in the hopes of creating a lasting impact on generations to come.


WATER SIGNIFICANCE

Take a moment and think about the last time you drank a cup of water.

Now, think about how you got that water. Where did you get it? Did you buy a bottle of water? Did you get it from your tap water? Your refrigerator?

And now, think about how you would get that water if you didn't have enough money to buy a bottle of water, didn't have access to water, or didn't own a refrigerator.

Clearly, getting water becomes a large conflict considering how important it is for survival. These villagers don't have the money to continuously buy water bottles and they don't have the time to do so either. A trip to the nearest convenience store or market can sometimes be as long as a a few miles and then they have to carry back cases of water.


OUR GOAL

The purpose of this campaign is to raise as much money and awareness as possible in order to build as many water wells as we can before 2013 ends!

With $3,000+, we can build more than five water wells, which would be an amazing accomplishment before the year ends!

Contribute today and together, we can give water and save lives.
